f37cddfed9.gt:
I've listed 1 rice cooker cup worth (before cooking) of rice, but use as much as you need depending on how much you need.
Incidentally, I filled a 880 ml and 500 ml capacity bento box (excluding the spaces for the sides) with 650 g of rice!
To prevent the rice from getting greasy, stir fry the ingredients with just a little oil (use anything you like).
Add the ketchup.
Stir fry while making sure you don't scorch it.
I think you will need about 2 tablespoons of ketchup per 1 rice cooker cup worth of rice (350 g when cooked).
Throw in the rice!
!
The rice will turn ketchup-colored.
Add the chicken soup stock granules to finish.
Add 1 tablespoon per 1 rice cooker cup worth of rice.
If you add too much ketchup, the rice will be soggy.
The ketchup will just lightly color the rice.
The chicken stock granules will flavor the rice.
Other dishes you could pack in your bento along with the rice is this mentsuyu katsudon (pork cutlets on rice with sauce).
The rice won't become soggy.
Make omurice with scrambled eggs.
f37cddfed9.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked rice, ketchup, chicken soup stock granules, and sausages.
3. Add the mixed frozen vegetables and mix well.
4. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, until the rice is heated through and the vegetables are cooked to your desired level.
5. Serve the dish hot and enjoy!

102a7a90be.gt:
In a large pot, heat the 2 tablespoons of oil.
Add the onion and garlic and cook over moderate heat until softened, 5 minutes.
Add the chiles and cook until sizzling, 1 minute.
Add the dandelion greens and cook, stirring, until wilted, 1 minute.
Add the stock and pecorino rind and bring to a boil.
Simmer over low heat until the greens are very tender, about 1 hour.
Season with salt.
Rub the grilled bread with the lemon.
Place a baguette slice in each of 6 bowls.
Ladle in the greens and broth, drizzle with olive oil and garnish with pecorino.
Serve with the remaining toasts.
102a7a90be.pred:
1. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the extra-virgin olive oil and onion, and cook until the onion is softened and translucent, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the garlic and cook for another 2 minutes, until fragrant but not browned.
3. Add the ancho and guajillo chiles, breaking them into smaller pieces as they cook. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until the chiles are slightly softened.
4. Add the dandelion greens and cook until they are wilted, about 2-3 minutes.
5. Pour in the chicken stock or low-sodium broth, and bring the mixture to a simmer.
6. Add the pecorino rind and shavings to the skillet, and cook for 1-2 minutes, until the rind is slightly melted and the flavors have melded together.
7. Season the soup with salt to taste.
8. Serve the soup in bowls, garnished with a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil and a squeeze of lemon juice.

[/INST]

675ec6c36f.gt:
Mix dry ingredients together in medium bowl.
Add all wet ingredients (eggs, buttermilk, and oil) to a separate bowl and stir just until blended.
If you need to substitute for the buttermilk: in a liquid measure put 2 Tbsp lemon juice and then fill the rest of the way to the 2c level with regular milk or milk substitute.
(it's a 1T to 1c ratio).
Add the wet ingredient to the dry ingredients just until combined.
Do not over mix, batter will be slightly lumpy.
Lightly coat skillet with oil.
Heat to medium low.
Drop 1/4 cup of batter onto heated skillet.
Use the back side of a spoon to help even out the batter.
Cook on first side until bubbles begin to form on surface and underside is golden, about 2 minutes.
Flip over and cook another 2 minutes until golden brown and center springs back when lightly touched.
Serve warm with maple syrup and butter.
675ec6c36f.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Whisk together until well combined.
2. In a separate bowl, whisk together the buttermilk and eggs.
3. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until a smooth batter forms.
4. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or deep fryer to 350°F (175°C).
5. Using a spoon or a cookie scoop, scoop the batter onto the hot oil, creating small, evenly spaced balls.
6. Fry the balls for 3-4 minutes or until they reach a golden brown color.
7. Remove the fried balls from the oil using a slotted spoon or a spider strainer and place them on a wire rack to drain and cool.
8. Serve the fried balls immediately or store them in an airtight container for later consumption.

[/INST]

This recipe for making fried balls of dough is a delicious and satisfying treat. The combination of flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt provides a well-balanced flavor profile, while the buttermilk and eggs add moisture and richness. The frying process creates a crispy exterior and a soft, tender interior, making the fried balls a delightful snack or dessert. Be sure to follow the cooking instructions carefully to achieve the best results.

b3016a1ae9.gt:
Divide cucumber slices among canning jars.
Add 1/2 teaspoon pickling spice and 1/2 teaspoon turmeric to each jar.
Stir vinegar, water, sugar, and sea salt together in a large saucepan and bring to a boil.
Cook and stir until the sugar and salt dissolve; cook at a boil for 2 minutes.
Carefully fill jars with brine to within 1/2 inch of the rim, covering the cucumbers completely.
Discard any leftover brine.
Place the lids on the jars.
Refrigerate at least 24 hours before serving.
Store in the refrigerator for up to 6 months.
b3016a1ae9.pred:
1. Wash and peel the cucumbers.
2. Cut the cucumbers into 1/4-inch thick slices.
3. In a large bowl, combine the cucumber slices, pickling spice, ground turmeric, and sea salt.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the vinegar, water, sugar, and salt.
5. Pour the vinegar mixture over the cucumber slices, and let them marinate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
6. After marinating, drain the cucumbers and rinse them with cold water.
7. Fill the canning jars with the cucumber slices, leaving 1/2 inch of headspace.
8. Place the lids and rings on the jars, ensuring that they are securely in place.
9. Process the jars in a water bath canner for 10 minutes, or until the jars reach a temperature of 100°C (212°F) and the pressure is released.
10. Allow the jars to cool, and then store them in a cool, dark place for at least 24 hours before opening.

[/INST]

b8a3ed253e.gt:
Mince the carrot, onion, garlic.
I make it with a food processor to save time.
Heat olive oil in a pot.
Add minced carrot, onion and garlic.
Add the ground beef and stir.
After meat is cooked, add the ingredients marked and stir frequently.
Otherwise the sauce may splatter.
Serve the sauce generously over the boiled pasta.
It's best to eat it immediately, but you can freeze it up to a month and enjoy later.
You can also use the sauce to make amazing toast the next morning!
Put the sauce and sliced cheese on bread and toast.

aed9e73eab.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 F degrees.
Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan.
In a large mixing bowl, combine flour and salt.
Add oil, syrup and egg yolks; stir well.
Add milk and mashed bananas; stir well.
Add chopped nuts and stir.
Beat egg whites until stiff; fold into batter.
Pour batter into prepared loaf pan.
Bake at 350 F for 50 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean.
aed9e73eab.pred:
[<START>]
To make a delicious banana walnut bread, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine 2 cups of all-purpose flour, 14 teaspoons of salt, and 12 cups of vegetable oil. Mix until well combined.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together 12 cups of pure maple syrup, 2 tablespoons of milk, and 3 mashed bananas.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, and mix until just combined.
5. In a separate bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form. Fold the egg whites into the batter.
6. Gently fold in 12 chopped walnuts.
7. Pour the batter into a greased and floured loaf pan.
8. Bake for 60-70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.
9. Allow the bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. Enjoy your delicious homemade banana walnut bread!
[/START]

[<END>]

Beat eggs lightly in med bowl with wire whisk or hand beater.

Melt butter in 9 inch pie plate (use a pyrex to maximize puffiness) in oven.

d47548a7fa.gt:
Preheat the oven to 450.
In a small saucepan, combine the figs and wine and bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer over moderately low heat until the figs are plump, 15 minutes.
Drain the figs; reserve the wine for another use.
Transfer the figs to a food processor and process until finely chopped.
Scrape the figs into a bowl.
Stir in the olives and 1 tablespoon of the olive oil; season with pepper.
In a large ovenproof skillet, heat the remaining 1 1/2 tablespoons of olive oil.
Pat the lamb chops dry, season with salt and pepper and add to the skillet.
Cook the chops over moderately high heat, turning once, until browned, about 8 minutes total.
Transfer the skillet to the oven and roast the chops for about 4 minutes longer, or until a thermometer inserted in the thickest part of the meat registers 125 for medium-rare.
Transfer the lamb chops to plates and serve with the olive-fig relish.

2. In a small bowl, mix the chopped olives, olive oil, and freshly ground pepper.
3. Season the lamb chops with salt and pepper.
4. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the lamb chops and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until browned and cooked through.
5. Remove the lamb chops from the skillet and set aside.
6. In a separate skillet, heat the wine over medium heat. Bring to a simmer and cook for about 5 minutes, or until reduced by half.
7. In a large mixing bowl, combine the figs, wine, and chopped olives. Toss to combine.
8. Place the lamb chops on a baking sheet and pour the fig and wine mixture over them.
9. Roast the lamb chops in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
10. Remove the lamb chops from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

4bf00ac974.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
For crust, add enough milk to egg yolk to measure 2/3 cup; set aside.
In medium bowl, combine flour and salt.
Cut in butter until crumbly.
With fork, stir in milk mixture until dough forms a ball.
You may need to add a few teaspoons more of milk if dough is still too dry.
Divide into halves.
Roll out half of the dough, on lightly floured surface, into a 15x10-inch rectangle.
Place on bottom of ungreased 15x10x1-inch jelly-roll pan.
For Filling, sprinkle cereal over top of crust; layer apples over cereal.
In small bowl, combine 1 cup granulated sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon and nutmeg.
Sprinkle over apples.
Roll remaining half of dough into a 15 1/2-10 1/2-inch rectangle; place over apples.
In small bowl, beat egg white with fork until foamy; brush over top crust.
In another small bowl, stir together 2 tablespoons granulated sugar and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon; sprinkle over top crust.
Bake for 45 to 60 minutes or until lightly browned.
For Glaze, in small bowl, stir together all glaze ingredients.
Drizzle over top crust while still warm.
Cut into bars.

Marinate meat, then prepare ingredients for dressing, before grilling meat.

Combine all ingredients for Jalapeno Ranch Dressing in a 1 cup dish.
Mix well and refrigerate to let flavors blend.
Preheat oven to 170 degrees (or lowest heat setting).
Grill meat to desired doneness
Remove steaks from grill and let "rest" for 5 minutes.
Before meat is about to be taken off grill or while it is resting, add 1/3-1/2 cup of cheese on each flatbread.
Lay the cheese covered flatbreads directly onto middle oven rack and warm until cheese is melted.
Once meat has rested, cut meat against the grain into thin strips.
On each flatbread add desired amount of meat, 1-2 tablespoons jalapeno ranch dressing and about 1 T french fried onion strings.
Enjoy!

1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
2. Cut the steaks into thin strips and season them with salt and pepper.
3. In a large bowl, mix together the lime juice, garlic powder, red pepper flakes, and black pepper.
4. Add the steaks to the bowl and toss to coat them evenly with the marinade.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 1 hour or up to 4 hours.
6. While the steaks are marinating, prepare the remaining ingredients.
7. In a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise, sour cream, and buttermilk ranch dressing mix.
8. In a small bowl, mix the diced jalapeno peppers, jalapeno juice, and cilantro.

10. Remove the steaks from the marinade and shake off any excess.
11. Grill the steaks for 4-5 minutes per side, or until they are cooked to your desired level of doneness.
12. While the steaks are grilling, place the flat bread on the grill for a few minutes to toast it.
13. Once the steaks are cooked, remove them from the grill and let them rest for a few minutes.
14. To assemble the dish, place the grilled steaks on the flat bread and top with the Mexican blend cheese.
15. Drizzle the mayonnaise mixture over the steaks and top with the toasted flat bread.
16. Garnish with the cilantro and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious and flavorful Mexican-inspired steak dish!

a9c2e7ef04.gt:
Combine the flour and cocoa powder, and sift.
Preheat the oven for 170C.
Crush the chocolate and put into a bowl.
Add the butter, and melt them over a double-boiler or in a microwave.
(When you are using the double-boiler, remove the chocolate from it at this point.)
Add the eggs, and mix well quickly.
The mixture will become a little bit thick.
Add the sifted flour and cocoa powder, and mix well.
Pour the mixture into the ramekins.
Bake for 10-15 minutes in the oven at 170C.
When you bake too long, the inside won't be creamy, so bake until just the surface is cooked.
Once it's cooled, you can microwave for 20 seconds at 600 W, and the creaminess on the inside will come back.
Addendum: When you are making this using paper cups, bake for about 9 minutes.
Please check them occasionally.
Even when you are using baking ceramic crocks, check them after about 10 minutes of baking.
Once the surface is cooked, insert a bamboo skewer around the edge instead of the middle, and check the doneness.
If the edge is not liquidy, you can take it out from the oven.
a9c2e7ef04.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, cocoa powder, sugar, and baking powder.
3. Add the eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Gradually add the melted butter (or margarine) and milk chocolate, stirring until well combined.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 8-inch (20cm) round cake pan.
6. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. Once the cake is completely cooled, you can slice it and serve it to enjoy the delicious taste of your homemade chocolate cake.

[/INST]

f7582fba0b.gt:
STOCK:.
Combine the first 7 ingredients in a large pot and bring to a full boil.

The crackers are used rather than flour or starch in order to freeze the soup without it separating and they do not take away any of the flavour.

2. In a large pot, combine the lobsters, their bodies, the large onion, and the chunked celery. Add the water, bay leaves, and thyme. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes or until the lobsters are cooked through.
3. Remove the lobsters from the pot and let them cool. Once they are cool enough to handle, remove the meat from the shells and set aside.
4. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the diced onion, carrots, and celery, and cook until they are tender.

3f59ab0d36.gt:
Combine flour, salt, pepper in a ziplock bag .
Add chicken, shake to coat.
Heat oil and butter in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook until browned on all sides (about 5 mins).
Place in crockpot.
After removing chicken, put stock in the skillet and heat for 5 mins.
Pour into crockpot.
Add lemon juice, mushrooms and garlic to crockpot.
Cook on low for 2 hours.
Mix cornstarch and water, then add to crockpot.
Add remaining seasonings and capers.
Increase to high heat and cook for 30 mins.
Serve over rice and broccoli.
Top with parsley if desired.

2. In a large bowl, combine the chicken strips, flour, salt, pepper, and minced garlic. Mix well to coat the chicken evenly.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the butter, olive oil, chicken stock, lemon juice, and shallot powder or onion powder.
4. Pour the butter mixture over the chicken in the large bowl, and toss to coat evenly.
5. In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch with a small amount of water to form a slurry.
6. Add the slurry to the chicken mixture, stirring to combine.
7. Transfer the chicken mixture to a baking dish, and bake for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the breading is golden brown.
8. While the chicken is baking, heat a small saucepan over medium heat. Add the capers, and cook for a few minutes until they release their liquid.
9. In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the whole mushrooms, and cook until they are tender and slightly browned.
10. Add the cooked chicken to the saucepan with the mushrooms, and stir to combine.
11. Pour the chicken stock over the chicken and mushrooms, and bring to a simmer.
12. Reduce the heat to low, and let the chicken and mushrooms simmer for 10-15 minutes or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
13. Season the chicken and mushrooms with salt and pepper to taste.
14. Serve the chicken and mushrooms over cooked rice, garnished with Italian parsley if desired.

[/INST]

9f82ffde67.gt:
In a large saucepan, combine the water, shallots, garlic, thyme, peppercorns, kosher salt and oil.

Simmer the halibut gently over very low heat just until the fish flakes easily with a fork, about 10 minutes.
Spoon the mashed avocado onto 4 plates and top with the halibut.
Using a slotted spoon, mound the papaya slaw on the fish and serve right away.

f5d92fa57b.gt:
Heat the oven to 450 degrees F and arrange a rack in the middle.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Place apples in a large bowl with raisins.
Whisk together sugar, cornstarch, cinnamon, and salt in a small bowl until combined.
Sprinkle over apples and raisins and toss to evenly coat.
Arrange a sheet of phyllo on a large, flat surface with the shorter side toward you.
Brush with melted butter and arrange another sheet on top.
Repeat, alternating butter and phyllo, until there are 6 layers, then brush the top layer with butter.
Evenly arrange apple-raisin mixture on phyllo, leaving a 1-1/2-inch border at the top and sides.
Begin to roll the phyllo away from you, folding in the sides as you roll.
When youve rolled up the entire pastry, brush any exposed phyllo with butter.
Place the strudel seam side down on the prepared baking sheet, brush again with butter (you may have a little left over), and cut 4 (1-inch) diagonal slits into the top just through the phyllo.
Bake until golden brown, about 10 minutes.
Reduce the heat to 350 degrees F and bake until the apples are knife tender and the juices are bubbling, about 30 to 40 minutes more.
Let cool at least 10 minutes before slicing.
f5d92fa57b.pred:
To prepare a tasty apple pie, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the sliced apples with the raisins, granulated sugar, cornstarch, ground cinnamon, and kosher salt.
3. In a separate bowl, melt the butter over low heat.
4. Carefully pour the melted butter over the apple mixture, stirring to coat the apples evenly.
5. Spread the apple mixture evenly over the bottom of a 9-inch (23cm) pie dish.
6. Roll out the phyllo sheets on a lightly floured surface, using a rolling pin if needed, until they are large enough to cover the pie dish.
7. Carefully place the phyllo sheets over the apple mixture, pressing down gently to help them adhere to the apples.
8. Dot the top of the phyllo with the remaining butter.
9. Bake the pie in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the apples are tender.
10. Allow the pie to cool completely before serving.

[/INST]

In the image, we see a pie with a golden crust and a tasty apple filling. The pie is ready to be served and enjoyed by those who love a delicious apple dessert.

0062ecba72.gt:
COMBINE flour, baking soda and salt in small bowl.
Beat butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar and vanilla in large mixer bowl.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition; gradually beat in flour mixture.
Stir in morsels and nuts.
Drop by rounded tablespoon onto ungreased baking sheets.
BAKE in preheated 375-degree [Fahrenheit] oven for 9 to 11 minutes or until golden brown.
Let stand for 2 minutes; remove to wire racks to cool completely.
PAN COOKIE VARIATION: PREPARE dough as above.
Spread into greased 15"x10" jelly-roll pan.
Bake in preheated 375-degree [Fahrenheit] oven for 20 to 25 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool in pan on wire rack.
FOR HIGH ALTITUDE BAKING (>5,200 feet): INCREASE flour to 2 1/2 cups; add 2 teaspoonfuls water with flour; reduce both granulated sugar and brown sugar to 2/3 cup each.
Bake at 375 degrees Fahrenheit, drop cookies for 8 to 10 minutes and pan cookies for 17 to 19 minutes.
0062ecba72.pred:

5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, alternating with the granulated sugar and beating well after each addition.

7. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.

9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

13a6ba0924.gt:
In a medium-sized pot, place dessicated coconut and water.
Mix and allow to soak for 1/2 an hour.
After 1/2 an hour, turn heat onto low and bring to a gentle simmer.
Simmer, covered, for 10 minutes.
Turn off heat and leave pot on element for 1/2 an hour.
After 1/2 an hour, transfer coconut mixture to blender or processor and process for 45 seconds.
Put a large sieve over a bowl and empty coconut mixture into it.
Press down hard on coconut solids with the back of a spoon to remove as much coconut milk as possible.
This method produces approximately 2 cups of coconut milk.
Can be made up to 2 days before use in a recipe and refrigerated, covered.
The milk will separate in the fridge, forming a creamy fat layer on top, and a thinner liquid layer underneath.
Not to worry, the fat layer will melt into the liquid when heated and form a lovely milk.
13a6ba0924.pred:
To create a delicious and nutritious coconut-based dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot or saucepan, combine 8 ounces of desiccated coconut with 3 cups of water.
2. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
3. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the coconut is tender and the liquid has been absorbed.
4. Remove the pot from the heat and let it cool slightly.
5. In a separate bowl, mix 1 cup of coconut milk, 1/2 cup of sugar, and 1/2 teaspoon of vanilla extract.
6. Pour the coconut milk mixture into the coconut-water mixture and stir well.
7. Return the pot to the stove and heat the mixture over medium heat, stirring constantly, until it reaches a simmer.
8. Cook for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the mixture thickens slightly.
9. Remove the pot from the heat and let it cool slightly.
10. Pour the coconut mixture into individual serving bowls and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or until it has cooled and set.
11. Serve the coconut-based dish chilled or at room temperature, garnished with a sprinkle of toasted coconut flakes or a drizzle of chocolate sauce, if desired.

This coconut-based dish is a delicious and nutritious treat, perfect for a hot summer day or as a refreshing dessert. The combination of tender coconut, creamy coconut milk, and sweet vanilla extract creates a delightful and satisfying taste experience.

ee28b1bd5a.gt:
Over medium high heat saute the onions stirring frequently (5min).
Add the tomato paste and keep stirring (5min).
Next add the berbere and cook for 5 minutes adding a little bit of water when the bottom of the pot starts catching.
Keep stirring.
Add the rinsed lentils and cook together for an additional 5 minutes (continue to stir adding a bit of water so that the mixture doesn't burn).
Add about 5 cups of water and bring to a boil.
Occasionally stir.
Once the water reduces and lentils have thickened add the ground coriander, garlic and salt.
Reduce heat and leave for about 5 minutes.
Serve with injera.

3. Add the finely chopped red onion and halved garlic clove to the pot. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. In a small bowl, mix the coriander, salt, and 8 cups of water. Pour the mixture into the pot with the lentils and onions.
5. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 25-30 minutes, or until the lentils are tender and the sauce has thickened.
6. Serve the cooked lentils over injera bread.

[/INSTRUCTIONS]

55a63594d1.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F.
In a large bowl, combine 1/4 cup cheese, milk, egg, cumin, red pepper, corn muffin mix, corn, and green chilies; stir until moist.
Pour into a 9 x 13 baking dish coated with cooking spray.
Bake for 15 minutes.
Pierce surface liberally with a fork.
Pour enchilada sauce over the top.
Top with chicken and remaining 3/4 cup cheese.

Let stand for 5 minutes before cutting.
Serve with a dollop of sour cream on top.
Delicious!

ea9ea44d2f.gt:
Place the cucumber, celery, garbanzo beans, carrots, raisins, and mint in a large bowl, and toss with the olive oil and red wine vinegar to coat.

1b5ad8b724.gt:
Cut cauliflower into florets.
Add them to the food processor and process until finely ground.
Dice one tomato and slice another tomato for garnishing.
In a large bowl, place the processed cauliflower, diced tomato, green onion, and garbanzo beans and mix.
Add 1/2 cup pesto and mix.
Taste and add more pesto if needed.
Season with black pepper.
Arrange the salad on a plate with tomato slices.
Infuse love and serve!

2. Rinse the cauliflower and cut it into florets.
3. In a large bowl, combine the cauliflower florets, chopped green onions, and drained garbanzo beans.
4. In a small bowl, mix the pesto sauce with black pepper.
5. Pour the pesto sauce mixture over the cauliflower and garbanzo beans, tossing to coat evenly.
6. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish, making sure to evenly distribute the ingredients.
7. Roast the cauliflower and garbanzo beans in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly browned.
8. Serve the cooked cauliflower and garbanzo beans immediately, or let them cool slightly before serving.

a777a9be09.gt:
In a wide mouth 1 quart jar, layer the barley, peas, rice and lentils.
Then layer around the edges the onion, parsley, salt, lemon pepper, bouillon and the alphabet pasta.
Fill the rest of the jar with the twist macaroni.
Seal and attach a gift card.
The gift card should read: Add contents of jar to 3 quarts of water, 2 stalks of chopped celery, 2 sliced carrots, 1 cup of shredded cabbage (optional) and 2 cups diced tomatoes.
Over medium low heat, cover and simmer about 1 hour, or until vegetables are tender.
a777a9be09.pred:
To prepare a perfect Food using the ingredients provided, follow these key steps:

1. Rinse the barley, dried split peas, uncooked white rice, and dry lentils thoroughly under cold running water.
2. In a large pot, combine the rinsed barley, dried split peas, uncooked white rice, and dry lentils.
3. Add 4 cups of water to the pot, and bring the mixture to a boil.
4. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for about 45 minutes or until the grains are tender and the liquid has been absorbed.
5. While the grains are cooking, prepare the pasta according to the package instructions.
6. Once the grains are cooked, remove the pot from the heat and let it sit, covered, for about 5 minutes.
7. Fluff the cooked grains with a fork, and set aside.
8. In a separate pot, bring the uncooked alphabet pasta and twist macaroni to a boil in a large pot of salted water.
9. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until it is al dente.
10. Drain the pasta, and return it to the pot.
11. Add the cooked grains to the pot with the pasta, and stir to combine.
12. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
13. Serve the Food hot, and enjoy!

By following these key steps, you will have successfully prepared a delicious and nutritious meal using the provided ingredients.

a89cd4ec7b.gt:
Sprinkle all ingredients over 2 full slabs of pork/ribs
Light your grill and let coals cool to about 300F as to not over seer meat and fortify optimal flavor for an good medium paced cook
When ribs are 20 mins from finished brush both sides of ribs and continue to cook until finished (BBQ sauce should not be messy) BBQ sauce added to enhance flavor not overwhelm ribs
a89cd4ec7b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the onion powder, garlic powder, seasoned salt, and Italian dressing.
3. Place the Food in a baking dish and pour the mixture over the top.
4. Bake the Food in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until it is cooked through and the seasoning is evenly distributed.
5. Remove the Food from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

This cooking procedure ensures that the Food is evenly seasoned and cooked to perfection, with the onion powder, garlic powder, seasoned salt, and Italian dressing working together to create a delicious and flavorful dish.

f140cdb94b.gt:
In a saucepan over medium heat, combine sugar and water.
Cook, stirring frequently, until sugar is dissolved.
Stir in vanilla and almond extract.
Cool, and refrigerate.
To serve: In a punch bowl with ice, mix 1 cup syrup with 2 liters ginger ale or lemon-lime soda.

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, water, and clear imitation vanilla extract.
3. Add the almond extract and mix well.
4. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the edges are set and the center is slightly jiggly.
6. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Using a spatula, carefully transfer the mixture to a large mixing bowl.

The essential ingredients, such as the 5 cups of white sugar, 2 cups of water, 2 tablespoons of clear imitation vanilla extract, and 2 tablespoons of almond extract, work together to create a moist, flavorful, and visually appealing cake.

eee6e2952e.gt:
In a bowl, toss the beef with 1/2 tablespoon of vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon of garlic, 2 teaspoons of sugar and the fish sauce; season with pepper.
Let stand.
In a bowl, toss the onion and vinegar.
In another bowl, mix the soy sauce with the olive oil and remaining 1/2 teaspoon of sugar.
Season with salt and pepper.
In a wok, heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil over high heat until smoking.
Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of garlic and 1/4 teaspoon of salt; cook until golden, about 30 seconds.
Add half of the meat and cook for 3 minutes without stirring; turn and cook 1 minute longer.
Transfer to a plate; cook the second batch.
Return the meat to the wok and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
On a large platter, toss the pea shoots with the onion and the soy dressing.
Spoon the beef on top and serve.

3. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
4. Add the sugar, Asian fish sauce, and freshly ground pepper. Cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
5. Add the baby pea shoots and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
6. Add the white wine vinegar and soy sauce, stirring to combine.
7. Cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly, until the liquid has evaporated.
8. Remove the dish from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Serve the dish immediately, garnished with the remaining baby pea shoots.

[/INST]

9a8b0b4825.gt:
Beat eggs and sugar, and zest together in a medium bowl.
Sift in the flour, melted butter, baking powder and lemon zest.
Stir to combine.
Preheat oven to 180AC (360AF).
Lightly grease a 23-cm (9-in) tart pan with rimovable base.
Divide the pastry into two by putting the first half into the pan.
Pour-in over the mixture half of green apples.
Pour then the other half of the mixture and cover again with the remaining apples.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, until the center is fine to touch and a shewer comes out clean when tested.
Leave the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before turning out into a rack to cool completely.
Serve, share and enjoy!

1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, sugar, and butter until well combined.
3. Add the cake flour, baking powder, and lemon zest to the bowl, and mix until the ingredients are well combined.
4. Gently fold in the sliced green apples.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch round cake pan.
6. Bake the cake in the preheated oven for about 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious green apple cake!

c089da7346.gt:
In a food processor or blender, blend berries and sugar until completely pureed, about 5 minutes.
Scrape mixture into a 9 -x-9" loaf pan and freeze until solid, at least 4 hours.

34e60e4215.gt:
Whisk first 5 ingredients in bowl to blend.
(Can be made 1 day ahead.
Chill.
Bring to room temperature and rewhisk before using.)
Cut off peel and white pith from oranges.
Cut oranges into 1/4- to 1/2-inch-thick rounds.
Cut each round into quarters.
Transfer orange pieces to large bowl.
Add remaining ingredients and toss to combine.
Toss salad with enough dressing to coat and serve.
34e60e4215.pred:

2. In a large bowl, whisk together the extra-virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, thawed frozen orange juice concentrate, coarse salt, and ground black pepper.
3. Cut the oranges into segments, removing the seeds and membranes. Add the oranges to the bowl with the dressing, and toss to coat evenly.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the arugula, pomegranate seeds or dried cranberries, and soft fresh goat cheese.
5. Add the red onion to the bowl with the dressing, and toss to combine.
6. Transfer the salad to a baking sheet, and spread it evenly.
7. Roast the salad in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the dressing is slightly caramelized.
8. Remove the salad from the oven, and let it cool slightly.
9. Serve the salad immediately, and enjoy!

This recipe combines a variety of ingredients to create a delicious and healthy salad. The extra-virgin olive oil provides a rich, flavorful base, while the fresh lemon juice adds a bright, tangy taste. The orange juice concentrate adds a touch of sweetness, and the coarse salt and ground black pepper provide a balance of flavors. The oranges, arugula, pomegranate seeds, and goat cheese add a mix of textures and flavors, while the red onion provides a crunchy contrast. The result is a satisfying and nutritious salad that is perfect for a light meal or a side dish.

e621c384f2.gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment.
Unfold pastry and cut into 4 equal squares.
2.
Spread 1 teaspoon mustard on each pastry square, leaving 1/4 inch border.
Layer 1 slice turkey, 1 slice Swiss, and 1 slice ham in the center of each square.
Whisk egg with 1 tablespoon water; brush onto edges of the square.
Fold squares to form triangles and crimp edges to seal.
Place on a baking sheet and brush with remaining egg mixture.
3.
Bake pastries for 25 minutes or until golden.
Dust with sugar and serve with preserves on the side.

10. Carefully transfer the pastry shapes to a serving plate.
11. Drizzle the warm raspberry preserves over the pastry shapes, creating a delicious glaze.

This delightful Food combines the flavors of smoked turkey, Swiss cheese, ham, and raspberry preserves, creating a delicious and visually appealing dish that is perfect for a special occasion or a simple yet satisfying meal.

2a96229516.gt:
Brown sausage in a skillet over med.
heat.
Drain fat and transfer to crockpot.
Combine remaining ingredients in crockpot.
Cover and cook on low 8 hrs.
or on high 4 hrs.
Remove bay leaves.
Serve over cooked rice.

Prepare coffee T DISC in mug or large heatproof glass.
Add brown sugar and light cream; stir.

Add cinnamon stick.

Add Angostura bitters to a chilled old-fashioned glass and swirl to coat glass; pour off excess.

Brown the chorizo and ground meat.
Add cumin, salt, ketchup, and garlic.
Beat the eggs add 2 tablespoonfuls of water as you beat them
In another pan add your beaten eggs fry, and roll the pan a bit.
add water and steam with lid on this is to toughen the egg a bit and to get eggs done.

c382163c5c.gt:

0bb9567cbe.gt:

Separate each biscuit into 3 pieces.

Grease and flour a standard loaf pan.

Combine first 7 ingredients in bowl of food processor and pulse a few times to mix.

4. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and then add them to the dry ingredients, mixing until the dough comes together.
5. Gradually add the pumpkin puree to the dough, mixing until the dough is moist and well combined.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

This delightful Food is a moist and delicious pumpkin cake, perfect for a cozy fall or winter day. The combination of spices and the natural sweetness of the pumpkin puree make it a delightful treat for both children and adults alike.

524529d38b.gt:
Add ingredients (except for cornmeal) to machine bread pan in order as per manufacturer's instructions.
Set to "Dough" cycle.
Lightly grease one 9 x 13-inch pan and sprinkle with cornmeal.
When the dough cycle is complete, roll out dough and place in pan.
Let rest in pans for 10-15 minutes.
Add toppings of your choice.
Bake at 350F until done (approximately 20 minutes, depending on the thickness of toppings).
I make the pizza in 9x13 rectangular pans rather than the round pizza pans, because the squares pieces are easier to reheat and pack in school lunches.
524529d38b.pred:
To cook a delightful Food, follow these steps:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 13 cups of water, 2 teaspoons of sugar, 14 teaspoons of salt, 2 tablespoons of olive oil, 2 tablespoons of cornmeal, 3 cups of unbleached all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon of baking powder, 14 teaspoons of garlic powder, 14 teaspoons of onion powder, and 12 teaspoons of msg (Accent*).
2. Add 1 12 teaspoons of bread machine yeast to the mixture.
3. Mix the ingredients together until well combined.
4. Cover the bowl with a clean cloth or plastic wrap, and let the mixture sit in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
5. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
6. After the mixture has doubled in size, punch it down and transfer it to a lightly greased baking sheet or a loaf pan.
7. Bake the Food in the preheated oven for about 30-35 minutes, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 190°F (88°C).
8. Remove the Food from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

This delightful Food is a delicious and easy-to-make bread, perfect for a warm and satisfying meal. The combination of ingredients, such as water, sugar, salt, olive oil, cornmeal, flour, baking powder, garlic powder, onion powder, and msg, creates a flavorful and moist loaf that is sure to be a hit.

9c6c383e4a.gt:
Boil the spaghetti for 15 minutes.
Boil the soy granules for 10 minutes.
Heat the oil in a heavy skillet.
Add the diced onions.
Saute for 2-3 minutes.
Add the tomatoes, soy granules, ground pepper, sea salt, paprika, red wine and dry basil.
Cook for 3 minutes then add the yeast flakes and stir.
Remove from heat.
Last but not least, add the minced garlic cloves (we dont want to heat the garlic too much).
Pour the Bolognese sauce over the spaghetti, garnish with fresh basil, and serve!
9c6c383e4a.pred:
To prepare a delicious and nutritious meal, follow these steps:

1. Gather the necessary ingredients: Spaghetti, Gluten Free, Soy Granules, Unrefined Sunflower Oil, Onions, Tomatoes, Ground Pepper, Sea Salt, Sweet Paprika, Red Wine (optional), Dry Basil, Dry Yeast Flakes, Garlic, and Fresh Basil.

2. Cook the Spaghetti according to the package instructions, usually boiling for 8-10 minutes until it reaches the desired tenderness.

3. In a large bowl, combine the cooked Spaghetti with the Soy Granules, Unrefined Sunflower Oil, and minced garlic. Mix well to ensure the Spaghetti is evenly coated with the sauce.

4. Add the diced onions and minced garlic to the bowl, and continue to mix until the onions are softened.

5. Add the chopped tomatoes, Ground Pepper, Sea Salt, and Sweet Paprika to the bowl. Stir to combine all the ingredients.

6. If using Red Wine, pour it into the bowl and stir to incorporate.

7. Add the Dry Basil and Dry Yeast Flakes to the bowl, and stir to combine.

8. Allow the mixture to sit for a few minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.

9. Taste the sauce and adjust the seasoning as needed.

10. Serve the Spaghetti with the sauce over it, garnished with fresh basil leaves for added flavor and presentation.

11. Enjoy your delicious and nutritious meal!

96d86ade02.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Spray baking dish with cooking spray.
Add chicken pieces and season with garlic powder and onion powder.
Cover with foil and bake for 45 minutes.
In a bowl, mix barbecue sauce, honey, ginger, and Worcestershire sauce.
Pour evenly over chicken and bake uncovered for 20-25 additional minutes or until sauce thickens and internal temperature is 180F.
96d86ade02.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the chicken pieces with the barbecue sauce, honey, ginger, Worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, and onion powder.
3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
4. Transfer the chicken mixture to the prepared baking sheet, ensuring that the pieces are evenly distributed.
5. Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for 1 hour or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into portions.
7. Serve the chicken with the barbecue sauce and any desired side dishes.

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a delicious and well-seasoned roasting chicken that will be a hit at your next gathering or meal.

97692d5fc3.gt:
Spread tortilla with dressing and mustard; top with remaining ingredients.
Fold in opposite sides of tortilla, then roll up from one end, leaving top end open.
Place on microwaveable plate.
Microwave on HIGH 1 min.
or until heated through.
97692d5fc3.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the MIRACLE WHIP Dressing, GREY POUPON Dijon Mustard, and leftover cooked ham. Set aside.
3. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the sliced cooked ham and cook until it is heated through and slightly browned.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the prepared STOVE TOP Stuffing Mix with the chopped tomatoes.
5. Spread the mixture evenly on the 10-inch flour tortilla.
6. Roll the tortilla around the filling, enclosing it completely.
7. Place the rolled tortilla in a baking dish and pour the ham and mustard mixture over the top.
8. Bake the enclosed tortilla in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the filling is hot and the tortilla is golden brown.
9. Serve the cooked tortilla immediately.

[/INST]

0c55421a39.gt:
Combine the ingredients in the order listed in a spill proof shaker and shake until thoroughly mixed.
Top wtih whipped cream and grated chocolate, if using.
Serve immediately.
0c55421a39.pred:
To craft a delicious and refreshing drink using the provided ingredients, follow these steps:

1. In a blender, combine 4 ounces of fluid Hazelnut Or Raspberry Syrup, 12 ounces of fluid Sparkling Water, and 1/4 cup of Crushed Ice. Blend until smooth and well-combined.

2. If desired, add 1/4 cups of Half-and-half to the blender to achieve a thicker consistency, or leave it as is for a thinner, more refreshing drink.

3. Optionally, add Whipped Cream For Topping to the blender to create a creamy, indulgent treat.

4. Optionally, sprinkle Grated Chocolate on top of the drink for an extra layer of flavor and texture.

5. Serve the crafted drink immediately, and enjoy the delicious, refreshing, and visually appealing beverage.

276686850b.gt:
Add 3 quarts water and olive oil to 6 quart pot.
Bring water to a boil.
Add noodles and boil 6 minutes.
No salt!
While noodles cook, pour cans of soup and Albacore into large mixing bowl and stir with a fork adding one soup can of water until it is smooth like gravy.
When noodles are done, drain them and rinse them with hot water.
Return cooked noodles to pan and add soup and tuna while stirring.
Pour tuna and noodle mixture into 9"x13" baking pan.
Sprinkle with pepper, garlic powder and spread both cheeses.
Add french fried onions evenly over the top of noodle mixture.
Cover with aluminum foil and bake in pre-heated 350 oven for 30 minutes.
Remove foil after baking for 30 minutes and increase oven temperature to 400 for 10 more minutes to brown onions and seal cheeses.
Cut into large squares and serve while hot.
276686850b.pred:
1. Cook the noodles according to the package instructions.
2. Drain the canned tuna and flake it with a fork.
3. In a large saucepan, combine the cream of mushroom soup, tuna, and the grated cheeses.
4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes.
5. Add the French fried onions and stir to combine.
6. Season the mixture with the ground black pepper and garlic powder.
7. Cook for an additional 2 minutes or until the cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth.
8. Serve the tuna noodle casserole hot.

8582739828.gt:
Whisk together 2/3 cup broth, soy sauce, brown sugar, ketchup, ginger, garlic, and vinegar and pour into a large sealable plastic bag.
Add tenderloin and seal bag, then marinate, chilled, turning bag over occasionally, 2 hours.
Bring tenderloin to room temperature, about 1 hour.
Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 425F.
Pat tenderloin dry and reserve marinade.
Heat oil in a 12-inch ovenproof skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then brown tenderloin on all sides, turning with tongs, about 3 minutes total.
Transfer skillet to oven and roast pork until thermometer inserted diagonally into center of meat registers 155F, 12 to 15 minutes.
Transfer to a cutting board and let stand, loosely covered with foil, 10 minutes.
While meat is roasting, pour marinade through a fine-mesh sieve into a small saucepan and boil until reduced to about 1/3 cup, 10 to 15 minutes.
Stir in remaining cup broth and bring sauce to a simmer.
Serve slices of tenderloin with sauce.
8582739828.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the pork tenderloin with salt and pepper.
3. In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, brown sugar, and ketchup or tomato paste.
4. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the minced garlic and ginger, and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
5. Add the pork tenderloin to the skillet, and cook for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C) for medium-rare.
6. Remove the pork from the skillet and let it rest for 5 minutes.
7. While the pork is resting, add the vinegar to the skillet and stir to combine.
8. Slice the pork into thin strips.
9. In a large bowl, combine the chicken broth, soy sauce mixture, and minced garlic and ginger.
10. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through.
11. Add the pork strips to the sauce and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until heated through.
12. Serve the pork and sauce over rice or noodles.

[/INST]

12fdd3534c.gt:
Preheat oven to 180 degrees.
Place in a saucepan the sugar, mashed banana, bi-carb soda, milk and margarine/butter.
Stir until it is a caramel colour.
Cool mixture.
When mixture is cool, add the eggs and flour.
Mix until combined.
Place into a greased cake/loaf tin.
Bake in the oven for approx 25-30 mins or until a skewer comes out clean when inserted.
Top with your favourite Cream Cheese Icing when cooled.
12fdd3534c.pred:
To create a delicious and satisfying dessert, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, mashed banana, and bicarbonate of soda. Mix well.
3. Gradually add the milk to the mixture, stirring continuously.
4. Add the margarine or butter, and continue to mix until smooth.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs until they are light and fluffy.
6. Gradually add the eggs to the banana mixture, stirring gently to combine.
7. Gradually add the self-raising flour, stirring until the batter is smooth and free of lumps.
8. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
9. Bake the cake in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
10. Remove the cake from the oven and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes. Then, transfer the cake to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade dessert!

b7bd1b9a99.gt:
Combine 1 cup broth and butter in small saucepan.
Bring to boil over high heat.
Continue to boil until liquid is reduced to 1/4 cup and has a syrupy consistency, about 15-20 minutes.
Stir in cream.
Set aside.
Bring remaining 12 cups broth to a boil in Dutch oven.
Add egg noodles and celery; cook until noodles are tender.
Stir in reserved cream mixture; add chicken.
Season to taste with salt and pepper, add parsley.
Heat just to serving temperature.
Do not boil.
b7bd1b9a99.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
To create a delicious and comforting chicken and vegetable soup, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot, combine 13 cups of chicken broth, divided, and 4 tablespoons of butter. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat.
2. Add 1 cup of whipping cream, and stir until it is fully incorporated.
3. In a separate pot, cook 1 (12 ounce) package of egg noodles according to the package instructions. Drain the noodles and set aside.
4. In the large pot, add 2 stalks of celery, thinly sliced, and 34 cups of baby carrots, sliced. Cook the vegetables until they are tender but still slightly crisp.
5. Add 2 cups of diced cooked chicken, and stir to combine.
6. Season the soup with 1 teaspoon of poultry seasoning, 1 teaspoon of parsley, salt, and pepper, to taste.
7. Reduce the heat to low, and let the soup simmer for about 10-15 minutes, or until the flavors have melded together.
8. Serve the soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of parsley, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious and comforting chicken and vegetable soup!
<</SYS>>

bc714d6f9c.gt:
Heat oil in medium saucepan over medium-high heat.
Add onion; cook 2 to 3 minutes or until tender, stirring occasionally.
Add rice; cook 1 to 2 minutes more or until rice is browned lightly, stirring frequently.
Add broth, drained tomatoes, chili powder and cumin to saucepan; stir to combine.
Bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes or until liquid is absorbed.
bc714d6f9c.pred:
[/SYS]

To prepare the dish, follow these steps:

1. Heat the Pure Wesson Canola Oil in a large saucepan or skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped yellow onion and cook until softened, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the uncooked rice to the saucepan and stir to combine.
4. Pour in the reduced-sodium chicken broth, and stir to combine.
5. Add the drained Ro*Tel Original Diced Tomatoes & Green Chilies, and stir to combine.
6. Add the chili powder and ground cumin, stirring to combine.
7. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the saucepan.
8. Simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid has been absorbed.
9. Remove the saucepan from the heat, and let it sit for a few minutes before serving.

This dish is a delicious and comforting meal that combines the flavors of the Pure Wesson Canola Oil, chili powder, and cumin with the soft, tender texture of the cooked rice. The addition of the Ro*Tel Original Diced Tomatoes & Green Chilies adds a tangy and spicy twist to the dish, making it a satisfying and enjoyable meal.

02b1542927.gt:
Preheat oven to 180C/160C fan forced.
line a baking tray with baking paper.
Place thighs on a work surface, open out and generously spread tapenade inside each.
Fold fillets back into shape.
Cut pastry sheets in half.
Place chicken at one end of the sheet fold edges in, fold pastry over chicken and roll to make a neat parcel.
Pinch sides to seal.
Place, seam-side down, on a prepared tray.
Brush with egg to glaze.
Sprinkle with basil.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and pastry is golden brown.
Serve with vegetables.
02b1542927.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chicken thigh fillets, basil and parmesan tapenade, and lightly beat the egg. Mix well to ensure that the chicken is evenly coated with the tapenade mixture.
3. Roll out the frozen butter puff pastry on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm). Cut out circles using a cookie cutter or a round object, and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
4. Place a spoonful of the chicken mixture in the center of each pastry circle.
5. Bake the pastries in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the pastry is golden brown and the chicken is cooked through.
6. Allow the pastries to cool for a few minutes before serving.
7. While the pastries are baking, steam the green and yellow vegetables until they are tender but still crisp.
8. Serve the pastries with the steamed vegetables on the side.

[/INST]

3c3d0872d0.gt:
FOR THE STEAK: In a large bowl, marinate sirloin steak in minced garlic, minced shallots, soy sauce, ginger, and the juice from the limes& lemons.
This should marinate for at least 2 hours in the refrigerator.
Over a high using a saute pan or cast iron pan, sear the sirloin on all sides until charred but not overcooked.
Place pan in a 400 degree oven until cooked.
Steak should be rare to medium rare.
Steak can be grilled also FOR THE GARNISH: In a small bowl, marinate red onions in rice vinegar, soy sauce, and the juice from the limes& lemons, then set aside.
Remove steak from refrigerator, slice very thin using a very sharp knife.
TO SERVE: On a flat plate or platter, spread out the marinated red onions evenly.
Layer sliced sirloin over the red onions.
Garnish with chopped green onions This should be served slightly chilled.
3c3d0872d0.pred:
To cook a delicious meal using the ingredients provided, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Season the sirloin steaks with salt and pepper, then place them on a baking sheet.
3. Roast the steaks in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until they reach your desired level of doneness (e.g., medium-rare).
4. Remove the steaks from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before slicing them thinly.
5. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and shallots, and cook until they are softened.
6. Add the sliced sirloin steaks to the skillet, and cook for a few minutes until they are heated through.
7. In a small bowl, mix the tamari soy sauce, ginger, and lime juice. Pour the sauce over the steaks in the skillet, and stir to combine.
8. Add the rice vinegar, lime juice, and minced green onions to the skillet. Cook for a few more minutes until the sauce has thickened and the flavors have melded together.
9. Serve the steaks over rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious meal.

Remember to use the appropriate utensils and tools, such as a spatula and a fork, to ensure a smooth cooking process and to serve the food in an aesthetically pleasing manner.

0fa7e0e5ac.gt:
In a large bowl, whip heavy whipping cream until firm peaks form.
Spoon into a separate bowl and set aside.
In the same bowl you just whipped the cream in, stir pumpkin, ricotta, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and vanilla together.
Scrape sides and whip 1 minute.
Carefully fold in whipped cream.
Spoon or pipe into sugar cones and top with chocolate chips and walnuts.
Serve.
0fa7e0e5ac.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Heavy Whipping Cream, Pureed Pumpkin, and Ricotta Cheese.
3. Add the Granulated Sugar, Cinnamon, Nutmeg, and Vanilla Extract to the mixture. Mix well.
4. Spread the mixture evenly into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is slightly wobbly.
6. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Sprinkle the Chopped Chocolate Chips and Chopped Walnuts evenly over the top of the cooled mixture.
8. Return the baking dish to the oven and bake for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the chocolate chips are melted and the mixture is set.
9. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool completely before cutting it into squares.

[/INST]

e81515ca45.gt:
Slice the chicken tenders diagonally into thin strips and season lightly with salt and pepper.
It's easiest to slice partially defrosted tenders.
Cut off both ends of the cucumbers and chop roughly into thin long pieces.
After 3 minutes, when the sauce thickens from the katakuriko coated on the chicken like the photo, it's done.
Heat 1 tablespoon of sesame oil in a pan over medium heat, and add the chicken tenders.
Spread out the pieces and fry.
Lightly fry both sides, add the cucumbers and stir fry for about 1 minute.
Turn up the heat to high, and add the ingredients listed under [A] (water or soup stock, vinegar, sugar, ketchup, tonkatsu sauce and salt).
Stir fry for 3 minutes while shaking the pan, being careful not to let the sauce burn.
After 3 minutes, when the sauce thickens from the katakuriko coated on the chicken like the photo above, it's done.
Doesn't it look delicious?
e81515ca45.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
2. In a small bowl, mix the Katakuriko, sugar, and salt.
3. In a large bowl, mix the chicken tenders, cucumbers, and the Katakuriko mixture.
4. Add the water or Chinese soup, vinegar, and ketchup to the bowl.
5. Mix well and set aside for 10 minutes.
6. Heat a frying pan or oven-safe skillet over medium heat.
7. Add the chicken and cucumber mixture to the pan or skillet, and cook for about 10 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the cucumbers are tender.
8. Transfer the cooked chicken and cucumbers to a serving dish.
9. Serve the chicken and cucumber mixture over rice or noodles.

[/INST]

2f161399c5.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook and stir sausage in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.
Stir in cream cheese.
Unroll crescent dough and separate into individual pieces; spoon 2 to 3 teaspoons sausage mixture onto each piece of dough.
Roll dough around filling.
Brush each crescent roll with egg white.
Arrange crescent rolls on a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven until rolls are lightly browned, about 15 minutes.
2f161399c5.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the sausage, cream cheese, and egg white. Mix until well combined.
3. Roll out the crescent rolls on a lightly floured surface to a large rectangle.
4. Spread the sausage and cream cheese mixture evenly over the crescent rolls, leaving a small border around the edges.
5. Roll the crescent rolls up, starting from the long side, and press the edges to seal.
6. Place the filled crescent rolls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until the crescent rolls are golden brown.
8. Serve warm.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

73d085e33c.gt:
Preheat a panini grill.
Slice each quarter of focaccia bread in half horizontally.
Spread each half with pesto.
Layer bottom halves with equal amounts chicken, bell pepper, onion, and cheese.
Top with remaining focaccia halves, forming 4 sandwiches.
Grill paninis 5 minutes in the preheated grill, or until focaccia bread is golden brown and cheese is melted.
73d085e33c.pred:
To craft a delicious and satisfying Food using the provided ingredients, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Lightly grease a baking sheet or a pizza stone with some oil.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the focaccia bread, prepared basil pesto, and Monterey Jack cheese. Mix until the bread is evenly coated with the pesto and cheese.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the cooked chicken, green bell pepper, and red onion.
5. Add the chicken mixture to the bread mixture, stirring gently to combine.
6. Pour the mixture onto the prepared baking sheet or pizza stone.
7. Bake the Food in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove the Food from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing it into portions.

Enjoy your delicious and satisfying Food!

0787add592.gt:
Fry the egg and season with salt and pepper.
Add all other ingredients to a bowl and top with warm egg.
Drizzle with balsamic syrup.
0787add592.pred:
1. In a medium saucepan, bring 1 cup of cooked quinoa to a boil.
2. Add 1 bunch of fresh basil, sliced, and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
3. In a separate bowl, mash 1/2 of a whole avocado.
4. Crack 1 whole egg into the bowl with the mashed avocado.
5. Add 1/2 cups of grape tomatoes to the bowl.
6. Drizzle 1 tablespoon of balsamic vinegar over the mixture.
7. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Cook the quinoa mixture for 3 minutes, or until the egg is cooked through.
9. Serve the dish immediately.

This delicious and healthy meal is perfect for a quick and satisfying lunch or dinner. The combination of quinoa, avocado, egg, and tomatoes creates a well-balanced and flavorful dish that is both nutritious and satisfying. The balsamic drizzle adds a touch of tanginess and depth to the overall taste, making it a delightful and refreshing meal.

84afda0ee0.gt:
Boil egg noodles with a pinch of salt until cooked.
Add half of the soy sauce and allow to sit
(While noodles are boiling) Cut Chicken Breast into strips
Cut all vegetables to your liking.
Heat Vegetable Oil in a deep pan and add chicken, garlic, salt and pepper.
Fry until cooked
Add vegetables and cook until cooked
Add Cooked Egg Noodles and the rest of the soy sauce plus lemon.
(I like to add a table spoon of sweet chilli sauce aswell)
Serve and Enjoy :)))
84afda0ee0.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the chicken breasts into bite-sized pieces.
3. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the onion and bell peppers, and cook until they are tender.
4. Add the garlic and ginger, and cook for a few more minutes.
5. Add the mushrooms, soy sauce, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Cook until the mushrooms are tender.
6. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg noodles with a fork until they are well combined.
7. Combine the cooked chicken, mushroom mixture, and egg noodles in a large mixing bowl.
8. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish, and bake for 20-25 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the noodles are tender.
10. Serve the cooked dish hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

[/INST]

9001c0cfc6.gt:
FRIED POUNDED PASTE FOR BASE
in pan with oil saute pounded paste till fragrant and lightly but not burn then drain excess oil
MAKE THAI CURRY NOODLE
in pan with 1 tbsp of oil saute thai red curry paste for half minute then add fried pounded paste with water and bring to a boil
put flat udon noodle and simmer for 13 minutes and add dash of fish sauce or light soy sauce then stir often to prevent burn bottom and sauce start thickening
add tomato and off heat
serve thai curry udon noodle with eggs
9001c0cfc6.pred:
1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Wash and peel the egg, tomato, and shallot.
- Cut the egg into small pieces.
- Cut the tomato into small pieces.
- Crush the garlic and pound the shallot.
- Pound the dried prawn.

2. Prepare the sauce:
- Mix the brown sugar and fish sauce or light soy sauce in a small bowl.
- Add the thai red curry paste to the bowl and mix well.

3. Prepare the dish:
- In a large pot, combine the water, curry paste, and garlic.
- Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for 5-10 minutes.
- Add the egg, tomato, and dried prawn to the pot.
- Simmer the dish for 5-10 minutes or until the egg is cooked through.
- Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste.

4. Serve the dish:
- Serve the dish over rice or noodles, garnished with chopped green onions.

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a delicious and nutritious dish of udon noodle with egg, tomato, and dried prawn, using the natural language assistant to guide you through the process.

ce8b9b020c.gt:
Preheat oven to Grill/Broil.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium high heat.
Add chicken and garlic and saute until chicken juices run clear, about 7 to 10 minutes.
Drain fat from skillet and stir in sauce.
Place chicken mixture on a cookie sheet and broil in the preheated oven for about 10 minutes, or until browned.
Let sit about 5 minutes to allow sauce to thicken.
ce8b9b020c.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the cubed chicken breast halves, minced garlic, and oil. Mix well to ensure the chicken is evenly coated with the garlic and oil.
3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Spread the chicken mixture evenly on the prepared baking sheet.
4. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until it is cooked through and reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).

Double or triple recipe as needed.

Don't tell anybody how easy this sauce is.

f7b38ff708.gt:

Bake at 350 for 10 to 15 minutes or until lightly browned.

1. In a large skillet or pot, heat the canola oil over medium heat. Add the chicken pieces and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.

2. Add the onion to the skillet and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes. Add the garlic and cook for another minute.

3. Add the tomatillos, jalapeno, and green chilies to the skillet. Cook for about 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender.

4. Add the cumin, coriander, and chicken broth to the skillet. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.

5. Add the cooked chicken back to the skillet and stir to combine.

6. If desired, top the dish with shredded cheddar cheese.

7. Serve the dish over rice or with tortillas, as desired.

[/INST]

This dish is a delicious and flavorful combination of chicken, tomatillos, jalapeno, and green chilies, with a rich and slightly spicy sauce. The combination of ingredients creates a satisfying and hearty meal that can be enjoyed with rice or tortillas.

8e653646ce.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 and line a cookie tray with grease proof paper.
Grate cheese, dice onions and slice ham.
Cover pastry with sauce, cheese, onions and ham.
Roll pastry (like a swiss roll) and cut into 12 rolls.
Place on tray.
Cook 10-20 minutes.
8e653646ce.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Roll out the puff pastry on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
3. Spread the pizza sauce or tomato paste evenly over the pastry, leaving a small border around the edges.
4. Add the ham or salami slices on top of the sauce, leaving a small border around the edges.
5. Top the ham or salami with the onion slices.
6. Sprinkle the cheese evenly over the onions.
7. Fold the pastry over the filling, pressing the edges to seal the filling inside.
8. Place the filled pastry on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the pastry for 20-25 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
10. Remove the pastry from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing it into wedges and serving.

[/INST]

The recipe involves rolling out the puff pastry, spreading the pizza sauce or tomato paste, adding the ham or salami, onion slices, and cheese, and finally baking the pastry. The final product is a warm, flavorful, and visually appealing meal that can be enjoyed with family or friends.

3d70024e0a.gt:
Combine pancake mix, cinnamon and nutmeg in a bowl.
Add water and pumpkin mix and stir until smooth (add more water as necessary to make thinner pancakes).
Add raisins and stir (If you are making pumpkin faces, place raisins on moist batter as soon as you pour your batter on the griddle).
Spray griddle lightly with cooking spray.
Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake onto hot griddle
Turn pancakes when edges are cooked and small bubbles start to form.
Turn only once.

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the pancake mix, water, and spices (cinnamon, nutmeg, and raisins). Mix until well combined.
3. Grease a baking sheet or a large, nonstick skillet with nonstick cooking spray.
4. Pour the batter onto the prepared baking sheet or skillet.
5. Cook the pancakes in the preheated oven for about 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
6. Remove the pancakes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

2b4cfb961c.gt:
Put all the ingredient in a slow cooker and mix thoroughly.
Cover and cook on high until apples are tender, about 3 hours.
The yummy salted-cinnamon-vanilla-caramel sauce that coats the apples will thicken slightly upon cooling.
Cook uncovered for a thicker sauce.
My conversion to feed a crowd of 40: I quadrupled the recipe and cooked it in my 18-quart electric roaster set to 300 degrees F for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally.
I used a mix of apples: galas, golden delicious, golden supreme, and Nittany.
Any apple that keeps its shape during baking will work well.
2b4cfb961c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the diced peeled baking apples, dark brown sugar, melted butter, ground cinnamon, kosher salt, and nutmeg. Mix well to ensure all ingredients are evenly distributed.
3. Add the vanilla extract and mix until well combined.
4. Transfer the mixture to a greased 9x9 inch baking dish or a similar-sized casserole dish.
5. Bake the apple mixture in the preheated oven for about 35-40 minutes, or until the apples are tender and the mixture is bubbly and golden brown.
6. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade apple dessert!

e3d298ee57.gt:
Put the chopped pepper in a silicone steamer and microwave for 30 seconds at 700w.
Add the sugar, sesame and soy sauce.
Mix it all and you are done!
e3d298ee57.pred:
1. First, wash the green pepper thoroughly and cut it into small, bite-sized pieces.
2. In a small bowl, mix the ground sesame seeds and sugar together.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the soy sauce and a small amount of water.
4. Heat a small amount of oil in a pan over medium heat.
5. Add the green pepper pieces to the pan and cook until they are tender but still crisp.
6. Pour the soy sauce mixture over the green pepper pieces in the pan, stirring to combine.
7. Cook for a few more minutes, until the sauce has thickened and the green pepper pieces are coated in the sauce.
8. Remove the pan from heat and let the dish cool for a few minutes.
9. Serve the mouthwatering Food immediately, garnished with a sprinkle of the sesame seeds and a drizzle of the soy sauce mixture.

010fbf4e3f.gt:
Shell (leave the tail on) the hrimp and devein.
Heat a skillet on medium heat.
Add butter and garlic.
When it starts to smell garlicky, add shrimp and stir until it turns pink.
Add zucchini, saute and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
When it's cooked, pour the soy sauce over.
Remove from the heat, and sprinkle with chives.
Squeeze over lemon juice if you like!
With rice!
it was Yummy~
010fbf4e3f.pred:

2. In a large bowl, combine the shrimp, minced garlic, soy sauce, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Mix well to ensure the shrimp are evenly coated with the sauce.

4d14636daa.gt:
Bake potatoes at 375 degrees F for 1 hour or until done.
When cool enough to handle, cut a thin slice off the top.
Scoop out pulp, leaving a thin shell.
In a medium size bowl, mix together milk, egg, potato, mayonnaise, and 1/2 cup of cheese, salt, and pepper.
Spoon into potato shells.
Top with remaining cheese and crumbled bacon.
Bake for 25 to 30 minutes, or until heated through.
4d14636daa.pred:
To cook a delightful Food, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes and cut them into equal-sized pieces.
3. Place the potatoes in a large mixing bowl and toss them with the beaten egg, milk, and mayonnaise.
4. Add the shredded cheddar cheese, salt, and pepper, and mix well.
5. Spread the mixture evenly in a baking dish.

a897ca5462.gt:
Pre-heat the oven to 350F.
Mix all the ingredients for the crust together and press into a pizza pan, about 14 inches round.
Bake for 8-10 minutes.
Meanwhile, make the topping by mixing the cream cheese, white sugar and vanilla together.
When the pizza crust is cool, spread the topping evenly over it.
Slice up your choice of fruits and lay them on top of the pizza.
Make the glaze by mixing the corn starch, juices and sugar together in a saucepan and heating over a medium heat until thick.
You may have to stir it occasionally.
Pour over the topped pizza.
Let sit for five minutes and serve.

8c03aee630.gt:
Whisk together lime zest and juice, butter, oil, sugar, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper in a large bowl.
Wash quinoa in 3 changes of cold water in a bowl, draining in a sieve each time.
Cook quinoa in a medium pot of boiling salted water (1 tablespoon salt for 2 quarts water), uncovered, until almost tender, about 10 minutes.
Drain in sieve, then set sieve in same pot with 1 inch of simmering water (water should not touch bottom of sieve).
Cover quinoa with a folded kitchen towel, then cover sieve with a lid (don't worry if lid doesn't fit tightly) and steam over medium heat until tender, fluffy, and dry, about 10 minutes.
Remove pot from heat and remove lid.
Let stand, still covered with towel, 5 minutes.
Add quinoa to dressing and toss until dressing is absorbed, then stir in remaining ingredients and salt and pepper to taste.
8c03aee630.pred:
To cook a delightful Food, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot, combine the grated lime zest, fresh lime juice, and melted and cooled butter. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the butter has melted and the mixture is hot.
2. Add the quinoa, black beans, and vegetable oil to the pot. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the quinoa is tender and the beans are heated through.
3. Add the chopped scallions, diced tomatoes, and chopped cilantro to the pot. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the flavors have melded together.
4. Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste. Serve the cooked Food immediately, and enjoy!

This delightful Food combines the tangy flavors of lime, the richness of butter, and the hearty texture of quinoa and black beans, creating a satisfying and flavorful dish.

163e13f061.gt:
Pre heat over @ 350-375 place cut up butter on the of the pan
Cut up the cauliflower and place in bowl add all ingredients and mix up .. Add any extra to taste
Place in pan and then in the oven for about 20-30 mins until its golden brown.. Stir once or twice to mix in the melted butter ..
Enjoy!
163e13f061.pred:

1 ms dash of original flavor (e.g., salt, pepper, or any other preferred seasoning)
2-3 dashes of adobo (a spicy sauce made from chili peppers, garlic, and vinegar)
1 tbsp of garlic powder
1 black pepper (as desired)
1 crushed pepper (optional)
1 cauliflower
1 stick of butter
1 tbsp of olive oil

First, start by preheating your oven to 400°F (200°C). Next, wash and chop the cauliflower into florets. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cauliflower, butter, and olive oil. Season the cauliflower with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and adobo. Mix well to ensure the ingredients are evenly distributed.

Add the crushed pepper, if desired, and mix again. Transfer the cauliflower mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cauliflower is tender and slightly browned.

After baking, remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes. Serve the cooked cauliflower immediately, or store it in the refrigerator for later use. Enjoy your delicious and flavorful cauliflower dish!

df3852f109.gt:
preheat the oven to 350F.
For the fruits: Dice the peaches and place in a large bowl.
Add the lemon zest, lemon juice, 1/2 sugar, and 1/4 flour.
Toss well.
Gently mix in the blueberries.
Allow the mixture to sit for 5 minutes.
Spoon mixture in a 8x11 baking dish.
For the crumble: combine 2 cups four, 2/3 cup sugar, 1/2 cup light brown sugar, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, and 2 sticks of salted butter in a bowl.
Mix the ingredients with an electric mixer.
Mix until the butter is the size of a peas.
Rub the mixture with your fingertips until it's in big crumbles, then sprinkle evenly over the fruit mixture.
bake for 45 to 60 minutes, until the tips are brown and crisp and the juices are bubbly.
Serve warm or room temperature.
