ff131d2047.gt:
Preheat oven to 425F.
Trim tips from asparagus, and chop stalks into 1/4-inch pieces.
Stir together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt in large bowl.
Cut butter into small pieces.
Using fingers, rub butter into flour mixture until mixture resembles coarse meal.
Stir in 3/4 cup buttermilk.
Fold in cheese, asparagus pieces (but not tips), cayenne and pepper.
Turn dough onto floured work surface, and knead 6 or 7 times.
Shape dough into 1/2-inch-thick rectangle.
Using sharp knife, cut rectangle lengthwise into three strips.
Cut each strip into triangles.
Place triangles on greased baking sheet.
Brush scones with remaining buttermilk, then press 2 or 3 asparagus tips into tops.
Bake 12 to 15 minutes, or until tops are golden brown.
ff131d2047.pred:
To cook a delightful Food, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the steamed asparagus, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, salt, and cayenne pepper. Mix well.
3. Add the margarine or shortening, buttermilk or soymilk, grated cheddar cheese or soy cheddar cheese, and black pepper to the bowl. Mix until the dough comes together.
4. Turn the dough onto a floured surface and knead it until it is smooth and elastic, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.5 cm).
6. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a knife.
7. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the cookies in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
9. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

These delightful cookies are perfect for enjoying with a cup of tea or coffee, or as a snack. The combination of the steamed asparagus, cheese, and spices creates a unique and delicious flavor that is sure to impress.

d9c04f21ab.gt:
Add the Bombay Sapphire, lemon juice and caster sugar to a short glass / tumbler and stir.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Drizzle the berry liqueur over the top and watch it 'marble' through the drink.
Top up with more crushed ice and garnish with 1 blackberry and a wedge of fresh lemon.
d9c04f21ab.pred:
1. First, pour the gin and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
2. Add the sugar and Chambord or creme de cassis to the shaker.
3. Shake the mixture well for about 15-20 seconds, until the ice is well-chilled and the ingredients are well-blended.
4. Strain the mixture into a glass filled with crushed ice.
5. Garnish the drink with a blackberry and a lemon wedge.
6. Enjoy your delicious Food!

a2917226da.gt:
Place the tofu on a heat-resistant dish (preferably a deep dish) and cut into 6 pieces.
Of course you don't need to cut it at all.
Top with kimchi.
Cut the pork into easy to eat pieces and place on top of the kimchi.
Lightly cover with plastic wrap and microwave at 500 W for 3 minutes.
Since the meat doesn't cook completely through very easily, turn the meat over after about 2 minutes.
Once the pork has cooked through, pour in the sesame oil, soy sauce, and optionally garnish with green onion to finish.
a2917226da.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a bowl, mix the firm tofu with the pork belly scraps, Napa cabbage kimchi, sesame oil, and soy sauce. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
4. Spread the tofu and pork mixture evenly on the prepared baking sheet.
5. Roast the tofu and pork mixture in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the tofu is golden brown and the pork is cooked through.
6. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Serve the tofu and pork mixture over rice or noodles, garnished with green onions if desired.

This recipe combines the flavors of tofu, pork, and Napa cabbage kimchi to create a delicious and satisfying meal. The tofu provides a protein-rich base, while the pork adds a savory element. The Napa cabbage kimchi adds a tangy and slightly spicy kick, and the sesame oil and soy sauce enhance the overall flavor profile. The green onions serve as a garnish, adding a pop of color and a touch of freshness to the dish.

aab95edcba.gt:
Pre heat oven to 160*C.
Peal and grated spuds.
Drain by pressing paper towel- as much water out as you can.
Add egg yolks, onion powder, paprika, garlic salt, oregano and pepper.
Mix and scoop onto cutlets to coat.
Shallow fry on med heat until golden brown both sides (2 or 3 mins a side) and finish in oven for 5 minutes.
Sea salt to taste- serve with lemon wedge, spicy sour cream and salad.
For cream, use some sour cream with horseradish - or Dijon.
Maybe some fresh chopped chives or parsley.. Whatever you like.
Bloody ripper of a dish.
Little bit of prep (I suggest you buy your lamb pre-frenched!)
but absolutely delicious.
Enjoy!
aab95edcba.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into evenly sized pieces.
3. In a large bowl, toss the potatoes with olive oil, onion powder, sweet paprika, dried oregano, garlic salt, and cracked black pepper.
4. Spread the potatoes evenly on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly crispy on the outside.
5. While the potatoes are cooking, prepare the lamb cutlets by pounding them to an even thickness. Season the cutlets with salt and pepper.
6. In a large skillet, heat the sunflower oil over medium-high heat. Add the lamb cutlets and cook until they are golden brown on both sides and cooked through, about 3-4 minutes per side.
7. Serve the roasted potatoes alongside the lamb cutlets, and garnish with lemon wedges and sea salt flakes to taste.
8. For a spicy sour cream dip, mix 1/4 cup sour cream with 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup hot sauce, and 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley.

Enjoy your delicious homemade meal!

723f2696fa.gt:
Preheat the broiler and position a rack 6 inches from the heat.
In a food processor, combine the ricotta with the 2 tablespoons of honey and puree until very smooth.
Arrange the figs cut side up on a rimmed baking sheet.
Dollop 2 teaspoons of the ricotta puree on each fig and lightly drizzle with honey.
Broil for about 2 minutes, until just browned in spots and the ricotta is barely melted; serve warm or at room temperature.
723f2696fa.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the ricotta, honey, and a pinch of salt. Mix until smooth and creamy.
3. Spread the mixture evenly over the bottom of a 9-inch (23cm) springform pan.
4. Arrange the fig halves in a single layer on top of the ricotta mixture.
5. Bake the cake for 45-50 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
6. Remove the cake from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Drizzle the remaining honey over the cake, if desired.
8. Serve the cake warm or at room temperature.

[/INST]

Ingredients:
- 1 cup fresh ricotta
- 2 tablespoons honey
- Salt (optional)
- 12 large Black Mission figs, halved
- Oven (350°F or 175°C)
- Springform pan
- Drizzling honey

[/INST]

The cooking guide provides step-by-step instructions for preparing the cake, including the necessary ingredients and equipment. The cake is a delicious and visually appealing dessert that can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

80aeb71b2a.gt:
Heat oil in 10-inch nonstick skillet over medium heat.
Cook tomatoes and garlic in oil 5 to 7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes are tender; reduce heat to low.
Stir in chives, basil, sour cream and mayonnaise.
Cook 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until sauce is hot.
Meanwhile, heat spaetzle as directed on package.
Add hot spaetzle to skillet; toss to coat with sauce.
80aeb71b2a.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sour cream, mayonnaise, and the chopped garlic.
3. Add the cooked spaetzle noodles to the bowl and mix well.
4. Add the chopped roma tomatoes, sliced plum, and the chopped chives to the bowl.
5. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the mixture is hot and bubbly.
7. Serve the dish immediately and enjoy!

c3f6522e48.gt:
Pour the rum and pineapple juice into a cocktail mixing cup, and stir to combine.
Gently pour the strawberry soda into the mixture, pouring down the side of the mixing cup to prevent the soda from going flat.
Slowly tilt the mixing cup back and forth a few times to mix; pour into cocktail glasses.
c3f6522e48.pred:
To craft a delicious and refreshing cocktail using these ingredients, follow these steps:

1. In a shaker filled with ice, combine 10 fluid ounces of coconut flavored rum, 6 fluid ounces of pineapple juice, and 16 fluid ounces of strawberry-flavored soda (such as Crush Strawberry).

2. Shake the mixture vigorously for about 10-15 seconds. This will help to chill the drink and properly combine the ingredients.

3. Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.

4. Garnish the cocktail with a slice of pineapple and a strawberry slice.

5. Enjoy your delicious and refreshing coconut-flavored pineapple strawberry cocktail!

This recipe combines the tropical flavors of coconut, pineapple, and strawberry, creating a delightful and refreshing cocktail that is perfect for a hot summer day or any occasion where you want to indulge in a tasty and fruity drink.

bac8cfe474.gt:
Microwave peanut butter and chocolate in large microwaveable bowl on HIGH 1-1/2 min.
; stir until chocolate is completely melted and mixture is well blended.
Add cereal; toss to evenly coat.
Spread into single layer on waxed paper-covered baking sheets; separate cereal pieces.
Cool completely.
Transfer cereal mixture to clean brown paper bag or large resealable plastic bag.
Add sugar; close bag.
Shake gently to evenly coat cereal mixture with sugar.
bac8cfe474.pred:

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the creamy peanut butter, powdered sugar, and melted butter. Mix well.
3. Add the oven-toasted rice cereal squares to the mixture, stirring gently to combine.
4. Press the mixture evenly into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.

6. Pour the chocolate mixture over the peanut butter mixture in the baking dish.
7. Bake the cake for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is slightly gooey.
8. Allow the cake to cool completely in the pan before cutting it into squares.

Enjoy your homemade Food!

df787a9219.gt:
Heat oil in a large cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat.
Add onions and saute until browned in spots, 3 to 5 minutes.
Add sweet potato and cook, stirring, until it starts to brown in spots, 5 to 7 minutes.
Stir in garlic, jalapeno, cumin and salt; saute until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add water and cook, scraping up any browned bits, until liquid is absorbed, 3 to 5 minutes.
Stir in corn and black beans and cook until heated through.
Stir in cilantro and season with salt and pepper.
Serve with lime wedges.
Good rolled in a tortilla with sour cream and cheddar cheese.

6fc30c421c.gt:
Place all the ingredients in a blender and blend until it becomes smooth and creamy.
If its too thick, dilute with water.
Infuse love and enjoy with any salads you can think of.

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the diced pear, macadamia nuts, and extra virgin olive oil.

1d1371bb0c.gt:
Use a large Korean pumpkin.
I used 1/2 this time, and it weighed about 500 g.
Wash the Korean pumpkin very well, cut into half and scoop out the seeds and pith cleanly with a spoon.
Slice about 5 mm thick without peeling.
Finely chop the garlic and green chili peppers.
If you touch the chili peppers with your bare hand, it will hurt as if you got burned, so I recommend wearing disposable gloves.
Put the sesame oil, garlic and green chili peppers in a frying pan and stir fry.
When the pan is very fragrant, add the sliced Korean pumpkin.
Stir fry well.
It will cook quite fast.
When the pumpkin slices are translucent, season with salt and pepper and Dashida.
Adjust the amount of Dashida to taste.
Done!
It's delicious when freshly made or chilled!
1d1371bb0c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cut the Korean pumpkin into bite-sized pieces and remove the seeds and membranes.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Korean pumpkin, sesame oil, hot green chili peppers, garlic, beef dashida, salt, and pepper. Mix well to ensure all ingredients are evenly distributed.
4. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 30-40 minutes, or until the pumpkin is tender and cooked through.
5. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

This recipe combines the flavors of Korean pumpkin, sesame oil, hot green chili peppers, garlic, beef dashida, salt, and pepper to create a delicious and satisfying dish. The combination of these ingredients results in a rich, flavorful, and satisfying meal that can be enjoyed by both vegetarians and meat-eaters alike.

c79defe8f0.gt:
Prepare the potatoes by cutting each into wedges lengthwise about 8 wedges for each potatoes.
Place in a bowl with ice cubes and add water to cover.
Place in fridge for at least 45 minutes.
Drain and pat with paper towels to dry.
Melt butter with minced garlic salt and pepper.
I usually use a cast iron skillet, but any oven-proof pan will do.
Pour butter over potatoes in skillet, the butter mixture will stick because the potatoes are so cold!
Bake in a 425 degree oven about 25 minutes.
Broasted!

4. Spread the potatoes out on a baking sheet or a large roasting pan.
5. Dot the potatoes with the butter, then use an ice cube to create a criss-cross pattern on the potatoes.
6. Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until they are golden brown and tender.
7. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. Serve the roasted potatoes immediately, or let them cool completely before storing in an airtight container.

[/INST]

Put the sandwich on a baking tray in the oven and cook for 3-4 minutes (until the cheese just starts to melt).
Remove from oven and put on a piece of red leaf lettuce and go!

31160ca4d7.gt:
Break broccoli into florets & roughly chop any tough stems.

Return soup to the pan.
Add milk + cream, season w/salt & pepper to taste pref & reheat gently.
At the last moment, add Stilton cheese & stir soup till the cheese just melts.
DO NOT BOIL.
Cut reserved broccoli florets into thin slices.
Ladle soup into warmed bowls & garnish w/sliced broccoli & freshly ground black pepper.
Serve immediately.

In a large pot with boiling salted water cook spaghetti pasta until al dente.
Drain.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add onion, garlic, basil, sliced mushrooms, and chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in California-style vegetables, salt, and ground black pepper.
Cook for approximately 10 minutes, stirring often, until vegetables are tender and crisp.
Pour vegetable mixture over cooked and drained pasta.
Toss well.
Sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese and serve.
e3cdb21cdf.pred:

6a751b3cb8.gt:
Crumble the tofu and chop the vegetables.
You can also use other vegetables you like, such as spinach, kale, bell pepper, black olives, broccoli, onion.
Put a little splash of extra virgin olive oil in a pan on medium heat and saute mushrooms and asparagus (or whatever veggies you are using that take a little longer to cook).
Once they are cooked and starting to brown, set aside for a few minutes.
Add a little more oil to the pan to prevent the tofu from sticking.
Add tofu crumbles, and start with 1 teaspoon ground turmeric, adding more if needed.
Mix together until turmeric is evenly dispersed and tofu is a nice yellow egg-y color.
Add cheese shreds and nutritional yeast (adds more cheesiness) to the tofu and mix until cheese starts to melt.
Add all veggies to the pan, including sauteed mushrooms and asparagus.
Gently mix in salt, pepper, and garlic powder to taste.
6a751b3cb8.pred:
[INSTRUCTIONS]
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Firm Tofu, Asparagus, Mushrooms, Heirloom Tomato, Avocado, and Oil.
3. Add the Ground Turmeric, salt, and pepper, and mix well.
4. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the tofu is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
5. While the dish is baking, prepare the Daiya Cheese Shreds according to the package instructions.
6. Once the dish is cooked, remove it from the oven and stir in the Nutritional Yeast.
7. Serve the dish immediately, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

[/INSTRUCTIONS]

ef00415f9c.gt:
Wash the rice and leave for 30 minutes.
This is 900 g of asari clams with shells.
Steam the clams in sake and remove the meat from the shells.
Save the soup left behind from steaming the clams.
Refer to steps 6 - 9 to find out how to steam the clams with sake.
Add the washed rice to the rice cooker, along with the soup we took in step 3, cooking sake and soy sauce.
Fill with water until you reach the 2 cups mark (or however much liquid you would normally use for the amount of rice you want), and cook the rice.
Once the rice has cooked, add the clam meat and let them steam for a while.
How to steam clams: Add the asari clams to a frying pan, pour over some cooking sake, put on the lid, and steam-cook on a low-medium heat.
If you overcook the clams the meat will shrink so take them off the heat as soon as they start to open up.
This is how they look when they're opened.
Take a look at this related recipe too Fukagawa Don (Rice bowl).
ef00415f9c.pred:
1. Rinse the rice thoroughly under cold water to remove any impurities.
2. In a large pot, combine the rice, water, and a pinch of salt. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the pot. Cook the rice until it is fully cooked and the water has been absorbed, usually around 15-20 minutes.
3. While the rice is cooking, prepare the clams by rinsing them under cold water and removing any sand or debris.
4. In a separate pot, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the garlic and ginger, and cook until fragrant.
5. Add the clams to the pot, making sure they are evenly distributed. Cook the clams until they open, usually around 5-10 minutes.
6. Once the clams are cooked, remove them from the heat and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. In a small bowl, mix the cooking sake and soy sauce.
8. Pour the cooking sake mixture over the cooked clams and stir to combine.
9. Serve the cooked clams and rice together, garnished with chopped green onions if desired.

[/INST]

ea93239d44.gt:
In a 3 cup or larger bowl, whisk the 1st 8 ingredients to combine.
Gradually add olive oil in a stream & whisk to combine well.
Add salt & pepper to taste & refrigerate for 24 hrs to allow flavors to blend.
NOTE: I use a wide-mouth jar w/screw-on lid + my immersion blender to make & store this in a single step.
TO SERVE: Simplicity is the most-favored presentation - as a bruschetta-type appy where 1/2-in slices of baguette bread are spread w/cream cheese, topped w/very thinly sliced smoked salmon & then this sauce is spread over the salmon slices.
A few tiny capers can be centered as an opt garnish.
HINT: For never fail perfect slicing of smoked salmon, freeze the salmon to a near frozen state & use your sharpest knife to shave slices of desired thickness.
ea93239d44.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the honey, brown sugar, Dijon mustard, prepared mustard, lemon juice, fresh dill, coriander, sour cream, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
3. Add the cooked chicken to the bowl and toss to coat the chicken evenly with the sauce.
4. Transfer the chicken to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
5. Serve the cooked chicken with the sauce and enjoy your delicious Food!

6ec14869d3.gt:
In a nonstick pan over medium heat, heat the oil.
Saute the garlic until soft; add the bell pepper, rosemary, and 1 tablespoon of parsley and saute 5 minutes longer.
Add the tomatoes; bring to a boil then reduce the heat and simmer, stir frequently for 10 minutes.
Add the chickpeas and cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through (5 minutes).
Stir in the ditalini, cheese and remaining parsley.
Top with a little more shredded cheese.
6ec14869d3.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant.
3. Add the red bell pepper and cook for another 2 minutes, until it is slightly softened.
4. Add the minced rosemary and parsley, and cook for another 1 minute, until the herbs are fragrant.
5. Add the diced tomatoes, chickpeas, and cooked ditalini to the skillet. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Cook the mixture over medium heat for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the chickpeas are heated through and the pasta is cooked to your desired level of doneness.
7. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for about 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove the skillet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy your delicious homemade Food.

8132be5a91.gt:
Heat 4 tablespoons of the oil in a large heavy-bottom soup pan.
Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the drained chickpeas, water, cumin and coriander.
Bring to boiling, then reduce heat and simmer for 2 1/2 hours or until tender.
Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a separate pan.
Add the vegetables, cover and cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, for 20 minutes.
Stir the vegetable mixture into the chickpeas.
Transfer half the soup to a food processor or blender and process until smooth.
Return the puree to the pan, then add half the lemon juice.
Taste and adjust lemon juice.
Season with S&P.
Heat through.
Ladle into warm bowls and sprinkle with the chopped fresh cilantro and garnish with cilantro sprigs.
8132be5a91.pred:
[INST]
To create a delicious and healthy dish, combine the following ingredients:

1. In a large pot, heat the 8 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat.
2. Add the 12 garlic cloves and cook until they are fragrant and slightly browned.
3. Add the 3 cups of chickpeas, and cook until they are tender but still have some crunch.
4. Pour in the 2 quarts of water, and bring the mixture to a boil.
5. Add the 1 teaspoon of cumin, 1 teaspoon of ground coriander, and the 2 carrots, and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
6. Add the 2 onions and the 6 celery ribs, and cook for another 10 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
7. Add the juice of the lemon, and stir to combine.
8. Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Serve the dish over rice or with crusty bread, garnished with the chopped fresh cilantro.

ad5d547737.gt:
Cut each cheese piece into 4 chunks; cut each cucumber half into 8 chunks.
Thread cheese and cucumbers onto 16 (6-inch) wooden skewers with all remaining ingredients except dressing.
Place on platter.
Drizzle with dressing.
ad5d547737.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the KRAFT Mozzarella Cheese, cut lengthwise into quarters, and the KRAFT Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing.
3. In a separate bowl, toss the cucumber, peeled and cut lengthwise in half, with the jumbo black olives, pitted and drained.
4. In a third bowl, mix the arugula leaves with the dressing.
5. To assemble the salad, place the cucumber and jumbo black olives mixture on a serving platter.
6. Drizzle the KRAFT Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing over the cucumber and olives mixture.
7. Arrange the arugula leaves on top of the salad.
8. Serve immediately, and enjoy your delicious and healthy salad.

8198c69331.gt:
Place all ingredients in your bread machine in the order given.
Set bread machine to dough cycle.
IMPORTANT!
CHECK YOUR MACHINE WHILE IT IS KNEADING and ADD MORE WATER IF NEEDED 1 TABLESPOON AT A TIME.
The dough should not be too dry - it should look smooth and satiny after kneading for a few minutes.
When dough cycle is complete, remove dough from machine and shape into long loaf (like french bread).
Place on a cookie sheet and let loaf rise for about 45 minutes or until doubled in size.
Bake at 350 degrees for about 30 minutes or until nicely browned.
You can also just cook this in your bread machine on the regular bread cycle if you want.
It still tastes great, you just don't get the cuban shaped loaf.
8198c69331.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 14 cups of water, 12 teaspoons of sugar, and 1 teaspoon of salt.
2. Add the 3 cups of bread flour, and mix until the dough comes together. If the dough is too sticky, you can add a bit more flour, a tablespoon at a time.
3. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it reaches a smooth and elastic consistency.
4. Place the dough in a large, lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a clean cloth, and let it rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
5. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
6. Punch down the dough, and then divide it into 12 equal pieces.
7. Shape each piece of dough into a ball, and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
8. Cover the baking sheet with a clean cloth, and let the dough rise for another 30-45 minutes, or until it has doubled in size.
9. Bake the bread in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until it is golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.
10. Remove the bread from the oven, and let it cool on a wire rack for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

96a66bd364.gt:
Whisk the milk and oil together.
(The key to making this good and not tasting like oil is using a little less oil and a little more milk.)
Add flour, salt, and sugar.
Press on bottom of pie plate.
With a fork, poke holes in bottom and sides of crust.
Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes.
So easy and so good.
See Amazing Blueberry Cream Cheese Pie for ideas on what to make this with.
96a66bd364.pred:
To create a delicious and satisfying dish using the provided ingredients, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, and salt.
3. Gradually add the milk, peanut oil, and egg, mixing until a smooth and slightly sticky dough forms.
4. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
5. Cut out desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
6. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
8. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade cookies!

61afcadcb1.gt:
1.
In a small bowl, combine almonds and brown sugar; set aside.
2.
In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Beat in the almond extract.
3.
Combine flour, baking soda and baking powder.
Add this to the creamed mixture alternately with bananas and sour cream.
Fold in the vanilla or white chips.
4.
Spread into a greased 13x9x2 inch baking pan.
Sprinkle with reserved almond and brown sugar mixture.
5.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.
Cool on a wire rack.
61afcadcb1.pred:
To prepare a tasty Food, follow these steps:

2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until smooth.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the almond extract and vanilla or white chips.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the bananas, and mix until just combined.
7. Fold in the slivered almonds.
8. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
9. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

This tasty Food is a delicious and moist banana bread, perfect for a snack or dessert. The combination of bananas, sour cream, and almond extract creates a unique and delightful flavor profile.

6a6db8c9e3.gt:
trim away middle of bun
put 1 Cheddar cheese and 1tbsp of jam
add 3 hazelnut on each bun and bake 180 C for 5 minute till cheese melted
6a6db8c9e3.pred:
1. First, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the blueberry jam and hazelnut, creating a spreadable consistency.
3. Place the mini buns on a baking sheet and toast them in the oven for 5-7 minutes, or until golden brown.
4. While the buns are toasting, prepare the cheese by slicing it into small pieces.
5. Once the buns are toasted, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
6. Spread the blueberry jam and hazelnut mixture on the toasted buns.

8. If desired, add a few extra toppings, such as chopped chives or a sprinkle of paprika.

10. Remove the buns from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

8590091d29.gt:
Lightly oil grill and preheat to high.
Loosen skin on chicken pieces with fingers, by sliding hand between skin and flesh.
In a small skillet, saute green onion and 2 cloves garlic in butter or margarine for 1 minute.
Stir in breadcrumbs and parsley.
Push this seasoning under chicken skins, working it down well.
Combine 1 cup butter or margarine with mustard, 1 clove garlic and curry powder.
Spread this seasoned butter or margarine over chicken and put on preheated grill.
Cook 10 to 15 minutes each side, or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear.
Brush with remaining seasoned butter while grilling.
8590091d29.pred:
To make a delicious chicken dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the chopped green onions, crushed garlic, fresh bread crumbs, and parsley.
3. Season the chicken legs with salt and pepper, then coat them evenly with the bread crumb mixture.
4. Heat the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken legs and cook until they are browned on both sides and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes per side.
5. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
6. In the same skillet, add the butter and crushed garlic. Cook until the garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute.
7. Add the curry powder and cook for an additional minute, stirring constantly.
8. Pour the prepared mustard over the curry mixture and stir to combine.
9. Return the chicken legs to the skillet and toss them in the curry mustard mixture until they are coated evenly.
10. Transfer the chicken to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the bread crumbs are golden brown.

Enjoy your delicious chicken dish!

baa571bacd.gt:
Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 400F.
Drain 1 can tomatoes, reserving juice, then break up tomatoes into 1/2-inch pieces with a spoon if necessary; puree the second can of tomatoes,including juice and reserved juice (from other can), 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/8 teaspoon allspice in a blender OR use hand blender, until smooth.
Transfer tomato puree to a 2-quart heavy saucepan and boil uncovered, stirring occasionally, until reduced to about 1/2 cup, about 20 minutes, remove from heat.
Heat a dry 12-inch heavy skillet over moderate heat until hot, then brown lamb with 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, and remaining 1/2 teaspoon allspice, stirring and breaking up lumps (but leaving meat slightly chunky), about 5 minutes; add drained tomatoes and cook, stirring occasionally, until juices are absorbed, about 1 minute.
Cut polenta into 1/4-inch-thick slices with a sharp knife and cover bottom of a 9-inch glass pie plate with half of polenta slices (overlapping slightly); scatter half of lamb mixture over polenta, then top with half of mozzarella, then remaining polenta; scatter remaining lamb on top and spread tomato sauce over meat, then top with remaining mozzarella.
Bake, uncovered, until bubbling and beginning to brown, about 20 minutes; let stand, loosely covered with foil, 15 minutes before serving, Enjoy.
baa571bacd.pred:
To prepare a delicious and flavorful dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 2 cans of stewed tomatoes, 12 ground allspice, and 18 teaspoons of ground allspice.
3. Add the ground lamb and mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the 1 lb of ready-made plain prepared polenta, 12 lb of whole milk mozzarella, and coarsely grated mozzarella.
5. Gradually add the milk to the polenta mixture, stirring constantly, until the polenta is smooth and creamy.
6. Add the salt and pepper to taste.
7. Transfer the lamb and tomato mixture to a large baking dish.
8. Pour the polenta mixture over the lamb and tomato mixture, ensuring that it is evenly distributed.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 45 minutes, or until the polenta is cooked through and the lamb is fully cooked.
10. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

This dish is a delicious and satisfying combination of flavors, with the tender lamb, rich polenta, and tangy tomatoes coming together to create a satisfying and comforting meal.

b5c909ba3f.gt:
Heat grill.
Slice onion into slightly larger than 1/4-inch slices and brush both sides of each slice with olive oil.
Place onion on grill and cook 4-5 minutes per side or until brown and tender.
Let onion cool and then chop.
Place potatoes into boiling salted water for about 20-25 minutes or until just tender; drain.
When cool enough to handle, peeled and cut into 3/4 inch pieces.
In a large bowl, stir milk and vinegar together and let sit 1-2 minutes to thicken.
Whisk in mayo, salt and pepper.
Stir in onions.
Add potatoes to bowl, stir and then add celery.
Stir gently.
Cover and refrigerate for several hours before serving.
b5c909ba3f.pred:

2. In a large bowl, combine the onion, olive oil, and milk.
3. Add the cider vinegar, mayonnaise, salt, and pepper to the mixture.
4. Mix well until the ingredients are well combined.
5. Add the red boiling potatoes and sliced celery to the bowl.
6. Stir the ingredients until they are well coated.
7. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 30-40 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and the mixture is hot and bubbly.
8. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy your delicious homemade potato salad.

6cb33feaa0.gt:
Preheat oven to 375F Lightly grease cookie sheets.
Combine dry ingredients.
Set aside.
In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugars together.
Beat in the eggs, one at a time.
Stir in the vanilla.
Stir in the dry ingredients until well mixed, then stir in the chocolate chips, coconut and almonds.
Drop by rounded tablespoons onto the prepared cookie sheets.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes.
Cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.

ed047c7fd8.gt:
Add the milk, and small pieces of torn up cheese into a small saucepan.
Heat it up over medium-low heat until right before it starts to boil.
When the cheese has melted, mix well with a wooden spatula.
Let the mixture cool down.
Separate the egg yolks and egg whites.
Add the egg whites, 1/2 of the sugar into a bowl, and whip into a firm meringue.
Add the egg yolks and the remaining sugar into a separate bowl, and mix with a whisk.
Add the Step 1 mixture, and mix well.
Sift the cake flour into the Step 4 bowl, and mix well with the whisk.
Add the lemon juice as well, and mix well.
Add 1/3 of the Step 3 meringue into the Step 5 bowl, and mix well with the whisk.
Add the remaining meringue, and mix well with a spatula.
Pour the batter into a cake pan lined with parchment paper.
Place it in a baking sheet filled with hot water in the preheated oven, and bake for about 50 minutes at 160C.
Cover with aluminium foil halfway through so that it won't get burned.
If you don't mix the mixture really well during Step 6, it will separate into 2 layers, so please be careful.
If you are using a cake pan with removable bottom, the hot water will come into the pan while steam-baking in a water bath during Step 8, so please cover the bottom with aluminium foil and bake.
ed047c7fd8.pred:
1. First, prepare the ingredients by gathering the necessary items, which include 3 slice sliced cheese (non-melting type), 120 ml milk, 2 eggs, 30 grams cake flour, 40 grams sugar, and 1 tbsp lemon juice.

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cake flour, sugar, and lemon juice. Whisk the ingredients together until they are well combined.

3. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs until they are well-beaten.

4. Pour the milk into the large mixing bowl and stir the ingredients together until they are well combined.

5. Add the whisked eggs to the mixture, stirring gently to combine.

6. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).

7. Grease a baking dish with butter or oil.

8. Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish and smooth the top with a spatula.

9. Bake the cake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.

10. Remove the cake from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into slices and serving.

This tasty cheesecake is a delicious and satisfying dessert that can be enjoyed by people of all ages. The combination of the creamy cheese, sweet cake, and tangy lemon juice creates a delightful flavor profile that is both indulgent and refreshing.

0f248f2042.gt:
In a large frying/saute pan add oil, butter and garlic, saute on low flame until oil starts to bubble.
Add tomatoes, salt and pepper.
Cook covered on a low flame for about 30 minutes.
Add vodka.
Cook uncovered for 25 minutes.
Add prosciutto-- cook 5 more minutes.
Add basil and heavy cream-- cook just 5 more minutes.
SERVE IT NOW!

3c84706338.gt:
Preheat oven to 400?.
Spray a 2 qt casserole dish, or 9x9 baking pan with non-stick cooking spray.
In this order, layer the chicken, broccoli, 1 1/2 cups cheddar cheese and 2/3 of the bacon-bits in prepared baking dish.

022318dd52.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
Spray a large casserole dish with cooking spray.
(I have a 4 quart casserole dish I use for this.)
In a large skillet, brown together ground beef and onion; drain grease and return to pan.
Add tomato sauce, mushroom soup, 1/2 cup of the cheese, salt, pepper, and garlic.
Simmer uncovered.
While meat mixture is simmering, cook the pasta according to package directions.
Combine the pasta and the meat mixture together in the casserole dish; mix well.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on top.
Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is bubbly.
022318dd52.pred:
To create a delicious and satisfying meal, follow these steps:

5. Add the canned cream of mushroom soup, and mix well.
6. Cook the mixture over low heat for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
7. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked ground beef, onion mixture, and shredded cheddar cheese. Season with pepper, salt, and garlic powder to taste.
8. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until it is al dente.
9. Transfer the cooked pasta to a large baking dish.
10. Pour the beef and onion mixture over the pasta, and mix well to combine.
11. Sprinkle the top with additional shredded cheddar cheese, if desired.
12. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
13. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy your delicious homemade Food!

565fbfd08a.gt:
NB: I like to use a fairly strong flavoured, but creamy blue cheese, like Gorgonzola, but Stilton is also nice.
Stock-wise, you may need a little more or less than in the ingredients list.
Bring stock up to a simmer.
Halve the leeks and remove any gritty bits from inside the rings.
Cut the leek into fine strips rather than semi-circles, of approx 1-2 inches in length.
Melt half the butter with the olive oil and cook the leeks for approx 10 minutes over a low-medium heat until soft and tinged with brown.
Add bacon to pan and cook for about 5 minutes.
Stir in garlic and rice, cook for a further minute or two, stirring the rice until it's coated in the butter and oil and starts to go slightly translucent.
Add the wine to the pan, turning up the heat to bubble most of it away.
Add a ladleful of hot stock to the leek and rice mixture at a time, stirring more or less constantly.
Add more stock each time that most of the liquid has been absorbed.
Add the fresh sage.
Keep doing this for approximately 15 - 25 minutes, until the risotto is creamy, but the rice grains still have a slight bite.
You'll need to start testing the rice after about 15 minutes, but it may take a little longer.
Turn off the heat.
Stir in the lemon juice, zest, remaining butter, parmesan and blue cheese.
Leave the risotto for another 2 minutes until rich, creamy and luscious.
Season to taste with black pepper and salt if needed.
565fbfd08a.pred:
To cook a delightful Food, start by heating the butter and olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the leeks and sauté until they are soft and translucent. Then, add the crushed garlic and cook for an additional minute.

Next, add the smoked bacon or pancetta and cook until it is crispy. Remove the bacon or pancetta from the pan and set aside.

In the same pan, add the arborio rice and cook until it is slightly toasted. Pour in the dry white wine and stir to deglaze the pan. Cook until the wine has been absorbed, then add the chicken or vegetable stock, one cup at a time, stirring constantly.

After the stock has been absorbed, add the sautéed leeks, crispy bacon or pancetta, and fresh sage. Cook for a few minutes until the rice is tender and the flavors have melded together.

Finally, add the lemon juice and zest, blue cheese, and parmesan cheese. Stir until the cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth. Season with fresh ground black pepper to taste.

Serve the delightful Food hot, garnished with a sprinkle of freshly grated parmesan cheese if desired. Enjoy!

7b4784ea40.gt:
Slice the body of the prepped squid into rounds, then cut into 1cm dice.
Combine the flours, dashi stock granules, and water, and mix until it's slightly sticky (meaning the gluten in the flour has formed).
Add the squid to the batter, and leave for at least 30 minutes.
If the batter becomes too firm, add a little water so that it's the consistency of crepe batter.
Add oil in a pan, and pour in the batter (You can add an egg here to upgrade the pancake to a deluxe version.)
When one side is browned, turn the pancake over.
Cook the other side while pressing down hard on the pancake with your spatula.
When the pancake is cooked, spread the combined okonomiyaki and takoyaki sauces, fold in half and press.
If you add too much squid, the pancakes will be hard to cook.
I'm not too good at cooking these myself.
If you're not used to making pancakes, try cooking one with just a little squid added to the batter.
7b4784ea40.pred:
[INSTR]
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 100 grams to 180 grams of squid, 140 grams of cake flour, 10 grams of bread flour, 5 grams of katakuriko, 1 tsp of dashi stock granules, and 200 grams of water.
2. Add 1 vegetable oil and 1 okonomiyaki sauce to the mixture, stirring well to combine.
3. If the mixture is too dry, add a little more water. If it is too wet, add a little more flour.
4. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Pour the mixture onto the pan, forming a flat, circular shape. Cook for about 5 minutes, or until the bottom is golden brown and the edges are slightly crispy.
5. Carefully flip the food and cook for another 3 to 4 minutes, or until the other side is golden brown and cooked through.
6. Serve the mouthwatering Food immediately, drizzled with the remaining takoyaki sauce.

[/INSTR]

[/INST]

58c85cf057.gt:
Mix 2 Tbsp flour and the salt and pepper in a ziptop bag.
Add chicken; shake to coat.
Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet.
Add chicken; saute 5 minutes, or until cooked through.
Remove to a plate.
In a cup, mix remaining flour, the broth and garlic.
Add asparagus to skillet and saute 1 minute until bright green.
Stir chicken broth mixture, add to pan and cook 1 minute until thickened slightly and asparagus are tender.
Add chicken back to pan.
Stir in tomatoes; remove from heat.
Stir in scallions and dill.
58c85cf057.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the 2 tablespoons of flour, 14 teaspoons of salt, and 14 teaspoons of pepper.
3. Add the boneless skinless chicken breast to the bowl and toss to coat the chicken evenly with the flour mixture.
4. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
5. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
6. In the same skillet, add the chicken broth and minced garlic. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10-12 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
7. Add the asparagus to the skillet, and cook until tender but still crisp, about 3-4 minutes.
8. Add the grape tomatoes and scallions to the skillet, and cook until the vegetables are tender but still vibrant in color, about 3-4 minutes.
9. Add the dill to the skillet and stir to combine.
10. Return the cooked chicken to the skillet and toss to combine with the sauce and vegetables.
11. Serve the chicken and vegetable mixture over cooked rice or noodles.

[/INST]

613e75a520.gt:
In a large bowl, mix mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, sugar and salt until combined.
Add cabbage mix, apples, celery and raisins to bowl with dressing, toss well.
Cover and refrigerate at least 30 minutes to allow cabbage to soften.
To serve, sprinkle with walnuts.
Garnish with radishes.
613e75a520.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the light mayonnaise, low-fat sour cream, sugar, and salt until well combined.
3. Add the coleslaw mix, apple, granny smith apple, celery, raisins, and walnuts to the bowl. Stir to combine.
4. Place the mixture in a casserole dish or a baking dish.
5. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes or until the vegetables are tender and the mixture is hot and bubbly.
6. Garnish the dish with a sprinkle of toasted radish tops.
7. Serve the dish warm and enjoy your delicious, homemade coleslaw and apple salad.

[/INST]

4b92540ad2.gt:
heat oven to 425
line 9in pie plate with pastry
combine lemon juice with flour,sugar,nutmeg,cinnamon,lemon rind
place half of apples in plate, sharp edges inward
sprinkle with half of sugar mixture
top with rest of apples, heaping in center sprinkle with rest of sugar mixture
dot with butter
adjust top crust as directed and glaze
bake 40-50min or until apples test tender with fork and crust is brown
4b92540ad2.pred:
To cook a delightful Food, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the lemon juice, flour, granulated sugar, brown sugar, nutmeg, cinnamon, and grated lemon rind.
3. Add the thinly sliced, pared, cored tart apples to the bowl and toss them to coat them evenly with the mixture.
4. In a separate bowl, melt the butter or margarine.
5. Pour the melted butter or margarine over the apples and toss them to coat them evenly.
6. Transfer the apples to a baking dish or a pie pan.
7. Bake the apples in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
8. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Serve the cooked apples warm or at room temperature, and enjoy your delicious Food!

f7ca0c32fa.gt:
Place greens on serving plate.
Top with chicken and corn.
Drizzle with salsa, then dressing.
f7ca0c32fa.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chicken strips, corn, and salsa.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the ranch dressing and a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. Pour the dressing mixture over the chicken and corn mixture, and toss to coat evenly.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the corn is tender.
6. Serve the cooked chicken and corn mixture over the salad greens, and enjoy your delicious Food.

0509ec4c83.gt:
Mix milk and vinegar together, and set aside.
Mix flour and salt.
Cut in shortening with fork.
Add milk and vinegar.
0509ec4c83.pred:
To make a delicious and creamy milk-based dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 14 cups of milk and 2 tablespoons of vinegar. Whisk the mixture until it becomes smooth and well-combined.
2. Gradually add the 2 cups of flour, stirring continuously to avoid lumps.
3. Add the 1 cup of Crisco shortening, and continue to stir until the mixture becomes smooth and free of lumps.
4. Add the 1 teaspoon of salt, and stir to combine.
5. If the mixture is too thick, you can add a bit more milk to achieve the desired consistency.
6. Cover the bowl and refrigerate the mixture for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
7. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
8. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
10. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

This recipe creates a delicious and creamy milk-based dish that is perfect for breakfast, dessert, or a snack. The vinegar adds a tangy flavor, while the Crisco shortening provides a rich, buttery taste. The salt balances the flavors and adds a touch of depth to the dish. Enjoy!

83b98d7ee9.gt:
Saute diced onion in olive oil, add to crock pot.
Pour canned ingredients into crock pot, do not drain beans.
Add spices.
And the diced chicken.
(I used bagged chicken breast that was still partially frozen).
Heat on medium heat for 6 hours.
Microwave cream cheese for 45 seconds until it is easy to stir and pour.
Add the the soup.
Using a blender or immersion blender, blend until smooth.
Add 1 cup of favorite shredded cheese.
I used Colby Jack.
Hollow out your bead bowl if you so desire and pour soup into it.
Top with remaining shredded cheese.
83b98d7ee9.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add the chopped onion and cook until it becomes soft and translucent, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Add the northern beans, chicken broth, and chicken diced. Stir to combine.
5. Add the ground cumin, oregano, ground smoked chipotle, salt, and cream cheese to the pot. Stir to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 15-20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the cream cheese is melted and smooth.
7. If using a bread bowl, place it in the oven to heat and soften the bread.
8. Once the chicken is cooked and the cream cheese is melted, stir in the shredded cheese.
9. Serve the chicken and bean mixture in the bread bowl, if using, or in a bowl.

This step-by-step procedure provides a clear guide for cooking a delicious chicken and white bean dish using the provided ingredients. The dish can be served in a bread bowl, which adds a unique and satisfying texture to the meal.

9980565108.gt:
Wash fruit and discard any skin (from peaches or the like).
Cut fruit into pieces no larger than 1 inch each.
In a large heavy-duty saucepan add the sugar and stir over medium heat while the sugar melts and the fruit softens.
Cook, stirring constantly until the jam thickens.
this may take an hour or more.
Cool, then spoon into very clean jars, cover with clean lids and refrigerate up to 3 weeks.
9980565108.pred:
To prepare a delicious and healthy fruit dish, you will need the following ingredients:
1. 4 lbs of your choice of fruit (e.g., apples, bananas, oranges, etc.)
2. 4 cups of sugar (for sweetening the dish)

First, wash and peel the fruits, and cut them into bite-sized pieces. Next, place the fruit pieces in a large mixing bowl.

Add the sugar to the bowl, and mix the fruits and sugar together until the fruit is well-coated with the sugar. You may want to use a spoon or your hands to ensure that the fruit is evenly coated.

Once the fruit is well-coated, you can add any additional flavors or spices that you prefer, such as cinnamon, nutmeg, or vanilla extract. Mix the additional flavors into the fruit mixture.

Finally, transfer the fruit mixture to a baking dish or a casserole dish, and bake the dish in a preheated oven at a temperature of 350°F (175°C) for about 30-45 minutes, or until the fruit is tender and the sugar has caramelized.

After baking, let the dish cool for a few minutes, and then serve the fruit dish warm or at room temperature, depending on your preference. Enjoy your delicious and healthy fruit dish!

08c1e0e854.gt:
break the banana into small pieces.
crush the cereal into big pieces
sieve flour and salt, beat in eggs, milk, vanilla, cream cheese, cereal and banana
heat a teaspoon of oil in a nonstick frying pan on a medium heat
depending on how big you like your pancakes depends on how big a spoon you use.
drop some batter in so its about 1/4 inch thick.
when the edges dry start to work a spatula around the edges and flip.
leave for a few mins.
check by lifting on end with the spatula
repeat steps 3 and 4 until all mixture is used up.
during cooking keep the ready pancakes warm in the oven
08c1e0e854.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, eggs, milk, salt, and vanilla extract. Mix well.
3. Add the over ripe banana to the mixture and mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the cereal of your choice with the oil.
5. Pour the cereal mixture into the banana mixture and mix until well combined.
6. Add the cream cheese and mix until the dough comes together.
7. Roll the dough into small balls and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
8. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
9. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

8b434331f6.gt:
Heat oven to 425F.
Cook broccoli according to pkg directions.
Mix margarine, onion salt, parsley, onion powder in saucepan.
Heat until melted.
Set aside.
Mix baking mix, wine, & chicken until soft dough forms.
You can add a little extra wine if there is still some of the baking mix not mixed in.
Press into bottom of baking dish.
Pour butter mixture over biscuit mixture.
Sprinkle with paprika.
Bake uncovered for 15 minutes or until golden brown.
Pour broccoli over biscuit mix.
Cut into squares & serve.
8b434331f6.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the frozen broccoli, cooked chicken, and cheese sauce.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the margarine, onion salt, parsley flakes, onion powder, and gluten-free baking mix.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
5. Pour the mixture into a greased baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes or until the broccoli is tender and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Serve the dish hot and enjoy!

[/INST]

582a1779fb.gt:
Put all ingredients into a blender or food processor.
Process until smooth.
Pour into glass.
Enjoy!
582a1779fb.pred:
To cook a delightful Food, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, mix together the 23 cup milk, 13 cup orange juice, and 1 cup strawberry.
2. Add 2 tablespoons of plain yogurt and 2 tablespoons of peanut butter to the mixture.
3. Stir until the ingredients are well combined.
4. Pour the mixture into a saucepan and heat it over medium heat.
5. While stirring continuously, gradually add 2 tablespoons of instant chocolate drink mix (like Nestle's Quik).
6. Stir until the chocolate drink mix is fully incorporated and the mixture is smooth and well combined.
7. Add 1 tablespoon of honey and stir to combine.
8. Cook the mixture for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally, until it reaches your desired consistency.

This delightful Food is a delicious and nutritious treat that combines the creamy texture of milk, the tangy taste of orange juice, the sweetness of strawberries, and the richness of peanut butter and chocolate. The honey adds a touch of natural sweetness and a hint of flavor. Enjoy your homemade treat!

e65b0ff688.gt:
Combine chicken strips, orange juice, and 1 teaspoon cornstarch in a medium bowl; cover and chill 1 hour.
Heat oil in a nonstick skillet over medium heat.
Add cashews; cook, stirring constantly, 30 seconds.
Remove from skillet; set aside.
Add chicken mixture to skillet.
Cook, uncovered, over medium-high heat 8 minutes or until chicken is lightly browned, stirring constantly.
Add water chestnuts and next 3 ingredients; cook 5 minutes.
Combine broth, soy sauce, and 1 tablespoon cornstarch; add to chicken mixture.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat, and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened.
Remove from heat; stir in oranges.
Spoon chicken mixture over rice, and sprinkle with cashews.
Serve immediately.
e65b0ff688.pred:
[INST]To create a delicious and nutritious dish, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, combine the chicken strips, cornstarch, and vegetable oil. Mix well to coat the chicken evenly.
2. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the coated chicken to the skillet and cook until it is fully cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Remove the cooked chicken from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the sliced water chestnuts, green pepper, and green onion. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Add the minced gingerroot to the skillet and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.
6. Pour the reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth into the skillet, stirring to combine.
7. Add the cooked brown rice, soy sauce, and drained mandarin oranges. Stir to combine all ingredients.
8. Cook the mixture over medium heat for about 5-7 minutes, or until the rice is heated through and the sauce has thickened slightly.
9. Serve the dish immediately, garnished with chopped cashews if desired.

This recipe combines a variety of flavors and textures, creating a delicious and satisfying meal. The chicken provides a lean protein source, while the rice serves as a carbohydrate and the vegetables add essential vitamins and minerals. The orange juice and soy sauce add a touch of sweetness and tanginess, respectively, while the gingerroot adds a warm, spicy flavor. The mandarin oranges provide a burst of citrusy freshness, and the cashews add a crunchy texture and a touch of nuttiness. Overall, this dish is both nutritious and delicious, making it a great choice for a satisfying meal.

fa898117da.gt:
These few potatoes weighed about 1 kg this time.
Peel them, cut into pieces, and soak in water.
Bring the butter to room temperature.
Boil the sweet potatoes until they become soft.
When finished boiling, drain the water.
Mash with a masher while they are still hot.
Add the butter, sugar, and heavy cream into a pot, and mix over medium heat, without burning the mixture, until the butter melts.
When the butter is melted, add the Step 3 potatoes and evaporate the water while kneading and mixing.
Add vanilla extract, as well.
Preheat the oven to 200C.
Form into your desired shapes and brush with the egg yolk and water mixture.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 ~ 20 minutes at 200C.
fa898117da.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. Peel the sweet potatoes and cut them into even-sized pieces.
3. Place the sweet potatoes in a large mixing bowl and toss them with the salted butter.
4. Cover the bowl and let the sweet potatoes marinate in the butter for about 30 minutes.
5. Meanwhile, prepare the sugar and heavy cream mixture. In a small saucepan, combine the granulated sugar and heavy cream. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the sugar has dissolved.
6. Remove the mixture from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg yolks and vanilla extract together.
8. Gradually pour the cooled sugar and heavy cream mixture into the egg yolks, whisking constantly.
9. Add the cooled sweet potatoes to the egg mixture and stir to combine.
10. Pour the mixture into a greased 9-inch (23 cm) round baking dish.
11. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
12. Remove the casserole from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
13. Serve the casserole warm, garnished with a dusting of powdered sugar if desired.

[/INST]

143f7e5182.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Mix bread dough following the directions on the box (or use your favorite recipe).
Wrap the dough around the smokies, one at a time.
Place on a greased cookie sheet, or use Silpat or parchment paper.
Bake for 15 minutes.
143f7e5182.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the white bread mix and water according to the package instructions. Mix until the dough comes together and forms a soft, pliable ball.
3. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.25 cm).
4. Cut out circles of dough using a cookie cutter or a round object, like a glass.
5. Place the dough circles on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Spread a thin layer of butter or oil on top of each dough circle.
7. Place a small spoonful of the Hillshire Farm Lil' Smokies on top of each dough circle.
8. Bake the cookies in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
9. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade bread and Hillshire Farm Lil' Smokies cookies!

27f4409414.gt:
In a large bowl, combine chicken broth with 3 cups ice.
Add chicken; chill 1 hour.
Meanwhile, in a resealable bag, combine bread crumbs, flour, salt, cayenne, oregano, garlic, parsley, and pepper; shake.
Preheat oven to 400F Coat a large baking sheet with vegetable or olive oil spray; set aside.
Place yogurt in a medium bowl.
Remove chicken from broth.
One piece at a time, dip chicken into yogurt, then place in bread crumb mixture and shake.
Place breaded chicken on baking sheet.
Spray tops of chicken with vegetable spray.
Bake 45 to 50 minutes, until golden brown.
Serve hot or at room temperature.
27f4409414.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the chicken broth, yogurt, salt, cayenne pepper, and oregano.
3. Add the minced garlic and chopped parsley to the bowl, and stir to combine.
4. Place the skinless chicken breast halves in a large baking dish, and pour the marinade mixture over the top.
5. Cover the dish with aluminum foil, and bake for 45-50 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6. Remove the foil, and sprinkle the panko breadcrumbs over the top of the chicken.
7. Return the dish to the oven, and bake for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the breadcrumbs are golden brown and crispy.
8. Serve the cooked chicken with the breadcrumbs on top, and enjoy your delicious meal!

9f341bf6c9.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Grease a 9x9" pan.
Melt white chocolate and butter in the top of a double boiler, or in microwave on med power.
Set aside to cool.
In a large bowl, beat eggs until foamy.
Gradually add the sugar and vanilla, mixing constantly.
Drizzle in the melted white chocolate mixture.
Combine the flour and salt and fold into the white chocolate mixture.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Spread the batter into the prepared pan.
Bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Do not over-bake.
4.
Serve heated.
Top with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, some real whipped cream and a drizzle of chocolate sauce.
9f341bf6c9.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the butter, white chocolate, and vanilla extract.
3. Add the flour, one cup at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Add the eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Add the salt, sugar, and semi-sweet chocolate chips. Mix until well combined.
6. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the edges are golden brown.
8. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

555c73c04a.gt:
Thoroughly combine seasoning mix ingredients in a small bowl and set aside.
Cook pasta according to package directions and set aside.
Heat a skillet over high heat until it is hot, about 4 minutes.
Meanwhile, stir chicken pieces into seasoning.
Mix well.
Add 2 oz butter to pan.
Add chicken pieces and brown them.
Add the green onions, parsley, garlic and stock.
Cook two minutes or until the sauce is at a rolling boil.
Add the remaining butter (cut into pats) stirring to incorporate.
Cook for 3 minutes and add the cooked pasta.
Mix well.
Serve immediately.
I like to add parmesan on top.
555c73c04a.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the chicken strips, onion powder, black pepper, salt, sage, white pepper, thyme, garlic powder, and minced garlic.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the melted butter, chicken stock, and minced green onion.
4. Pour the butter mixture over the chicken mixture, and toss to coat the chicken evenly.
5. Transfer the chicken mixture to a baking dish, and bake for 30-35 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6. While the chicken is baking, cook the pasta according to the package instructions.
7. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
8. Stir the pasta into the chicken mixture, and serve immediately.

This delightful Food is a delicious combination of flavors and textures, featuring tender chicken, aromatic herbs, and a rich, creamy sauce. The use of fresh ingredients and careful cooking techniques ensures that the dish is both satisfying and visually appealing.

5c4e65b3c5.gt:
Preheat oven to 200F.
Place flour for dredging in a shallow bowl; coat each fillet with seasoned flour and shake off excess.
Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium heat for 3-4 minutes; add butter/olive oil combination then add the fillets, without crowding.
Increase heat to high and saute, shaking the pan from time to time, until bottom of the fish is nicely browned, about 3 minutes; turn and brown the other side.
Remove fish to a plate and keep warm in the oven; repeat with remaining fillets.
Deglaze the pan with white wine; cook, stirring over high heat until reduced by about 1/3; stir in remaining butter and drained capers.
Place fillets on individual serving plates and drizzle sauce around each fillet.
5c4e65b3c5.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the flour, salt, and pepper.
2. Dredge the chilean sea bass fillets in the seasoned flour mixture, ensuring they are evenly coated.
3. Heat the butter and olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
4. Add the seasoned chilean sea bass fillets to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
5. Remove the cooked fish from the skillet and set aside.
6. In the same skillet, add the dry white wine and cook until it has reduced by half.
7. Add the softened butter and capers to the skillet and stir until the butter has melted and the capers are heated through.
8. Return the cooked chilean sea bass fillets to the skillet and toss them in the sauce until they are coated evenly.
9. Serve the chilean sea bass fillets over a bed of rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious meal.

[/INST]

b6f5004817.gt:
Combine all together, cook on low in crock-pot 6-8 hours.
Serve with brown rice.
b6f5004817.pred:
To cook a delightful Food, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the Pineapple juice, Brown sugar, and Soy sauce.
3. Place the chicken tenderloin chunks in a baking dish.
4. Pour the Pineapple juice mixture over the chicken.
5. Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake for 1 hour.
6. Remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear.
7. Serve the cooked chicken with the Pineapple juice mixture as a sauce.

This dish is a delicious combination of flavors, with the sweetness of the Pineapple juice, the tanginess of the Brown sugar, and the savory taste of the Soy sauce. The tenderloin chunks of chicken are cooked to perfection, resulting in a delightful and satisfying meal.

708886aaca.gt:
Heat oil in a five to six quart pot over moderately high heat.
Add garlic and pepper flake, saute until golden.
Be careful not to burn the garlic.
Stir in tomatoes and salt.
Simmer uncovered for 35 minutes.
Serve with pasta.
708886aaca.pred:
[INST]
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, stirring constantly, until fragrant.
3. Add the red pepper flakes and stir to combine.
4. Pour in the diced tomatoes with their juice, and bring the mixture to a simmer.
5. Reduce the heat to low and let the sauce simmer for about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. In a small bowl, mix the salt with a little bit of water to create a slurry.
7. Slowly pour the salt slurry into the simmering tomato sauce, stirring constantly to avoid lumps.
8. Cook for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the sauce reaches your desired consistency.
9. Serve the sauce over your choice of pasta or use it as a base for other dishes like pizza or lasagna.

[/INST]

bfebd12211.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Line a 9 x 13 inch baking pan with foil (enough to go up the sides) then spray the foil with cooking spray.
In the bowl of an electric mixer, beat butter until smooth and creamy.
Add the sugars and salt and beat until well incorporated.
Beat in the egg and vanilla extract until smooth.
With the mixer on low speed, slowly add the flour, baking powder, and baking soda, stirring until incorporated.
The mixture will be thick.
Scoop the mixture into the prepared pan and use your fingers to press it into an even layer.
Bake in the preheated oven for 22 minutes, or until golden, puffed, and slightly cracked.
Remove the cookie layer from the oven and immediately spread the chopped chocolate evenly over the top.
Return to the oven for 2-3 minutes or until chocolate begins to melt.
Remove from the oven and use a spatula to smooth the chocolate over the top.
Cover the chocolate with the chips and marshmallows (or other toppings like toasted coconut or chopped nuts, peppermints, or other candies) and gently press them into the chocolate.
Allow bars to cool, then use the foil to pull them from the pan.
Slice and serve.
Recipe adapted from Bon Appetit.
bfebd12211.pred:
To prepare the Food, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).

2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.

3. Add the egg and vanilla extract, and mix until well combined.

4. Gradually add the flour, baking powder, and baking soda, mixing until the dough comes together.

5. Fold in the chopped chocolate and crunchy toppings.

6. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoons onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.

7. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.

8. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

9. Enjoy your delicious homemade cookies!

f951ae3f61.gt:
Light the grill.
In a food processor, puree the butter and olives with the anchovy paste, orange zest, orange juice, garlic, and pepper.
With a rubber spatula, scrape the butter into a small bowl and refrigerate.
Rub the hens with oil and cook over moderate heat for 12 minutes.
Turn and cook until just done, about 12 minutes longer.
Remove the hens from the grill and serve with the rice.
Top each serving with 2 tablespoons of the flavored butter, letting the butter melt over both the hen and the rice.
f951ae3f61.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the 8 tablespoons of butter, the anchovy paste, and the grated orange zest.
3. Season the mixture with the minced garlic, fresh-ground black pepper, and the orange juice.
4. Place the Cornish hens in a baking dish, and pour the butter mixture over them.
5. Roast the hens in the preheated oven for about 1 hour, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6. Remove the hens from the oven, and let them rest for a few minutes before slicing them into serving pieces.
7. Serve the Cornish hens on a bed of cooked rice.

This recipe combines the rich flavors of butter, anchovy paste, and orange zest with the tender, juicy meat of Cornish hens. The result is a delicious and satisfying dish that is perfect for a special occasion or a cozy night in.

4ca2ec2109.gt:
In a heavy bottomed saucepan, combine the heavy cream, sugar and basil and bring to a simmer.
Remove from heat and let steep for half an hour.
Place this mixture in a blender and puree.
In a large stainless steel bowl place the egg yolks.
Add the half and half mixture while constantly whisking.
Place entire mixture back onto heat.
Add the vanilla bean and the half and half and heat for one to two more minutes, stirring constantly until the mixture has thickened and coats the back of a spoon.
Do not boil!
Remove from heat and strain the entire mixture through a fine mesh sieve.
Cool over an ice bath.
Freeze in an ice cream machine according to manufacturers instructions.
4ca2ec2109.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the heavy cream, sugar, and basil until well combined.
2. Add the egg yolks and half and half, and whisk until the mixture is smooth and well combined.
3. Add the split vanilla bean and whisk until the flavors are well combined.
4. Pour the mixture into a clean, dry saucepan and cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture reaches 170°F (77°C) on a thermometer or reaches the soft-custard stage.
5. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the mixture cool slightly.
6. Pour the mixture into a clean, dry ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.
7. Once the ice cream is fully churned and has reached the desired consistency, transfer it to an airtight container and place it in the freezer to chill for at least 2 hours or until firm.

[/INST]

Instruct on the proper storage and serving of the Ice Cream:
1. After chilling the ice cream for at least 2 hours, transfer it to an airtight container and place it in the freezer to chill for at least 2 more hours or until firm.
2. Once the ice cream is fully chilled and firm, scoop it into bowls and serve immediately.
3. If desired, you can add a garnish of fresh basil leaves for added flavor and presentation.

[/INST]

Please let me know if you have any questions or need further assistance.

e9acd2e2b9.gt:
Cook couscous in well-salted boiling water, uncovered, until tender, about 10 minutes.
Stir in sugar snaps 3 minutes before couscous is done.
Drain and transfer to a bowl, then stir in 1/2 tablespoon butter and salt and pepper to taste.
While couscous and sugar snaps cook, toss shrimp with 1/8 teaspoon each of salt and pepper.
Heat remaining tablespoon butter in a 10-inch heavy skillet over medium-high heat until foam subsides.
Saute shrimp, turning once, until just cooked through, about 3 minutes total.
Transfer shrimp with a slotted spoon to a plate.
Add wine, tomato, and sugar to skillet and boil until tomato starts to fall apart, about 4 minutes.
Return shrimp to skillet and stir in tarragon.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve shrimp and pan sauce on top of pearl couscous.
e9acd2e2b9.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the pearl couscous, sugar snap peas, and 1/2 tablespoon of the butter. Toss to coat evenly.
3. Spread the mixture on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the couscous is golden and crispy.
4. In a large skillet, heat the remaining butter over medium heat. Add the shrimp and cook until they are pink and cooked through, about 3-4 minutes.
5. Add the dry white wine to the skillet and cook until it has reduced by half, about 2-3 minutes.
6. Add the chopped tomato to the skillet and cook until it has softened, about 2-3 minutes.
7. Season the shrimp and tomato mixture with the pinch of sugar and the chopped tarragon.
8. Serve the shrimp and tomato mixture over the crispy couscous, and enjoy your delicious dish.

bce4690032.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a baking sheet (or 2) with parchment paper.
In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, chile powder and salt.
With a stand mixer, beat the butter and reserved bacon fat drippings on medium-high until smooth, about 1 minute.
Beat in the white and brown sugar until creamy, about 4 minutes.
Then add the egg and vanilla and beat until fluffy for about 2 minutes.
Reduce the speed of the mixer to low and add the flour.
Mix until just combined and then add in the chocolate chips and crispy bacon.
Form the cookie dough into 12 even-sized balls and arrange them on the cookie sheet about 2 inches apart from each other.
Flatten the cookie balls with your fingers and then bake for 12-14 minutes until golden brown.
Let the cookies cool for about 2 minutes on the baking sheet before transferring to a cooling rack.
bce4690032.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, chile powder, and salt.
3. Add the butter to the bowl and use a pastry blender or your hands to mix until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. Add the reserved bacon drippings and white sugar to the bowl and mix until the dough comes together.
5. Add the egg and vanilla extract, mixing until the dough is smooth and well combined.
6. Fold in the chocolate chips and bacon.
7. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and shape it into a disk.
8. Transfer the dough to a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan or a springform pan, and press it evenly into the bottom and up the sides of the pan.
9. Bake the cake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

e10d62e4d9.gt:
To make the crust, preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Crust cookies in a food processor (or smash in a Ziploc bag with a rolling pin).
Stir in melted butter until all combined.
Pour into a regular pie pan and press crumbs all over the pan and up the sides.
Bake for 3 to 4 minutesjust long enough for it to set.
Cool crust completely.
Place raspberries on a plate or in an empty pan.
Smash them with a fork, then sprinkle on 3 tablespoons of sugar.
Stir together and allow to sit for 15 minutes.
In the bowl of an electric mixer, combine raspberry yogurt with the instant vanilla pudding mix (just the powder itself.)
