55c9dcc2b4.gt:
Cut each cake roll into eight slices; set aside any chocolate coating that separates from rolls for garnish.
Line a 9-inch springform pan with cake slices so that the swirl of cream and chocolate is on it's side and can be seen when you take the springform pan off, completely covering the bottom and sides.
In a small bowl, whisk milk and pudding mixes for 2 minutes.
Let stand for 2 minutes or until soft-set.
Pour over cake.
Spread with whipped topping; sprinkle with any reserved chocolate coating.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.
**Cook time does not include refrigeration time of two hours.
55c9dcc2b4.pred:
To prepare a delicious chocolate dessert, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish and set aside.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chocolate swiss rolls and cold milk. Mix until the chocolate is melted and the mixture is smooth.
4. Add the chocolate fudge instant pudding mix to the mixture and stir until well combined.
5. Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish and smooth the top with a spatula.
6. In a separate bowl, whip the whipped topping until it reaches the desired consistency.
7. Spread the whipped topping evenly over the chocolate mixture.
8. Bake the dessert in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is slightly jiggly.
9. Allow the dessert to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade chocolate dessert!

e03a36dd25.gt:
Place popcorn kernels in paper bag.
Fold the top of the bag 3 times.
Place in microwave.
Set time for 40 to 60 seconds.
(this will vary depending on your microwave, Mine takes 3 minutes total)
When popping has stopped pour popcorn in a bowl and finish popping any unpopped kernels for 15 to 20 seconds (depending on your microwave).
Add rest of popcorn to bowl, when done.
Salt popcorn to your taste and enjoy!
Note: Add melted butter and/or other seasonings over top of popcorn and stir well to distribute butter and seasonings.
e03a36dd25.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the unpopped popcorn and salt. Mix well to ensure even distribution of salt.
3. Spread the popcorn evenly on a baking sheet or a large, flat surface.
4. Drizzle melted butter over the popcorn, if desired.
5. Bake the popcorn in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally to ensure even cooking.
6. Once the popcorn is evenly golden and crispy, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. If desired, season the popcorn with additional seasoning of your choice.
8. Enjoy your delicious homemade popcorn!

Please note that the cooking time may vary depending on the type of popcorn and the oven's temperature. Be sure to check the popcorn frequently to avoid overcooking or burning.

6febef31e3.gt:
Pour the water in a saucepan and heat it until medium hot.
Mix the cocoa powder with the water.
Add in Splenda and mix until the mixture becomes creamy and thick.
Do not add too much Splenda as biscuits themselves are the major source of sweetness in the recipe.
Crush the biscuits separately in a bowl.
Make sure the pieces are neither too big nor extremely powdery.
We just need small pieces.
Add the cocoa mixture to the bowl and mix it lightly with a spoon.
Take a small plastic bag and put in the resulting mixture, roll the plastic bag in a cylinder like shape.
Put the bag in a Refrigerator and allow it to cool for 4-6 hours.
6febef31e3.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cocoa powder and sugar-free shortbread cookies.
3. Add the water and mix until the cookies are evenly coated.
4. Transfer the mixture to a greased baking sheet and press it down evenly to form a crust.
5. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the crust is set and the edges are slightly crisp.
6. Remove the crust from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Spread the Splenda granular evenly over the cooled crust.
8. Return the crust to the oven and bake for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the Splenda granular is melted and the crust is slightly crisp.
9. Allow the crust to cool completely before cutting it into desired pieces.

[/INST]

35d5f29f3c.gt:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Meanwhile, saute onion in the olive oil, along with the dried basil.
Saute over medium heat and stir frequently so the basil does not burn.
Cook until onions are tender and translucent.
Add salt to taste.
When pasta is done, drain and add onion basil mixture.
Add cheese and toss to coat.
Serve warm.
Add salt to taste if needed.
35d5f29f3c.pred:
To prepare a tasty Food, follow these steps:
1. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente.
2. In a large skillet or pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
4. Add the dried basil and cook for another minute, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to combine the ingredients.
6. Season the pasta with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Gradually add the grated mozzarella cheese, stirring until the cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth.
8. Serve the tasty Food immediately, garnished with additional fresh basil if desired.

This delicious pasta dish is a perfect example of combining flavors and textures to create a satisfying and enjoyable meal. The combination of whole wheat penne, onions, olive oil, dried basil, and mozzarella cheese results in a rich and savory dish that is both comforting and satisfying.

08a07f6ff5.gt:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add the rye, Licor 43, lemon juice and egg white and shake vigorously.
Strain into an ice-filled highball glass and top with half of the club soda.
Wait a moment for the drink to froth, then top with the remaining club soda.
08a07f6ff5.pred:
1. First, crack the egg white into a separate bowl.
2. In a separate bowl, mix the ice, rye whiskey, Licor 43, and fresh lemon juice.
3. Stir the ingredients together until well combined.
4. Pour the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
5. Gently stir the mixture to ensure that the ice is well incorporated.
6. Add the chilled club soda to the glass, and stir again.
7. Enjoy your refreshing and delicious cocktail.

[/INST]

1c75a448ec.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Combine all ingredients except flour and walnuts in a mixing bowl.
Mix well.
Gradually add flour until well mixed.
Add walnuts.
You can substitute any nut you prefer.
Variation: I have occasionally omitted the nuts for chocolate chips - or used both.
I would almost say they are better than the toll house recipe.
Bake cookies for about 12 minutes on a cookie sheet.
Enjoy!
1c75a448ec.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until soft and fluffy.
3. Add the brown sugar and continue to mix until well combined.
4. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
7. Fold in the crushed walnuts.
8. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
9. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting and serving.

[/INST]

b69844d37b.gt:
Chill 4 Martini glasses in freezer 30 minutes.
Combine all liquors in cocktail shaker; add ice cubes and shake to chill.
Strain mixture into cold glasses.
Garnish each with orange peel strip.
b69844d37b.pred:
[/INST]

1. In a cocktail shaker, combine the Batavia arrack, manzanilla Sherry, Clement Creole Shrubb, and Homemade Chocolate Liqueur.
2. Add ice cubes to the shaker and shake vigorously for about 15-20 seconds.
3. Strain the mixture into a cocktail glass filled with ice.
4. Garnish the drink with the orange peel strips.
5. Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious cocktail.

This recipe is a unique and flavorful cocktail that combines various ingredients, such as Batavia arrack, manzanilla Sherry, Clement Creole Shrubb, Homemade Chocolate Liqueur, and ice cubes. The combination of these ingredients results in a complex and intriguing taste profile, making it an excellent choice for those who enjoy exploring new and interesting cocktails.

a89ec9f9d3.gt:
* See my TastyKitchen recipe box for my Fail-Proof Pizza Dough recipe, if interested.
Preheat oven to 500 degrees F with a pizza stone inside.
If you dont have a pizza stone, use an upside down cookie sheet.
Mix butter and garlic in a small bowl and set aside.
Spread pizza dough out into a 12-inch circle on parchment paper.
(This makes it easier to transfer the dough to the pizza stone.)
Spread the butter and garlic mixture over dough and top with parmesan and mozzarella cheeses.
Top with a light sprinkling of salt and pepper, if desired.
(That step is totally optional!)
Transfer the dough to the preheated stone or pan.
Bake 9-10 minutes or until bubbly and golden.
Remove from oven and cool 1-2 minutes before cutting.
Serve hot, with marinara.
a89ec9f9d3.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the softened butter, minced garlic, and grated Parmesan cheese. Mix well.
3. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the pizza dough to your desired thickness.
4. Transfer the dough to a pizza stone or a baking sheet.
5. Spread the garlic-Parmesan butter mixture evenly over the dough.
6. Sprinkle the grated mozzarella cheese over the butter.
7. Season the pizza with salt and pepper, if desired.
8. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

This pizza recipe is delicious and easy to make. The combination of the garlic-Parmesan butter, mozzarella cheese, and the crust creates a flavorful and satisfying meal.

865f667783.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Mix together ground beef, chestnuts, soy sauce, brown sugar, onion powder, and garlic powder thoroughly in a large bowl.
Form the mixture into 2 tablespoon-sized balls, and place onto a baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven until no longer pink in the center, about 15 minutes.
Stir together the apricot preserves and the cider vinegar, toss with meatballs in a clean bowl, then return to baking sheet, and bake for an additional 5 minutes.
865f667783.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the water chestnuts and continue cooking until they are tender.
4. In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, brown sugar, onion powder, garlic powder, and apricot preserves or jam.
5. Add the soy sauce mixture to the skillet with the beef and water chestnuts, stirring to combine.
6. Cook for a few more minutes, until the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
8. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the beef is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
9. Serve the cooked dish over rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious Food!

d1c9619b01.gt:
Mix and bake cake according to the package
In a large bowl combine and mix the evaporated, condensed and heavy cream...
When the cake is at room temperature pour the milks over the cake...slowly letting the cake absorb the milk...let it rest in the fridge for 2 to 4 hours and then frost the cake with the cool whip frosting and top it off with the cinammon and sprinkles...
Enjoy!!
!
d1c9619b01.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease and flour a 9-inch (23 cm) round cake pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the French Vanilla Cake Mix, evaporated milk, condensed milk, and heavy whipping cream. Mix until well combined.
4. Add the ground cinnamon and sprinkles to the mixture. Mix until well combined.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan.
6. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. Once the cake is completely cooled, use a serrated knife to cut it into equal portions.
9. To make the frosting, beat the cool whip frosting in a large mixing bowl until stiff peaks form.
10. Spread the frosting evenly over the top and sides of the cake.
11. Serve the cake immediately or store it in the refrigerator for later.

[/INST]

[/INST]

449991b9b4.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Mix first 9 ingredients in large bowl until well blended.
Fill pepper halves with sausage mixture, dividing equally and mounding slightly.
Arrange in 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish.
(Can be made 1 day ahead.
Cover; chill.)
Bake peppers uncovered until tops are browned and thermometer inserted into filling registers 165F, about 1 hour.
Transfer peppers to platter.
Garnish with rosemary sprigs and serve.
449991b9b4.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the sweet Italian sausages, grated zucchini, red onion, minced parsley, breadcrumbs, egg, black pepper, salt, and rosemary.
3. Shape the mixture into small meatballs, and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
4. Bake the meatballs in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are cooked through and golden brown.
5. While the meatballs are baking, prepare the red bell peppers by cutting them in half lengthwise, removing the seeds, and placing them on a separate baking sheet.
6. Roast the red bell peppers in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly charred.
7. Once the meatballs and red bell peppers are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. Serve the meatballs and red bell peppers on a plate, garnished with fresh rosemary sprigs.

[/INST]

0ca9bd3da2.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.To prepare aioli, combine first 5 ingredients in a small bowl; set aside.To prepare crab cakes, combine bell pepper and next 7 ingredients (through black pepper) in a large bowl; stir well with a whisk.
Add panko and crabmeat; toss gently.
Divide the crab mixture into 12 equal portions, shaping each into a 1-inch-thick patty.Heat oil in a large ovenproof skillet coated with cooking spray over medium-high heat.
Add patties; cook 2 minutes.
Carefully turn patties over.
Place pan in oven; bake at 350 for 6 minutes.
0ca9bd3da2.pred:
1. In a small bowl, whisk together the fat-free mayonnaise, chopped chives, parsley, lemon juice, garlic, and red bell pepper. Set aside.
2. In a large bowl, combine the reduced-fat mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, Worcestershire sauce, freshly ground black pepper, and panko.
3. Add the lump crabmeat to the large bowl and mix until well combined.
4. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
5. Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray.
6. Transfer the crab mixture to the prepared baking sheet, and shape it into a patty.
7. Bake the crab cake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until cooked through and golden brown.
8. Serve the crab cake on a plate, garnished with additional chopped chives and parsley.

[/INST]

c651774003.gt:
Wrap each banana slice with a piece of bacon.
Fry wrapped banana in a skillet until bacon is desired crispness, 15 to 30 minutes.
Remove wrapped bananas from skillet with a toothpick and place on a serving dish.
c651774003.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil for easy cleanup.
3. Place the banana slices on the prepared baking sheet.
4. Drizzle the banana slices with a little bit of olive oil, if desired.
5. Roast the banana slices in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes, or until they are soft and slightly caramelized.
6. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the banana slices cool for a few minutes.
7. While the banana slices are cooling, cook the bacon in a skillet or on a baking sheet in the oven, until it is crispy.
8. Once the bacon is cooked, remove it from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Once the bacon is cool, crumble it into small pieces.
10. Combine the cooked bacon and the banana slices in a bowl.
11. Optionally, you can add a pinch of salt and pepper for extra flavor.
12. Serve the banana and bacon mixture as a delicious and healthy snack or dessert.

[/INST]

[/OUTLINE]

59de26d69e.gt:
Saute onions and celery
Add chicken powder & 4 cups of water add chicken pieces (wingdings) & cook on med high for 45mins
Add cream of chicken let cook for another 30 mins
Cook rice as it states on the box
Place rice on plate top with chicken and enjoy
59de26d69e.pred:
[/SYS]

[INST]
To create a delicious and satisfying chicken and rice dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and sauté until softened.
3. Add the season all, garlic powder, and knorrs chicken powder to the skillet. Cook for a few seconds, stirring to combine.
4. Add the rice to the skillet, stirring to coat the rice with the seasoning mixture.
5. Pour in the cream of chicken and water, stirring to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the skillet. Cook for about 20-25 minutes, or until the rice is tender and the liquid is absorbed.
7. Remove the skillet from the heat and let it sit, covered, for a few minutes.
8. Transfer the cooked rice and chicken mixture to a large baking dish.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the rice is golden brown.
10. Serve the dish hot, garnished with fresh parsley, if desired.

[/SYS]

[/INST]

e4e4b2152e.gt:
Heat oven to 400 degrees.
Add 3/4 can water to soup.
Heat.
Mix 3/4 can water with flour.
Stir into soup.
Cook, stirring until it thickens.
Add tuna.
Pour into a baking dish.
Mix Bisquick with milk.
Roll into an 8x10 rectangle.
Spread with cheese and pimiento.
Roll like a jelly roll.
Cut into 12 slices.
Place on the tuna mixture.
Bake for 15 minutes.
e4e4b2152e.pred:
To prepare a delicious and satisfying meal using the provided ingredients, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the two cans of Vegetarian Vegetable Soup, 4 tablespoons of flour, and 2 cans of tuna.
3. Add the Bisquick and milk, stirring until the mixture is smooth and well-combined.
4. Season the mixture with grated sharp cheddar cheese, pimiento, and salt and pepper to taste.
5. Transfer the mixture to a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
6. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
7. Serve the casserole hot and enjoy your delicious meal!

This meal combines the flavors of the vegetable soup, tuna, and bisquick, creating a hearty and satisfying dish. The addition of cheese and pimiento adds depth and richness to the dish, making it a delightful and comforting meal.

01eb818f49.gt:
Cook the chicken breast pieces in the water in a large pot over high heat until done (170 degrees).
Remove the chicken pieces to plate and cover with plastic wrap; set aside.
Pour the dried pasta in to the same boiling water and cook until tender, about 6 minutes.
Drain in a colander; set aside.
Place the Greek yogurt, the Hidden Valley Original Ranch Seasoning Mix, the reserved marinating juice from the artichoke hearts, Parmesan cheese, the zest and juice of the lemon, white pepper, curry and cayenne powders in a small sized bowl and whisk until well blended and smooth.
Add in the 2 diced chives, carrots, celery, parsley, shallots and pimento and gently stir.
Pour this mixture over the cooked pasta in a larger bowl and add the cooked chicken breast pieces that have been diced into small cubes.
Mix until all is evenly coated.
To serve, plate a serving of the pasta mixture and garnish with (optional) parsley, several grape tomatoes, 1 purple cabbage leaf, chives pieces and several quarters of artichoke hearts.
01eb818f49.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chicken breast, water, and seasoning mix. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 2 hours.
3. In a separate large bowl, combine the pasta, Greek yogurt, lemon juice, and zest, white pepper, curry powder, and cayenne pepper. Mix well.
4. Drain the chicken and discard the marinade. Shred the chicken into bite-sized pieces and add it to the pasta mixture. Stir to combine.
5. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the sliced carrots and cook until they are tender, about 5 minutes.
6. Add the shredded chicken and pasta mixture to the skillet and cook until the pasta is heated through, about 5 minutes.
7. Stir in the artichoke hearts and pimientos. Cook for an additional 2 minutes.
8. Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the reserved marinade from the jar of artichoke hearts.
9. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Serve the chicken and pasta mixture over the cooked pasta and garnish with the chopped celery, chives, and red cabbage.

Enjoy your delicious and healthy chicken and pasta dish!

22df25b9dd.gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Mix baking crumbs and butter; press onto bottom of 9-inch springform pan.
Beat cream cheese and granulated sugar in large bowl with mixer until blended.
Add chocolate and liqueur; mix well.
Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended.
Pour over crust.
Bake 45 to 50 min.
or until centre is almost set.
Run knife around rim of pan to loosen cake; cool before removing rim.
Refrigerate cheesecake 4 hours.
Sprinkle icing sugar over cheesecake just before serving.
Top with berries.
22df25b9dd.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, softened Philadelphia Brick Cream Cheese, granulated sugar, and melted Baker's Semi-Sweet Chocolate. Mix until smooth and well combined.
3. Add the hazelnut-flavored liqueur and eggs to the mixture, and continue to mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the Oreo Baking Crumbs, mixed fresh berries, and icing sugar.
5. Add the Oreo Baking Crumbs mixture to the chocolate mixture, and mix until well combined.
6. Grease a 9x9 inch (23x23 cm) baking dish, and pour the batter into it.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Food!

f0e77c97c6.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Brown onion, garlic and ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat for about 4 minutes.
Add red pepper flakes and continue cooking until the ground beef is fully cooked.
(If using fresh cabbage, add here and cook until soft.)
Drain extra fat out of the skillet then stir in drained sauerkraut and Worcestershire.
Heat through and set aside.
Press 1 package of crescent roll dough into the bottom of a lightly greased 9x13-inch baking dish.
Spread beef mixture on top and cover with cheese.
Lay second package of crescent roll dough over the top of the beef and cheese mixture.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
f0e77c97c6.pred:
[/INST]

[INST] <<SYS>>
To make a delicious and satisfying beef and sauerkraut cabbage roll, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until it is browned and cooked through. Drain any excess fat.
3. Add the minced garlic and red pepper flakes to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook for about 1 minute, or until fragrant.
4. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked ground beef, sauerkraut, Worcestershire sauce, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Mix well.
5. Roll out the crescent rolls on a floured surface, and cut them into bite-sized pieces.
6. Place a spoonful of the beef and sauerkraut mixture in the center of each crescent roll piece. Fold the dough over the filling, creating a half-moon shape.
7. Place the filled crescent rolls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the rolls in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the crescent rolls are golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
9. Remove the rolls from the oven, and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious beef and sauerkraut cabbage rolls!
<</SYS>>

[/INST]

93479dc342.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees.
In a large mixing bowl, cream sugar, shortening, and salt.
Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
Add extract and mix well.
In a separate bowl, sift flour and baking powder.
Add milk to creamed mixture.
Add flour mixture to creamed mixture.
Fold in coconut.
Bake in a greased and floured bundt pan for 1 hour.
About 10 minutes before cake is done, combine sugar, extract and water in a small saucepen.
Bring to a boil and boil one minute.
Pour over cake immediately after removing cake from the oven.
Let cake sit 30 minutes before removing from pan.
93479dc342.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, butter flavor Crisco, salt, and eggs.
2. Gradually add the flour, baking powder, and milk, mixing until smooth.
3. Stir in the coconut extract and coconut flakes.
4. Gradually add the water, mixing until the batter is smooth and free of lumps.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch round cake pan.
6. Bake the cake in a preheated oven at 350°F (175°C) for about 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

18c37b1d2b.pred:
1. In a medium-sized mixing bowl, combine the part-skim ricotta cheese, natural-style peanut butter, and vanilla extract.
2. Gradually add the sugar substitute, stirring until well combined.
3. Optionally, you can add a pinch of salt to taste.
4. If desired, you can also add a splash of milk to achieve the desired consistency.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
6. Once the mixture has chilled, you can use it as desired. You can spread it on toast, use it as a filling for desserts, or even use it as a base for a smoothie.

This recipe is versatile and can be easily customized to suit your preferences. Enjoy!

9bde591cc5.gt:
In a large skillet, brown the ground meat and drain off any grease.
Add the chopped onion and cook for about 3 minutes, until the onions are softened.
Add the cabbage and water and cook for about 5 minutes, or until the cabbage starts to wilt.
Add the tomatoes, brown sugar, vinegar, salt, caraway seed and garlic.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat and cover.
Simmer until the cabbage is cooked to the desired tenderness, about 30 minutes.
Serve with white rice.
9bde591cc5.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the ground chuck, onion, and cabbage.
3. Add the water, crushed tomatoes, brown sugar, white vinegar, salt, caraway seeds, and garlic powder. Mix well.
4. Transfer the mixture to a greased baking dish.
5. Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake for 1 1/2 hours or until the meat is cooked through and the cabbage is tender.
6. Remove the foil and continue to bake for an additional 15-20 minutes or until the sauce is thickened and bubbly.
7. Serve the dish hot.

[/SYS]

e1cc65aa99.gt:
Grease 9 x 13 inch pan.
Heat syrup, butter and morsels to boiling stirring constantly.
Remove from heat, stir in vanilla.
Pour over cereal in bowl, toss until coated.
Fold in marshmallows 1 cup at a time.
Press into pan with buttered back of spoon.
Let stand 1 hour.
Cut into 2 inch squares.
Store at room temperature.
e1cc65aa99.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the light corn syrup, butter, and vanilla.
3. Add the milk chocolate chips to the bowl and stir until they are melted and well combined.
4. Gradually add the Golden Grahams cereal to the mixture, stirring until the cereal is evenly coated.
5. Fold in the miniature marshmallows.
6. Transfer the mixture to a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
8. Allow the bars to cool completely before cutting them into squares.

Enjoy your delicious Food!

f3de3243b2.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Cut twelve 1/2 slices on the diagonal from the baguette.
Lay them out on a baking sheet and lightly brush the tops with olive oil and sprinkle with black pepper.
Bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden-brown.
When done remove the pan from the oven and set it aside.
Meanwhile, cook the bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crispy.
When done, set bacon aside on a paper towel-lined plate.
Very thinly slice the brie and set aside.
Cut the peaches in half and remove the pit.
Lay the halves flat-side down and cut into 1/4 thick slices.
Heat a grill pan over medium-high and lightly coat with cooking spray.
Grill the peaches for no more than 60 seconds on each side, brushing lightly with balsamic vinegar.
Place a piece of brie on each crostini, followed by half a piece of bacon and a peach slice.
Arrange them on a platter, sprinkle with chopped basil, and serve.
Makes 12 crostini.
f3de3243b2.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).

2. Slice the French Baguette into 1-inch (2.5 cm) pieces.

3. In a large skillet, heat the Extra Virgin Olive Oil over medium heat. Add the sliced Bacon and cook until crispy, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the Bacon from the skillet and set aside.

4. In the same skillet, add the sliced Brie Cheese and cook until melted and slightly bubbly, about 2-3 minutes.

5. Add the sliced Peaches to the skillet, cooking until they are tender and slightly caramelized, about 3-4 minutes.

6. In a small bowl, mix the Cooking Spray, Balsamic Vinegar, and Chopped Fresh Basil.

7. Spread the mixture over the cooked Brie and Peaches in the skillet.

8. Place the sliced French Baguette pieces on top of the Brie and Peaches.

9. Drizzle the Balsamic Glaze mixture over the Baguette pieces.

10. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the Baguette is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.

11. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

4c06a6e6ee.gt:
Mix the sugar and Boric Acic well.
Add the warm water slowly, mixing all the while so it won't be too lumpy.
Store in a jar.
When ready to use, put cotton into the top of a jar lid to fill it, and then saturate the cotton to the top.
Place where you want it; make several if you need it.
Will keep for a long while.
NOTE: I usually drip a drop or two over the edge of the lid to rest on the counter so they will find it sooner.
It sometimes takes a little while for them to find it, but find it they will.
When they do, let them alone; you will want to kill them because they look so creepy; but don't because they will hang over the edge of the lid and drink, drink, drink, and then take it back to the nest.
Almost over night, they will be gone.
4c06a6e6ee.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, boric acid, and warm water.
3. Stir until the sugar is fully dissolved.
4. Add the ingredients of your choice, such as flour, baking powder, and any other desired flavorings or spices.
5. Mix until a smooth batter is formed.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured loaf pan.
7. Bake for 1 hour or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade cake!

cfc57858dc.gt:
Chill a serving bowl in the freezer while you make the salsa.
In a mixing bowl, combine the chopped green chiles, onion, green olives, and black olives.
Lightly mix in the Cheddar cheese and tomatoes; season to taste with garlic salt and black pepper.
If desired, mix in a little bit of the olive brine.
Serve in the chilled bowl.
cfc57858dc.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the drained green chiles, onion, green olives, black olives, shredded Cheddar cheese, ground black pepper, garlic salt, and red tomatoes.
3. Mix the ingredients well to ensure they are evenly distributed.
4. If the mixture seems dry, you can add a bit of olive oil or water to achieve the desired consistency.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.
7. Enjoy your delicious homemade Food!

[/INST]

21827f90ac.gt:
Bring carrots and cauliflower to boil in 1 inch water in Dutch oven or large deep skillet; cover.
Cook 2 min.
Add broccoli; cook, covered, 3 to 5 min.
or until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Meanwhile, heat oil in small saucepan on medium-high heat.
Add onions; cook and stir 1 min.
Add cream cheese product and milk; cook and stir 2 to 3 min.
or until cream cheese is completely melted and mixture is well blended, stirring frequently.
Drain vegetables; place in bowl.
Top with cream cheese sauce.
21827f90ac.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced carrots, cauliflower florets, broccoli florets, and green onions.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together the oil, Philadelphia Chive & Onion Cream Cheese Product, and milk.
4. Pour the cream cheese mixture over the vegetables and toss to coat evenly.
5. Transfer the vegetables to a baking dish and spread them out evenly.
6. Roast the vegetables in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
7. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Serve the roasted vegetables as a side dish or a main course.

[/INST]

[/INST]

This recipe is a delicious and healthy way to enjoy a variety of vegetables. The combination of carrots, cauliflower, and broccoli provides a balance of flavors and textures, while the cream cheese mixture adds a rich, creamy element. The roasting process enhances the natural flavors of the vegetables and creates a delightful, warm, and comforting dish.

12da18d9e5.gt:
In a large pot, cook the wheat berries according to the package directions.
Set aside and let cool to room temperature.
In a medium bowl, whisk together the apple cider vinegar, orange juice, salt, pepper, nutmeg, cinnamon, olive oil and lemon juice.
Set aside.
In a large bowl, toss the cooked wheat berries, Goji berries, apple, celery, scallions, parsley and pecans together until combined.

To create a delicious and satisfying dish, you can try this recipe for a cheesy scallion and green pepper omelette.

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch scallion (sliced)
- 1 small green pepper (chopped)
- 2 ounces Canadian bacon (chopped)
- 12 cup shredded reduced-fat cheddar cheese
- 1 cup fat-free evaporated milk
- 34 cup liquid egg substitute
- 2 teaspoons Dijon mustard
- 14 teaspoon ground nutmeg
- 1 tablespoon grated parmesan cheese

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the egg substitute, milk, mustard, nutmeg, and parmesan cheese. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

4. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add the Canadian bacon and cook until it is crispy, then remove it from the skillet and set aside.
5. Pour the egg mixture into the skillet and cook until the edges start to set. Add the chopped scallion and green pepper mixture to the skillet and stir gently. Cook until the eggs are fully set and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Transfer the omelette to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Serve the omelette hot and enjoy!

Grind cookies in a food processor into fine crumbs; transfer to a large mixing bowl.
Grind pecans in the food processor; add to cookie crumbs.
Stir 1 cup confectioners' sugar, bourbon whiskey, cocoa powder, and corn syrup with the cookies and pecans until the mixture holds together; roll into 3/4-inch balls.

Roll balls in coconut and sugar to coat.

b379bad205.gt:
Place potato and 3 tbs water in a small bowl.
Cover with plastic wrap, vent and microwave 4 minutes or until tender, stirring once.
Set aside.
Heat a 10" skillet over med-high heat.
Coat pan with cooking spray and add onion.
Cover and cook 10 minutes or until lightly browned, stirring occasionally.
Uncover and cook 10 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently.
While onions cook, add 1/3 cup water, 1 Tbs at a time to prevent sticking.
Stir in potato, sage, salt and pepper.
Spoon into bowl and cool.
Combine 1/4 cup cheese, milk, egg whites and eggs in a bowl.
Add egg mixture to potato mixture and stir well.
Preheat broiler.
Pour mixture into skillet coated with cooking spray.
Cook over medium heat for 7 minutes or until bottom of frittata is browned and top is almost set.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on top and broil for 5 minutes or until cheese melts and top is set.

625c3e8493.gt:
Add coarsely chopped or halved cherries to a large pot.
Add lemon juice, cherry Kirsch, and vanilla extract and bring the mixture to a slow boil over medium-high heat.
In a bowl, whisk together cocoa powder and 2 cups of sugar until it is evenly distributed and there are no clumps.
Add the cocoa/sugar mixture to the cherries.
Add the remaining sugar.
Bring the mixture back up to a boil.
Stir in the butter and reduce the heat to medium.
Simmer for 1215 minutes, stirring often, until the sugar has completely dissolved and the mixture has thickened slightly.
The sauce will thicken further once it cools.
To can and store the Black Forest Sundae Sauce: Ladle hot sundae sauce into sterilized half pint jars, leaving 1/4 headspace.
Wipe jar rims and add lids.
Process jars in a boiling water bath for 10 minutes.
Remove the jars and cool on wire racks.
Store in a cool, dark place.
Store any opened jars in the refrigerator.

add to dry ingredients, just till moistened --

337c3e4209.gt:
Heat oven to 350 degrees.
Wash potatoes and leave the skins on.
Cut into large, equal-sized chunks, and place them in a large mixing bowl.
Slice the onion thickly, separate and place them in the bowl as well.
Add all of your dry ingredients, along with the olive oil, and give it a good mix to evenly distribute everything together.
Cut each sausage link into thirds and place in the bowl with the potatoes and onions.
From here, I mix this all together with my hands.
Gently mix the sausage into the potato and onion mixture, trying not to break apart the sausage as you do this.
Dump this all into a 13 x 9 baking dish and cover with aluminum foil.
Place in the oven and allow this to cook for a minimum of one hour.
After an hour, turn the oven up to 400 degrees, remove the foil and place back in the oven until the sausage is nicely brown.
Stir every few minutes so all the sausage gets some equal browning space.
This can take anywhere from 15 to 30 minutes to achieve.
Make sure you watch this closely after returning to the oven so your potatoes and sausage dont burn.
Notes: I used light tasting olive oil, which is my preference.
If you prefer a stronger tasting oil, like extra virgin olive oil, feel free to use it.
While I normally cook with fresh, chopped garlic, I dont use it in this recipe, and substitute the garlic powder.
Fresh garlic tends to pool in the bottom of the dish, or on the top, and burns when browning the sausage.

Have the biscuits ready to put in oven
Start cooking the Sausage.

Leave sausage in pan.

FRIED SCRUMBLE EGGS
fried scrumble egg set aside
BAKE BACON

until completely dissolved.

Stir in pineapple; set aside.
Add 1-1/2 cups of the whipped topping to remaining gelatin; stir with wire whisk until well blended.
Pour into 9-inch square dish.
Refrigerate 15 min.
or until set but not firm.
Carefully spoon fruited gelatin over creamy layer in dish.
Refrigerate at least 3 hours or until firm.
Cut into 9 squares.
Serve topped evenly with the remaining whipped topping.
6bf369490a.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the boiling water and JELL-O Strawberry Flavor Sugar Free Gelatin. Stir until the gelatin is completely dissolved.
2. Add the pineapple chunks and ice cubes to the bowl, and stir until the pineapple is well combined.
3. Pour the mixture into a large, clear, plastic container or a large bowl.
4. Cover the container or bowl with plastic wrap or aluminum foil. Refrigerate the mixture for at least 4 hours or overnight.
5. After refrigeration, divide the mixture into 8 equal portions.
6. In a large bowl, combine the COOL WHIP FREE Whipped Topping and 1/2 cup of boiling water. Stir until the whipped topping is well combined.
7. Spoon the whipped topping mixture onto the 8 portions of the JELL-O mixture.

5c462ab39b.gt:
Mix all ingredients well and refrigerate for a few hours to let the flavors blend!
Its that simple!
My mom got this recipe from a friend of hers more than 20 years ago.
Her friend got the recipe while staying at an Inn/B&B named The Magnolia in Napa Valley.
5c462ab39b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the grated onion, oil, and sugar. Mix well.
3. Add the ketchup, red wine vinegar, and mix until well combined.
4. Pour the mixture into a baking dish or casserole dish.
5. Bake the mixture in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness.
6. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

This delicious food is a perfect combination of flavors and textures, with the sweetness of the sugar, the tanginess of the vinegar, and the sharpness of the onion. It is a versatile dish that can be served as a side dish or a main course, and can be customized with additional ingredients or seasonings to suit your taste preferences.

51e70cd927.gt:
Heat oven to 425 degrees F.
Cut potatoes lengthwise in half; place, cut sides down, on foil-covered rimmed baking sheet.
Bake 30 to 35 min.
or until tender.
Scoop out centers of potatoes into bowl, leaving 1/4-inch-thick shells.
Add Neufchatel, milk, sugar and cinnamon to potatoes; mash until blended.
Fill shells with potato mixture; top with nuts.
Bake 8 min.
or until potatoes are heated through and nuts are toasted.
51e70cd927.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Wash the sweet potatoes thoroughly and pat them dry with a paper towel.
3. Cut the sweet potatoes into evenly sized cubes, about 1-1/2 inches (3.8 cm) in size.
4. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sweet potatoes, Neufchatel cheese, fat-free milk, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, and chopped pecans.
5. Mix the ingredients well, ensuring that the sweet potatoes are evenly coated with the other ingredients.
6. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish, and spread it evenly across the bottom.
7. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes are tender and slightly crispy on the edges.
8. Remove the dish from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Serve the sweet potato and cheese mixture hot, garnished with additional chopped pecans if desired.

This delicious recipe combines the natural sweetness of sweet potatoes with the creamy and rich flavor of Neufchatel cheese, creating a satisfying and comforting dish. The brown sugar adds a touch of warmth and sweetness, while the cinnamon and pecans provide a delightful crunch and additional depth of flavor. This recipe is perfect for a cozy evening meal or a hearty side dish to accompany any main course.

5bcccb4e9b.gt:
Heat 1 Tbsp.
oil in medium nonstick skillet on medium-high heat.
Add potatoes and red pepper, cook 8 to 10 min.
or until tender; transfer to bowl; set aside.
Meanwhile in small bowl, whisk eggs and pepper.
Heat remaining oil in skillet.
Add egg mixture; cook 2 to 3 min.
or until eggs are almost set, lifting edge with spatula and tilting skillet to allow uncooked portion to flow underneath.
When egg mixture is set but top is still slightly moist, top with potato mixture and cheese.
Slip spatula underneath omelette, tip skillet to loosen and gently fold omelette in half.
Cook 1 to 2 min.
Slide or flip onto serving plate; cut in half.
5bcccb4e9b.pred:
To make Food, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine 2 Tbsp. oil, 1 cup Yukon gold potatoes, and 1 cup chopped red pepper. Toss to mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and black pepper.
4. Pour the egg mixture over the potato and red pepper mixture, and stir gently to combine.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish, and sprinkle the Cracker Barrel Shredded Double Cheddar Cheese evenly over the top.
6. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Serve the Food hot, and enjoy!

[/INST]

26e693a67f.gt:
Heat oven to 425F.
Spray pie pan with cooking spray.
Place crust in pan and crimp edges.
Toss apples with lemon juice.
Stir in sugars and flour.
Pour into prepared crust.
Mix sugar into oatmeal.
Cut margarine into oatmeal, I do this with my fingers, you can use two forks or pastry blender.
Sprinkle oatmeal mixture on apples.
Place in oven for about 25 minutes Then take out and place foil around edges and put back in oven for about 20 minutes more.
Allow to cool before serving at least 15 minutes.
26e693a67f.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the pie crust, oatmeal, flour, sugar, and lemon juice. Mix well.
3. Add the apples, light margarine, and spiced sugar. Mix until the apples are coated evenly.
4. Pour the mixture into a pie dish and smooth the top.
5. Bake the pie for 45-50 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the apples are tender.
6. Allow the pie to cool for a few minutes before serving.

This delicious apple pie recipe utilizes the ingredients provided, including the pie crust, apples, sugar, flour, oatmeal, and light margarine. The pie crust is prepared, and the apples are sliced and added to the mixture. The sugar, flour, and oatmeal are combined, and the lemon juice is added to enhance the flavor. The light margarine is used to grease the pie dish, and the mixture is poured into the dish. The pie is baked in the oven until the crust is golden brown and the apples are tender. Finally, the pie is allowed to cool for a few minutes before serving, allowing the flavors to meld together and creating a delicious apple pie.

78bbc2284a.gt:
1.
Place the grapes on a parchment-lined plate in the freezer.
2.
Pour the boiling water over the hibiscus flowers, cover and allow to steep 15-20 minutes.
Whisk in the sugar until it dissolves.
3.
Pour the red wine and sliced peaches into a small pitcher.
Strain the hibiscus tea over the top, discarding the flowers.
4.
Chill this mixture until ready to serve.
5.
Stir in the frozen grapes, and enjoy while watching the sunset.

1. Wash and de-stem the grapes thoroughly.
2. Place the grapes and boiling water in a saucepan.
3. Allow the grapes to soak in the water for a few minutes.
4. Remove the grapes from the water and place them in a blender or food processor.
5. Add the dried hibiscus flowers and sugar to the blender or food processor.
6. Blend the mixture until it reaches a smooth consistency.
7. Pour the mixture into a saucepan.
8. Add the red wine to the saucepan and stir.
9. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 15 minutes.
10. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
11. Add the sliced peach to the saucepan and stir.
12. Allow the mixture to cool completely.
13. Serve the cooled mixture in a bowl or glass.

f87c45ee62.gt:
Place margarine, marshmallow creme and vanilla in small bowl; beat on medium speed until well blended.
Gradually add sugar, beating after each addition until well blended.
Blend in 1 Tbsp.
of the milk.
Add remaining 1 Tbsp.
milk if necessary for desired spreading consistency.
f87c45ee62.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened margarine or butter, Jet-Puffed Marshmallow Creme, and vanilla. Mix until well combined.
3. Gradually add the powdered sugar, mixing until smooth and creamy.
4. If the mixture is too thick, add a small amount of milk, a tablespoon at a time, until it reaches your desired consistency.
5. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are slightly golden.
7. Allow the mixture to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into desired shapes using a sharp knife or cookie cutters.
8. Transfer the cookies to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade cookies!

4a46bab1e9.gt:
Mix all ingredients together, I use my stand mixer with the dough hook.
Let mixer kneed the dough for about 5 minutes.
Dough should be moist and pliable but not sticky, if it is dry add more water, if it is too sticky add a little extra flour.
Coat a bowl with a little oil place dough in the bowl and cover with cling wrap and leave for about 1 hour or till doubled in size.
Once doubled in size dust bench lightly with flour turn out dough and lightly press down to remove a little of the air.
Form into your choice of loaf, I like to use a proofing basket, but you could use a tin or free form.
Let the loaf rise for another 40 min to 1 hour.
Pre heat your oven to super hot 450 F/ 250C.
I use a pizza stone but it can go straight in the oven on a tray if you don't have one.
Leave oven temp on high for 10 min then reduce to 375 F/ 190 C for a further 20 minute.
Enjoy!
4a46bab1e9.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the whole wheat flour, white bread flour, honey, and salt.
2. Add the yeast to the mixture and stir to combine.
3. Gradually add the Greek yogurt and water, stirring until the dough comes together.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it is smooth and elastic, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a damp cloth, and let it rise in a warm place until it has doubled in size, about 1-2 hours.
6. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
7. Punch down the dough and transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
8. Roll out the dough to your desired thickness and shape.
9. Place the rolled-out dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Prick the dough with a fork to prevent air pockets from forming during baking.
11. Bake the bread in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until it is golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.
12. Remove the bread from the oven and let it cool on a wire rack for 5-10 minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

3182df418c.pred:
1. Wash and chop the watermelon, cucumbers, and red onions into bite-sized pieces.
2. In a large bowl, combine the chopped watermelon, cucumbers, red onions, and cilantro.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the Kraft Zesty Italian Dressing, minced serrano chiles, and salt.
4. Pour the dressing mixture over the chopped vegetables and stir to combine.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
6. Serve the salad immediately or let it sit for a bit longer to allow the flavors to develop further.

aacb2f290c.gt:
Preheat grill to medium high.
Drizzle oil and lemon juice over romaine and season with salt and pepper.
Place on grill and cook for 1-2 minutes per side.
Place cooked romaine on 2 plates and drizzle with dressing top with anchovies, cheese and or croutons.
Enjoy!
aacb2f290c.pred:

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the romaine lettuce hearts, sliced in half with stem still attached, and toss them with the olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
3. Spread the romaine mixture evenly on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the lettuce is slightly wilted and the edges are slightly crispy.
4. While the lettuce is roasting, prepare the caesar salad dressing by combining the prepared caesar salad dressing, anchovy (if using), and freshly grated parmesan cheese (if using).
5. Once the lettuce is done, remove it from the oven and let it cool slightly.
6. In a large mixing bowl, combine the roasted romaine lettuce, croutons, and caesar salad dressing mixture. Toss everything together until the lettuce is well coated.
7. Optionally, season the grilled chicken breast with any desired seasonings, and serve the salad alongside the grilled chicken breast.

This recipe provides a delicious and healthy meal option, combining the freshness of the roasted romaine lettuce with the rich flavors of the caesar salad dressing and the grilled chicken breast. The combination of these ingredients creates a satisfying and balanced dish that can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

35f4aac182.gt:
Place rice into the bento, cover the whole surface with bonito flakes, and drizzle with a round of soy sauce.
Top it with shredded nori seaweed and roasted sesame.
The crackly texture and aroma of the baked seaweed is delicious.
Cover with lots of kettle-cooked shirasu.
Shred shiso leaves and scatter.
It smells great.
Top it with ginger to taste .
Grate a daikon radish, lightly squeezing out the excess water, mix with ponzu sauce in a small container to make grated ponzu sauce.
It tastes great to eat this with the grated ponzu sauce from Step 5.
In addition to the bento: Misakiko fried tuna katsu, Kanagawa komatsuna and daikon radish, aburaage stir-fry, Odawara fish paste with shiso leaves and pickled plums, imitation crab meat fried eggs, and tomatoes and shiso leaves.
Try eating the fried tuna katsu with lots of grated daikon and ponzu sauce from Step 5 ..
35f4aac182.pred:
1. In a large bowl, mix together the cooked rice, Bonito flakes, Soy sauce, Roasted sesame, Shredded nori seaweed, Kettle-cooked shirasu, Grated ginger, and Shiso leaf.
2. Season the mixture with a dash of Ponzu to taste.
3. Serve the dish immediately, garnished with the grated daikon radish if desired.

This recipe combines the flavors of the ingredients to create a delicious and satisfying dish. The rice serves as the base, providing a starchy and slightly chewy texture. The Bonito flakes add a savory and slightly salty taste, while the Soy sauce adds depth and umami. The Roasted sesame and Shredded nori seaweed contribute a touch of crunch and a hint of sea saltiness. The Kettle-cooked shirasu and Grated ginger provide a contrasting texture and a burst of freshness, while the Shiso leaf adds a touch of herbal flavor. Finally, the Grated daikon radish and Ponzu provide a zesty and tangy contrast to the overall dish.

6f3b4ebeac.gt:
Cut the apple/pear and ginger into fine pieces.
Thinly slice the chili.
Mix chili, ginger, syrup, cinnamon, orange juice and zest in a saucepan and heat until it is boiling.
Add the apples/pears and bring to a boil again.
Add walnuts and raisins, and boil for about 5 minutes.
Pour into a glass with a tight fitting lid and cool completely.
(It will thicken up a bit when cooled down.)
Store in the fridge for a few weeks.
Serve with home baked baguettes, artisan bread and lots of wonderful cheeses.
Yum!
Enjoy!
6f3b4ebeac.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the peeled and cored apples or pears, fresh ginger, whole red chili, and maple syrup. Mix well to ensure the apples or pears are evenly coated with the syrup.
3. Add the zest and juice of the orange, cinnamon, and raisins to the bowl. Mix everything together until well combined.
4. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until the apples or pears are tender and the syrup has thickened.
5. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Add the walnuts to the dish and mix everything together.
7. Serve the cooked dish immediately or let it cool completely before serving.

This step-by-step guide will help you create a delicious and healthy dish using the provided ingredients. The combination of apples, pears, ginger, chili, maple syrup, orange, cinnamon, raisins, and walnuts results in a flavorful and nutritious dish that can be enjoyed by everyone.

4816a33066.gt:
Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat until shimmering.
Add onion and salt and stir until coated with oil.
Reduce heat to medium, cover, and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is soft, about 10 minutes (if onion begins to burn after 5 minutes, reduce heat to low).
Add garlic and chili powder and cook, uncovered, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add beef and cook, breaking up meat with wooden spoon, until just pink, about 3 minutes.
Add 1/4 teaspoon pepper, brown sugar, tomato puree, ketchup, water, and hot sauce.
Simmer until Sloppy Joe sauce is slightly thicker than ketchup, 8 to 10 minutes.
Adjust seasonings.
Spoon meat mixture onto hamburger buns and serve.
Make Ahead: If you find yourself with leftover Sloppy Joes or just feel like making a double batch, the meat mixture freezes well for up to one month.
To return the meat mixture to its original consistency, you may need to add a little water when it is reheated.
4816a33066.pred:
1. Preheat a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion to the skillet and cook until it is soft and translucent, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the minced garlic to the skillet and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly to avoid burning.
4. Add the ground beef to the skillet and cook until it is browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
5. Stir in the ground black pepper, brown sugar, and chili powder. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. Pour in the ketchup, tomato puree, water, and hot pepper sauce. Stir to combine.
7. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened and the beef is cooked through.
8. Season the beef mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Serve the beef mixture in hamburger buns, garnished with additional chopped onion and tomato if desired.

[/INST]

27b86a0c47.gt:
Combine Parmesan cheese, lemon juice, anchovy paste, pepper, Worcestershire sauce, egg yolk, and minced garlic in a mini food processor; process 15 seconds.
With the processor on, gradually add olive oil, processing until combined.
Toss with romaine lettuce.

4. Add the garlic, minced, to the egg yolk and whisk until combined.
5. Gradually drizzle in the extra-virgin olive oil while continuing to whisk.

842d3c7eb8.gt:
Combine and mix all of the ingredients together in a bowl.
Mix the egg whites in a cutting motion.
Strain the mixture through a sieve and cook the tamagoyaki in a tamagoyaki pan.
Once cooled, cut into long strips.

1. In a small bowl, whisk together 3 eggs, 1 tablespoon of Shiro-dashi, and 3 tablespoons of water.
2. In a separate bowl, mix 2 tablespoons of sugar and 1 tablespoon of sake.
3. Add a pinch of salt to the egg mixture.
4. Combine the egg mixture and the sugar-sake mixture, and whisk until smooth.
5. Heat a small frying pan over medium heat. Pour the egg mixture into the pan, and cook until the edges start to set.

131faa12b8.gt:
Stir together 1 cup yogurt, 2 tablespoons oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, salt and spices.
Add chicken and turn until well coated.
Marinate at room temperature for 20 minutes.
While the chicken is marinating, preheat grill.
While grill is heating, stir together remaining 1 1/4 cups yogurt and 1 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice and salt to taste.
Reduce grill to moderate heat.
Grill chicken (discard marinade), on lightly oiled grill rack, turning occasionally (closing grill between turns), until cooked through, 10 to 12 minutes total.
Transfer chicken to a platter.
Toss together mint, shallot and remaining oil in a small bowl.
Drizzle chicken with yogurt sauce and top with mint salad.

2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the yogurt, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, chili powder, cumin, coriander, black pepper, and cinnamon.
3. Add the chicken breast halves to the bowl and toss to coat the chicken evenly with the marinade.
4. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
5. After marinating, remove the chicken from the bowl and shake off any excess marinade.
6. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
7. Place the chicken on the prepared baking sheet, skin side down.
8. Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for about 35-40 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
9. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into bite-sized pieces.
10. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, heat the fresh mint leaves and minced shallots over medium heat until the shallots are softened and the mint leaves are wilted.
11. Pour the sauce over the chicken and serve immediately.

fd5fe058a6.gt:
Heat oil in skillet.
Add garlic and shallots saute until tender.
Add wine and oregano.
Simmer 4 minutes.
Add clams and heat just until they open.
Discard any that do not open.

2. Rinse the clam thoroughly under cold water and pat it dry with a paper towel.
3. In a large bowl, combine the clam, olive oil, minced garlic, and minced shallot. Season the mixture with 1 tablespoon of oregano, salt, and pepper to taste.

Reserve 1 tablespoon of olive oil,now heat the remainder in a medium saucepan

Put on a plater and serve warm, serve immediately.

56045e7740.gt:
Heat gas grill on medium or charcoal grill until coals are ash white.
Thread meat, pineapple, red bell pepper and onion alternately onto skewers.
Combine butter, hoisin sauce and orange zest in bowl; stir until well mixed.
Spread about 1/3 mixture onto 1 side of each skewer.

The beef is cooked to perfection, and the pineapple adds a sweet and tangy flavor to the dish. The wooden skewers ensure that the beef pieces are evenly cooked and easy to eat.

fda9c36818.gt:
Put all of the ingredients in a jar for the dressing and shake to mix throughly.
That's all.
It keeps up to 1 week.
Thinly cut daikon radish into match sticks.
Add sliced onions.
Wakame seaweed.
Pour the dressing over the salad.
Daikon radish & carrot with crispy boiled and chirimen jako salad.The combination is great.

Cheap and convenient!

1d309c893f.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken, soup, cheese, milk, salt, pepper and butter.

1e5cac3aa5.gt:
Arrange tomato slices on a serving platter.
Lay 1 avocado slice on top of each tomato, and top with fresh mozzarella.
Drizzle olive oil, then balsamic vinegar over the tops, and season with salt and pepper.

2. In a large bowl, combine the beefsteak tomato slices, avocado slices, and mozzarella cheese.
3. Drizzle extra virgin olive oil over the mixture, ensuring that each ingredient is evenly coated.

This recipe combines the freshness of the ripe avocado, the juiciness of the beefsteak tomato, and the creaminess of the mozzarella cheese, creating a delicious and satisfying dish. The extra virgin olive oil adds a rich, flavorful touch, while the coarse sea salt and freshly ground pepper provide a balanced seasoning. 3e392f1d33.gt:
Melt chocolate in oil (microwave), and add the rest in the order shown making sure that the eggs don't cook in the warmed oil/chocolate.

[INST]To prepare the delicious chocolate chip cookies, follow these steps:

0e781ad046.gt:
Roast a whole butternut pumpkin.
When soft, scoop out the flesh and mash or process before adding a teaspoon of ground cumin, crunchy peanut butter and a splash of chilli sauce to taste.
Add a drizzle of olive oil, and stir well.
Serve in a bowl with crackers or pita bread.

Combine unsweetened chocolate and butter in a medium saucepan and melt over medium low heat, stirring constantly until pieces are almost melted.
Remove from the heat and stir until smooth.

Blend on low until smooth.
Add the flour and mix thoroughly.
Pour batter into greased pan.
Smooth surface with a spatula, and sprinkle uniformly with chocolate chips.
Bake on center rack of oven for 45-55 minutes.

Do not overbake.
Cool to room temperature.
Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour.
Cut and serve chilled.

65e738299c.gt:
Heat the olive oil over medium heat in a large, heavy pot.
Saute the onion for a couple of minutes until softened but not browned.
Add the rice and saute for a minute or two until it turns slightly translucent.
Add the wine and stir until absorbed.
Next, add the broth one ladle at a time, stirring very frequently.
When the rice begins to dry out, add another ladle.
After about 15 minutes, begin to check the grains.
When the rice begins to break down but is still slightly tough inside, add the vegetables, basil, salt and pepper.
Add the last few ladles of veggie broth and work in the vegetables.
If youve run out of broth, use water and add salt, if needed.
Within 5 to 10 minutes, the rice will become tender and creamy.
Once the mix is thick and starchy, take it off of the heat and stir in the cheese.
Garnish with a bit more basil and more cheese, if desired.

3. Add the minced onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
4. Add the Arborio rice to the skillet and stir to combine with the onions. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until the rice is slightly toasted.
5. Pour in the dry white wine and stir to combine with the rice and onions. Cook until the wine has been absorbed by the rice.
6. Add the mild vegetable broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly to prevent the rice from sticking to the bottom of the pan.
7. Cook the rice mixture until it is tender and creamy, about 20-25 minutes.
8. While the rice is cooking, prepare the zucchini by cutting it into small, evenly sized pieces.
9. In a separate pan, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat. Add the diced zucchini and cook until tender, about 5-7 minutes.
10. Add the chopped mushrooms and frozen peas to the pan and cook until the mushrooms are tender and the peas are heated through.
11. Stir in the fresh basil, salt, and pepper.
12. Once the rice is cooked, remove the pan from the heat and stir in the grated Parmesan cheese.
13. Transfer the rice mixture to a large, oven-safe dish.
14. Dot the top of the rice with the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil.
15. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the rice is fully cooked.
16. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy your delicious, homemade risotto!

496db791a3.gt:
In a bowl, stir together the strawberries, sugar, orange juice, and Grand Marnier.
Set aside for 30 minutes to macerate.
Position a rack in the upper third of the oven and preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, sift together the flour, cocoa, and baking powder.
Whisk in the sugar and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together the egg, cream, butter, and vanilla.
Stir the cream mixture into the flour mixture.
Using a tablespoon, drop 6 to 8 shortcakes onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing the mounds evenly (the shortcakes will expand slightly as they bake).
Bake the shortcakes until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 15 to 18 minutes.
Transfer to a rack and let cool.
To whip the cream: In the bowl of a mixer fitted with the whip attachment, on medium-high speed, beat the cream, sugar, and vanilla to medium-stiff peaks.
Do not overbeat.
To serve, split the shortcakes horizontally.
Top the bottom half with a big spoonful of strawberries (including some of the juices) and a big dollop of whipped cream.
Top with the top layer of shortcake, and spoon some berries over the top.
Top with more whipped cream, drizzle with some of the juices, and serve.

27e3ef474d.gt:
This recipes makes about 1 quart of frozen yogurt.
Place the blackberries in the bowl of a food processor.
Process until smooth.
Strain the blackberries through a fine mesh sieve set over a large mixing bowl.
Using the back of a spoon, press the mixture against the sieve to extract all the juice.
Discard the seeds and any pulp.
Add the yogurt to the blackberry juice and stir to combine.
Add about 3/4 cup of honey and taste for sweetness.
You may need more honey depending on how sweet the blackberries are.
I used just under 1 cup.
Add vanilla if desired and blend until smooth.
Process in an ice cream maker according to manufacturers instructions.
Serve immediately if you prefer a soft serve consistency or put it into a freezer safe container and freeze until firm.
If frozen remove from the freezer about 15 minutes before serving.
Recipe adapted from Southern Living Magazine.

In a ceramic bowl over boiling water melt the chocolate, water and butter together over a pot of boiling water.
(Bain marie method)
Pour the melted chocolate over the sugar and mix well.
Then separate the egg yolks from the egg whites.
And one by one add the yolks to the mixture mixing after each one.
Beat the egg whites until they are firm.

Leave in the fridge for two hours to set.
Once set decorate your mousse.

Remove them from the oven and allow them to cool.

Cook for 10 minutes, lifting and tilting occasionally.
Carefully turn the yams over.
Cook for another 10 minutes, lifting and tilting your pan again so the sauce covers the yams.
