The egg substitute and vanilla extract add moisture and a hint of vanilla, while the flour, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, oat bran, wheat germ, and raisins contribute to the cake's texture and nutritional value. The chopped walnuts add a crunchy contrast to the soft cake, making it a delightful treat.

e6f5055f34.gt:
Melt butter and cook minced onion in it.
Add rice; brown lightly.
Combine other ingredients with rice mixture and bring to boil.
Cover; reduce heat and steam until liquid is absorbed.
If rice is not done, add more water sparingly.
e6f5055f34.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat.
3. Add the green onion, minced, and cook until softened.
4. Add the rice, consomme, mushrooms, and their liquid.
5. Stir in the salt, basil, and thyme.
6. Pour in the water and bring the mixture to a boil.
7. Reduce the heat to low, cover the saucepan, and let it simmer for 18-20 minutes or until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.
8. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it sit, covered, for 5 minutes.
9. Fluff the rice with a fork and serve.

[/INST]

This cooking tutorial includes all the essential ingredients and instructions for preparing a delicious and satisfying meal. The combination of rice, mushrooms, and green onions creates a flavorful and nutritious dish that can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

295fa6c307.gt:
Combine oil and garlic in a small bowl and rub the mushroom caps on all sides with the mixture.
Place caps, top side down, in a circle on an oiled baking sheet.
Season with salt and pepper.
Arrange the cheese, basil, and tomato slices alternately in a circle on top of the mushrooms.
Sprinkle with oregano, if using.
Bake at 450 until the cheese melts, about 3 minutes.
295fa6c307.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the extra virgin olive oil over medium heat. Add the diced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant.
3. Add the portabella mushroom caps to the skillet and cook for about 3-4 minutes, until they are tender and slightly browned. Season the mushrooms with salt and black pepper, and stir to combine.
4. Remove the mushrooms from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add 1 tablespoon of olive oil and cook the mozzarella cheese until it is melted and slightly browned.
6. Add the cooked mushrooms back to the skillet, and stir to combine.
7. Add the fresh basil leaves and oregano leaves (if using), and stir to combine.
8. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and cook for about 5-7 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Remove the skillet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
10. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy your delicious portabella mushroom and cheese dish.

43c305486e.gt:
Combine butter and onion in small microwave-safe dish and cook on high for three minutes or until onion is soft and then stir it to make it sure it is combined.
Beat eggs with sour cream in a small cup or bowl and then pour over onion.
Cook on high about 1 1/2 minutes, stirring several times.
Sprinkle bacon along rim of dish and cook on high for 30 seconds.
43c305486e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced onion, eggs, sour cream, and cooked crisp bacon.
3. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
4. Pour the mixture into a greased baking dish.
5. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
6. Remove the casserole from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade casserole!

72392b90a9.gt:
Place steak in a 6" x 9" baking dish.
Combine marinade ingredients; pour over meat.
Cover with plastic; refrigerate 1/2 to 2 hours.
Combine salad ingredients in a bowl; chill until ready to serve.
Remove meat from marinade; pat dry.
Coat grill or broiler pan with cooking spray.
Heat grill on high.
Grill or broil steak 3 minutes on each side for medium-rare.
Transfer to a platter and let rest 10 minutes.
Remove onion from marinade.
Coat a nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Cook onion over medium-high heat until tender, 5 minutes.
Move to a bowl.
Cut meat thinly.
For lettuce rolls: Layer rice, salad, soybean paste, onions and steak in the center of each lettuce leaf; roll up.
Serve 4 rolls per person.
72392b90a9.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Season the steak with salt and pepper.
3. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the garlic and ginger, and cook for another 2 minutes.
5. Add the steak to the skillet, and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through, about 6-8 minutes.
6. Remove the steak from the skillet, and set aside to rest.
7. In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, apple juice, lemon juice, dark sesame oil, sugar, and scallions.
8. Return the skillet to the heat, and add the sauce mixture. Cook until the sauce has thickened slightly, about 2-3 minutes.
9. Cut the steak into thin slices.
10. In a large bowl, combine the cooked rice, soybean paste, and scallions.
11. In a small bowl, mix the rice vinegar, low-sodium soy sauce, and dark sesame oil.
12. Spray the steak slices with vegetable oil cooking spray.
13. Place the steak slices on top of the rice mixture, and drizzle with the sauce mixture.
14. Serve the dish immediately.

[/INST]

In this recipe, the ingredients are combined to create a delicious and flavorful dish. The steak is seasoned and cooked to perfection, while the onion, garlic, and ginger add depth and complexity to the dish. The sauce made from soy sauce, apple juice, lemon juice, and dark sesame oil brings everything together, enhancing the overall taste and texture of the dish. The rice serves as a starchy base, while the soybean paste adds a savory, umami-rich element. The dish is completed with the addition of scallions and a drizzle of sauce, resulting in a satisfying and well-balanced meal.

38c1babf26.gt:
In a small bowl combine graham cracker crumbs melted butter and 2 tablespoons of sugar.
After mixing well, press into the bottom of a cheesecake pan; set aside.
In a large bowl, combine room temperature cream cheese, eggs, vanilla, whipping cream and 1 cup sugar.
Beat until smooth and creamy.
Pour batter into the cheesecake pan and cook for 35 to 40 minutes at 350F.
If you like your cheesecake with a sour cream topping, remove from the oven after cooking, then combine 1 pint of sour cream, 2 tablespoons of sugar and 1 teaspoon of vanilla.
Spoon on top of the cheesecake and cook for 10 additional minutes at 420 degrees.
If I am adding fruit to the top of the cheesecake, I do not add the sour cream topping.
For chocolate cheesecake, add a bag of melted chocolate chips to the mixture and use chocolate cookie crumbs for the crust.
The vanilla can be substituted with any flavoring extract.
It is a very flexible basic recipe that can be changed to incorporate any favorite flavor.
38c1babf26.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, sugar, and 2 tablespoons of crust mixture. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the cream cheese and mix until smooth.
4. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Stir in the vanilla extract.
6. Gradually add the heavy whipping cream, mixing until smooth.
7. Spread the mixture evenly over the prepared crust.
8. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until the edges are set and the center is slightly wobbly.
9. Allow the cheesecake to cool completely on a wire rack.
10. Chill the cheesecake in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours or overnight.
11. Remove the cheesecake from the refrigerator and let it sit at room temperature for about 30 minutes before cutting and serving.

[/INST]

06e92239ab.gt:
Combine all of the ingredients in a mason jar, screw on the top and shake to thoroughly mix.
Let sit for at least 20 minutes.
Keep refrigerated.
Makes about 3/4 to 1 cup of dressing.
06e92239ab.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the balsamic vinegar, olive oil, Dijon mustard, honey, garlic, salt, and pepper to taste.
3. Spread the mixture evenly over the chicken pieces, ensuring that they are coated evenly.
4. Place the chicken pieces on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
5. Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

4ea5a98674.gt:
For the crust: combine the graham cracker crumbs, butter and sugar in a bowl and then press into an ungreased 13x9x2 dish.
Chill for 1/2 hour.
In a mixing bowl, cream butter, confectioners sugar, milk & vanilla.
Spread over crust, chill for 1/2 hour.
Layer strawberries, bananas, pineapple, and coconut (if desired).
Any fruit can be substituted and chocolate syrup can be added also.
Spread Cool Whip over the fruit.
Top with nuts or toasted coconut.
Keep refrigerated.
4ea5a98674.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Graham Cracker Crumbs, softened butter, and granulated sugar. Mix until well combined.
3. Press the mixture evenly into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch springform pan.
4. Bake the crust for 10-12 minutes, or until it is set and lightly golden. Remove from the oven and let it cool completely.
5. In a large mixing bowl, beat the softened butter, milk, and vanilla extract until smooth.
6. Add the confectioners sugar gradually, beating until the mixture is smooth and fluffy.
7. Add the sliced strawberries, sliced bananas, drained crushed pineapple, and whipped topping. Mix until well combined.
8. Pour the filling over the cooled crust.
9. If desired, top the filling with shredded coconut, chocolate syrup, or any other desired toppings.
10. Bake the cake in a preheated oven at 350°F (175°C) for 45-50 minutes, or until the filling is set and the edges are slightly golden.
11. Allow the cake to cool completely before cutting and serving.

[/INST]

08647377e3.gt:
Soak the kiriboshi daikon in water and then squeeze it to remove the excess water.
If there is water in the canned soybeans, drain them well.
Julienne the carrots.
Cut the bacon into thin strips.
Heat the olive oil in a frying pan.
Add the ingredients and stir-fry.
Season with salt and black pepper.
All done.
My recipe for quiche, "Easy!
Kiriboshi Daikon Quiche with Homemade Crust" uses this as a filling!
08647377e3.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced bacon, olive oil, and black pepper. Mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, combine the boiled and canned soy beans, julienned carrot, and sliced kiriboshi daikon.
4. Add the soy bean mixture to the bacon mixture and mix well.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the bacon is crispy.
6. Season with coarse salt to taste.
7. Serve the dish hot and enjoy!

57a8e4271c.gt:
Pour ingredients into empty gallon container or empty gallon milk jug.
Fill the rest of the container with water.
Put into spray bottle and refill as needed.
57a8e4271c.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients and tools, including a clean and dry surface, a mixing bowl, a spoon, and a measuring cup.
2. In the mixing bowl, combine the 16 ounce bottle of rubbing alcohol, 12 cups of sudsy ammonia, and 1 teaspoon of liquid dish soap.
3. Mix the ingredients thoroughly, ensuring that the rubbing alcohol and ammonia are well combined.
4. Gradually add water to the mixture, stirring continuously to avoid lumps.
5. Once the mixture is smooth and homogeneous, it is ready to use.
6. To clean the surface, spray the mixture onto the surface and let it sit for a few minutes before wiping it clean with a damp cloth or sponge.
7. For tougher stains, you can apply a bit more pressure and let the mixture sit for a longer period of time.

Please note that this mixture is for cleaning surfaces and not for food preparation. It is important to follow proper food safety guidelines and use appropriate cleaning solutions for food preparation surfaces.

579917be2c.gt:
Light the grill or heat the broiler.
Coat the chicken with 1 tablespoon of the oil and season with 1/4 teaspoon of the salt and 1/4 teaspoon of the pepper.
Grill or broil until just done, 4 to 5 minutes per side.
Let the chicken rest for 5 minutes and then cut crosswise into 1/4-inch slices.
In a large pot of boiling, salted water, cook the fusilli until just done, about 13 minutes.
Drain, rinse with cold water, and drain thoroughly.
In a large bowl, toss the pasta with 1 tablespoon of the olive oil.
Add the chicken, artichoke hearts, scallions, parsley, the remaining 5 tablespoons oil, the vinegar, the remaining 1 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper, and the Parmesan to the pasta and toss well.
579917be2c.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through, about 6-8 minutes per side.
4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the artichoke hearts, scallions, and red-wine vinegar. Cook until the artichoke hearts are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Add the cooked chicken breasts back to the skillet and toss everything together.
7. In a large pot, cook the fusilli according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
8. In a small bowl, mix the Parmesan cheese and a splash of olive oil.
9. Serve the chicken and artichoke mixture over the cooked fusilli, and top with the Parmesan cheese mixture.

[/INST]

[/INST]

b653472a7b.gt:
In soup pot dissolve curry paste with water , add cherry tomato ,bring to the boil on medium heat
Prepare banana blossom while soup is boiling ,cut half on runny water or in water bowl
Cut into 4 pieces ,now select only white leaves,take off small young banana inside
Cut to small pieces, this always soak in water to prevent from color change
Add to soup pot,increase to high heat ,stir to let all sink in hot boil soup ,let it simmer about 15 mins
Add fishsauce,add green leaves ,stir to mix,heat off ,serve hot with sticky rice by northern thai way or with steamed jasmine rice
b653472a7b.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To create a delicious savory dish using the ingredients provided, follow these steps:
1. Prepare the Banana Blossom by washing it thoroughly and removing any leaves that are not edible.
2. In a large pot or wok, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the red curry paste and cook for a few seconds until fragrant.
3. Add the chopped chicken, stirring to coat the meat evenly with the curry paste. Cook until the chicken is fully cooked through.
4. Add the cherry tomatoes, chicken stock or water, and bring the mixture to a simmer.
5. Add the local green vegetables and cook until they are tender but still crisp.
6. Stir in the fish sauce and season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the dish over rice or noodles, garnished with the chopped chicken and any additional desired toppings.

Enjoy your delicious savory dish!

fd91c2f3e6.gt:
Sift maizena and flour together
Add castor sugar
Rub butter into the dry ingredients and knead until a stiff dough its formed
Press dough into a 20 x 29cm greased baking tray
Mark the slices lightly and prick with a fork
Bake at 150C for 50 minutes
Once baked, drench the shortbread with castor sugar
Cut the shortbread into squares
Allow to cool and then enjoy
fd91c2f3e6.pred:
[INST]
To create a delicious and satisfying dish using the ingredients provided, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, castor sugar, and soft butter. Mix until the butter is evenly distributed and the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
3. Add the Maizena to the mixture and stir until the dough comes together. If the dough is too dry, you can add a small amount of water or milk to achieve the desired consistency.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic.
5. Roll out the dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
6. Use a cookie cutter or a round cutter to cut out your desired shapes.
7. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the cookies in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
9. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade cookies!
<</SYS>>

[/INST]

89a10ab4d0.gt:
Soak chiles in hot water 15 min.
or until softened.
Drain chiles, reserving 1/4 cup of the soaking water; place chiles and reserved water in blender container.
Cover.
Blend on medium speed until smooth; set aside.
Heat dressing in large skillet on medium-high heat.
Add pork; cook and stir 5 min.
or until evenly browned.
Remove pork from skillet; set aside.
Add alcaparrado condiment, cloves and chile puree to skillet; cook 2 min.
Return pork to skillet.
Stir in broth; bring to boil over medium-high heat.
Reduce heat to medium-low; cover.
Simmer 30 min.
Add potatoes and peanuts; cover.
Cook 45 min.
until potatoes are tender, stirring occasionally.
Top each serving with egg slices.
89a10ab4d0.pred:
1. In a large saucepan, combine the dried guajillo chiles, hot water, and KRAFT Zesty Italian Dressing. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 10 minutes, or until the chiles are tender.
2. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the mixture cool slightly.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the pork loin, alcaparrado condiment, ground cloves, and beef broth. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
4. Add the cooled chile mixture to the pork mixture and stir to combine.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
6. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
7. In a large skillet, cook the potatoes in the beef broth until tender.
8. In a separate skillet, cook the sliced peanuts until they are golden brown.
9. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked potatoes, peanuts, and the pork mixture. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
11. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 1 hour, or until the filling is hot and bubbly.
12. Serve the dish immediately.

[/INST]

54ea4ac023.gt:
Place the eggs into a saucepan in a single layer and fill with water to cover the eggs by 1 inch.
Cover the saucepan and bring the water to a boil over high heat.
Remove from the heat and let the eggs stand in the hot water for 15 minutes.
Drain.
Cool the eggs under cold running water.
Peel and chop the cooled eggs.
Cook the bacon in a large, deep skillet over medium-high heat until evenly browned, about 10 minutes.
Drain on a paper towel-lined plate; crumble once cool.
Combine the eggs, bacon, mayonnaise, mozzarella cheese, paprika, sugar, white wine vinegar, and mustard in a bowl to make a chunky dip.
Garnish with paprika.
54ea4ac023.pred:
1. In a large bowl, whisk the eggs until they are well-beaten.
2. Add the bacon slices to the bowl and toss them until they are coated with the eggs.
3. Add the light mayonnaise, shredded mozzarella cheese, paprika, white sugar, white wine vinegar, mustard, and salt and pepper to taste. Mix everything together until well combined.
4. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
5. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
6. Pour the egg and bacon mixture onto the prepared baking sheet.
7. Bake the mixture for 20-25 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
8. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Use a spatula to transfer the mixture onto a serving plate.
10. Garnish with a sprinkle of paprika for added color and flavor.

[/INST]

59f0023fcf.gt:
Cut tops off peppers and remove insides
Mix ground beef, rice, and taco seasoning in mixing bowl
Fill peppers with mix.
You shouldn't have any left over.
Stuff them!
Place filled peppers in crock pot
Spoon a little rotel on top of each pepper.
Pour remainder into bottom of crockpot (gives a little extra juice)
Cook on low 6-8 hours and high 3-4 hours.
(The uncooked meat will cook the pepper.
No need to precook the beef or add any liquid)
20-30 minutes before meal time add cheese on top of each pepper.
Enjoy!
59f0023fcf.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Prepare the ingredients by washing and chopping the bell peppers into bite-sized pieces.
3. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
4. Add the chopped bell peppers to the skillet and cook until they are tender.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the spanish rice, rotel, and taco seasoning.
6. Add the mixture to the skillet with the ground beef and bell peppers, stirring to combine.
7. In a small bowl, mix the two cups of Mexican blend cheese.
8. Pour the cheese mixture over the skillet and stir until the cheese is melted and fully incorporated.
9. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and melted.
10. Serve the delicious Food hot, garnished with additional chopped bell peppers, if desired.

[/INST]

b500700d75.gt:
Pre-heat oven
In a bowl, grate the carrots and apple
Mix flour, baking soda, baking powerd , sugar , salt ,cinnamon and walnuts
Add the eggs, oil , milk ,vanilla extract
Add the carrots and apple
Spoon equal amount into the muffin tray
Bake for 20-30 min
b500700d75.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, salt, and sugar.
3. Add the ground cinnamon, chopped walnuts, grated carrots, and grated apple to the bowl. Mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the all-purpose flour and baking powder to the bowl, mixing until the ingredients are well combined.
5. If the mixture is too wet, add a bit more flour, a tablespoon at a time, until the desired consistency is reached.
6. Transfer the batter to a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
7. Bake the cake in the preheated oven for about 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

Congratulations! You have successfully cooked a delicious cake using the provided ingredients. Enjoy your creation!

0121dfda05.gt:
Heat oil in large pot over medium-high heat.
Add shallots, ginger, and garlic and let cook until soft, about 5 minutes.
Stir in peanut butter, turmeric, cumin, and curry paste and let cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
Whisk in water, coconut milk, lime zest, brown sugar, and salt until combined.
Add tofu, sweet potato, and kale, and bring to a boil.
Let simmer, covered, for 30 minutes, or until sweet potatoes are fork tender.
Stir in lime juice and adjust seasoning to taste.
Garnish with cashews and serve over rice or quinoa.
0121dfda05.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the canola oil, shallot, ginger, garlic, and turmeric.
3. Add the peanut butter, cumin, Thai red curry paste, and water to the bowl. Whisk until smooth.
4. Transfer the mixture to a large saucepan or Dutch oven.
5. Bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
6. Add the coconut milk, lime zest, brown sugar or maple syrup, sea salt, and tofu. Stir to combine.
7. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pan, and simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the tofu is tender and the sauce has thickened slightly.
8. Stir in the sweet potato and kale. Cook for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
9. Stir in the roasted cashews.
10. Serve the dish hot, garnished with a squeeze of fresh lime juice, if desired.

This recipe combines the flavors of peanut butter, curry, and coconut milk to create a delicious and hearty dish. The sweet potato and kale add a touch of natural sweetness and a nutritious boost, while the roasted cashews provide a crunchy texture and a hint of saltiness.

5b23053aa4.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Combine flours, Splenda, cocoa, and baking soda.
Add bananas, yogurt, egg whites, vanilla, and 1/2 cup walnuts.
Stir.
Coat a 9" x 13" cake pan with cooking spray.
Pour batter into pan, spreading evenly.
Bake about 35 minutes.
Cool.
Raise oven to 375F.
Toast remaining 1/4 cup walnuts 6 minutes.
To make frosting, pour 1/4 cup milk into a medium saucepan over medium heat.
Stir in Splenda, cocoa, and cornstarch.
Slowly add remaining 3/4 cup milk and bring to a low boil, stirring continuously until thick.
Remove from heat and stir in butter and vanilla.
Cool and spread over cake.
Sprinkle walnuts over cake.
5b23053aa4.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the whole-wheat flour, unbleached all-purpose flour, Splenda Sugar Blend for Baking, baking soda, cocoa powder, and cornstarch.
3. Stir to combine the dry ingredients.
4. In a separate bowl, mash the overly ripe bananas.
5. Add the mashed bananas, lowfat yogurt, egg whites, vanilla extract, and chopped walnuts to the dry ingredients.
6. Stir until well combined.
7. Spray a 9x9 inch (23x23 cm) baking dish with vegetable-oil cooking spray.
8. Pour the batter into the prepared baking dish.
9. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

8fdec3f08f.gt:
Bring a saucepan of water to the boil, begin to cook the spaghetti
Prepare the topping.
Finely slice garlic, cut red pepper into thin strips, cut olives in half, cut crab sticks into cubes, slice salmon into small slices.
Shallow fry garlic, red pepper and olives until softened.
Add the crab sticks, salmon and shrimps and cook until it's pretty much there.
Throw in a dash of white wine and a dash of lemon juice.
Season to taste with salt, pepper, basil.
Drain spaghetti and combine with topping.
Generously slash it with olive oil.
Boom.
8fdec3f08f.pred:
1. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add the garlic and sauté for 1 minute, until fragrant.
4. Add the smoked salmon, crab sticks, shrimp, and red pepper. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until the shrimp are pink and the crab sticks are heated through.
5. Stir in the white wine and lemon juice. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until the liquid has almost completely evaporated.
6. Add the seasoned salt, basil, and olives. Stir to combine.
7. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until the flavors are well-mixed.
8. Serve the smoked salmon and crab mixture over the cooked spaghetti.

Enjoy your delicious seafood pasta dish!

669da1896f.gt:
Peel the pears, cut them into quarters and remove the cores.
Cut each quarter in half and put them in a bowl.
Shave the cheese with a vegetable peeler and mix three-quarters of it with the pears.
Beat the oil and the lemon juice together and add salt and pepper to taste.
Spoon about half this dressing over the pears and leave for 1 hour.
Spoon the pears into a deep dish and shower with the remaining cheese.
Surround with the rocket and drizzle the rest of the dressing over it.
Serve immediately.
Serves 4.
669da1896f.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. Wash the pears thoroughly and pat them dry with a paper towel.
3. Cut the pears into quarters and remove the core.
4. In a large mixing bowl, combine the pears, Parmigiano-Reggiano or good padano cheese, extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
5. Toss the ingredients together until the pears are evenly coated with the dressing.
6. Spread the pear mixture evenly on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Roast the pears in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
8. Remove the pears from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
9. Serve the roasted pears as a side dish or a dessert.

[/INST]

dde6859b7c.gt:
1.
Brown turkey in a nonstick skillet over medium high heat.
After about 7 minutes, drain the liquid off and return the meat to the pan.
Cook another 3 to 5 minutes or until browned.
Drain and set aside.
2.
Add bell pepper, mushrooms, and onion to the skillet and cook about 3 minutes.
The onions and/or mushrooms should be softened.
Add the garlic and cumin; cook another minute.
3.
Add the turkey back to the veggies, then stir in the BBQ sauce, ketchup, hot sauce, and Worcestershire sauce.
Cook, stirring often, until heated through (about 5 minutes).
4.
Spoon mixture into hollowed out rolls (makes it a bit less messy) and serve with your favorite baked chips!
dde6859b7c.pred:

4. Add the mushrooms and cook until they are tender and the liquid has evaporated.

6. Add the mixture to the skillet with the turkey and vegetables, stirring to combine.

8. Place the split and hollowed-out hard rolls on a baking sheet and spoon the turkey and vegetable mixture evenly over the rolls.

aff56897c3.gt:
Combine all ingredients and stir.

To prepare a delicious and satisfying meal, follow these steps:

646d990717.gt:
Cut the chicken breast into thin slices.
Soak dried shiitake mushrooms in lukewarm water until soft.
Cut off hard stems and cut in halves.
Cut onion into thin slices.
Chop cilantro.
In a large skillet with a lid, mix all the simmering sauce ingredients and bring to a boil.
Add chicken, mushrooms and onion and cook over medium heat for 3 to 4 minutes, or until chicken is done and onion is tender.
Beat eggs in a small bowl, then pour over the chicken and cover with a lid.
Cook until the egg is set, about 1 minute on low heat.
Sprinkle cilantro on top.
To serve: put about 1 1/4 cup of rice in a large, deep bowl and gently lay 1/4 of the chicken and egg mixture on top.
Pour simmering sauce over and serve immediately.
646d990717.pred:
To cook a delicious and satisfying dish, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients: Wash and chop the onion and mushrooms. Rinse the chicken breasts and pat them dry.

2. Prepare the sauce: In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, mirin, sugar, and a pinch of salt. Set aside.

3. Cook the rice: Cook the rice according to the package instructions.

4. Cook the chicken: In a large skillet or wok, heat some oil over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until they are browned on both sides and cooked through, about 4-5 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.

5. Cook the sauce: In the same skillet or wok, add the onion and mushrooms. Cook until the onion is softened and the mushrooms are tender, about 5-7 minutes.

6. Add the sauce: Pour the sauce mixture into the skillet or wok and stir to combine. Cook for a few minutes until the sauce has thickened slightly.

7. Return the chicken: Add the cooked chicken breasts back to the skillet or wok and stir to combine. Cook for a few minutes until the chicken is heated through.

8. Serve: Serve the chicken and mushroom sauce over the cooked rice. Garnish with cilantro, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious and satisfying dish!

33b543f946.gt:
Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
Fry mustard seeds in oil until they begin to pop.
Add red pepper flakes and shallot and saute until shallot is soft.
Add garbanzos, turmeric, cumin, ginger, salt and enough water to prevent sticking.
Simmer for 15 minutes.
Sprinkle with cilantro and serve.

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the olive oil, mustard seeds, crushed red pepper flakes, shallot, and garbanzo beans.
3. Add the turmeric, ground cumin, ground ginger, salt, and cilantro. Mix well.
4. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish or a casserole dish.

6. Serve the dish hot, and enjoy!

e827f8e8c3.gt:
In a medium bowl, combine the soy sauce, dark soy and cornstarch.
Whisk to blend well, and add the chicken to the sauce.
Toss to evenly coat the chicken and set aside for 15 to 20 minutes.
In a medium bowl, combine the ketchup, stock, chili garlic sauce and sugar.
Stir to combine and set aside until ready to use.
Place a wok over high heat and add the vegetable oil to the pan.
Swirl the wok to be sure to coat well with the oil.
Add the ginger, garlic, green onions, dried chilies and jalapenos to the wok.
Cook, stirring often until the garlic is fragrant and the chilies begin to brown, about 20 to 30 seconds.
Add the chicken, bell peppers and onions to the pan and stir-fry until the chicken is no longer pink, about 4 to 5 minutes.
Add the sauce to the pan and bring to a boil, being sure to toss well in order to coat all the chicken and vegetables evenly, about 1 to 2 minutes.
Sprinkle the sesame seeds, sesame oil and cilantro into the pan and toss to combine.
Remove from the heat and serve on a platter with steamed white rice.
e827f8e8c3.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the soy sauce, dark soy sauce, cornstarch, and sugar. Mix well.
2. Add the chicken breasts to the bowl, and toss to coat the chicken evenly with the marinade. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
3. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
4. In a large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add the ginger, garlic, and green onions, and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
5. Add the diced chicken to the skillet, and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Add the chicken broth, chili-garlic sauce, and red bell pepper to the skillet. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Remove the chicken from the skillet, and set aside to cool slightly.
8. In a small bowl, mix the toasted sesame seeds and sesame oil.
9. Cut the cooled chicken into bite-sized pieces, and return it to the skillet.
10. Add the yellow onion, dried red chilies, jalapeno, and toasted sesame seeds mixture to the skillet. Cook for a few minutes, until the chicken is heated through and the toasted sesame seeds are fragrant.
11. Serve the chicken and vegetable stir-fry over rice or noodles, garnished with fresh cilantro. Enjoy your delicious homemade chicken stir-fry!

903a5e2cd4.gt:
Pop Trader Joe's frozen brown rice in the microwave, or make a batch of rice the traditional way.
While rice is cooking, make the dressing by whisking together half of the chopped garlic, tahini, lemon zest, lemon juice, and 3 tbs.
olive oil.
Add the hot water to thin a bit, and then 2 teaspoons salt.
Set aside.
Add 3 tbs.
olive oil to a big skillet over medium-high heat, swirling to coat the pan.
Be sure the chickpeas are completely dry, or they'll spit at you during this next step!
Add the chickpeas and a sprinkling of salt.
Let the beans saute for a couple minutes, until they get a toasty little crust on them.
Add remaining garlic and onions.
Stir for a minute.
Stir in the asparagus with another pinch or two of salt, then cover with a lid for a minute to steam until the asparagus softens a touch.
Uncover and stir in the rice and almond slivers, reserving a few almonds for garnish.
Adjust seasonings, adding more salt if needed.
Serve family-style in a big bowl drizzled with a few tablespoons of the tahini dressing, letting each person add more dressing to their tastes.
Watch as this magical concoction disappears before your eyes!
903a5e2cd4.pred:
To cook the Food with these ingredients, follow these steps:

3. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish, and spread it evenly.
4. Roast the dish in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the rice is tender and the edges are slightly crispy.
5. While the rice is cooking, prepare the chickpeas by rinsing them and draining them.
6. In a small bowl, mix the kosher salt, hot water, and lemon juice.
7. Add the chickpeas to the bowl, and toss them to coat them evenly with the seasoning mixture.
8. Spread the seasoned chickpeas on a baking sheet, and roast them in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until they are crispy and slightly golden.
9. While the chickpeas are roasting, prepare the asparagus by washing it thoroughly and cutting it into 1-inch segments.
10. In a small bowl, mix the slivered almonds with a drizzle of olive oil, and spread them on a baking sheet. Toast the almonds in the preheated oven for about 5-7 minutes, or until they are golden and fragrant.
11. Once the chickpeas are done, remove them from the oven and let them cool slightly.
12. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked rice, chickpeas, asparagus, and slivered almonds.
13. Serve the dish immediately, or refrigerate it for later consumption.

[/INST]

1690800ec2.gt:

5. Gradually add the flour, baking powder, and salt, mixing until well combined.
6. Fold in the pecans.
7. Pour the batter into the pie shells, filling them to the top.
8. Bake the pies in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the pie comes out clean.
9. Allow the pies to cool for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. Once cooled, enjoy your delicious, flavorful Food!

7ea397998a.gt:
Place the potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water.
Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until tender, 8 to 10 minutes.
Drain and allow to steam dry for a minute or two.
Place potatoes in a large bowl.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat; grease with cooking spray.
Cook and stir the green beans and onion until tender, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the garlic; cook and stir until garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute more.
Transfer the green bean mixture into the large bowl with the potatoes.
Add the balsamic vinaigrette, roasted red peppers, and basil; toss lightly.
Stir in the goat cheese.
7ea397998a.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the red potatoes, olive oil cooking spray, and salt. Toss to coat the potatoes evenly.
3. Spread the potatoes out on a baking sheet, and roast them in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly crispy on the outside.
4. While the potatoes are cooking, prepare the green beans. In a large pot, combine the green beans, water, and a pinch of salt. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer and cook for 4-5 minutes, or until the green beans are tender but still crisp.
5. In a small bowl, whisk together the minced garlic, reduced-fat balsamic vinaigrette dressing, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
6. In a large mixing bowl, combine the roasted red peppers, chopped red onion, and chopped fresh basil.
7. Add the vinaigrette mixture to the bowl, and toss everything together to combine.
8. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked potatoes, green beans, and vinaigrette mixture. Toss everything together to combine.
9. Serve the Food immediately, or refrigerate it for later.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

79aa81e6ca.gt:
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat; whisk in flour, and cook until flour turns from white to a nutty brown color, 2 to 3 minutes.
Stir in onion and cook until transparent, about 5 minutes.
Add meats and brown until no longer pink, 10 to 12 minutes; stir in Cajun seasoning and garlic powder; drain fat.
Cool to room temperature.
On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of 1/4 inch.
Use a 5 inch diameter round cookie cutter or cut around a saucer to make a round of dough.
Place a heaping tablespoon of meat filling in the center of each round.
Fold dough over filling and seal edges closed by pressing with a fork or fingers.
Repeat to make 15 pies, re-rolling dough scraps as needed.
Heat oil for frying in deep fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Deep fry pies in small batches until golden brown, 3 to 4 minutes.
Drain on paper towels.
Or bake pies on greased cookie sheets in preheated 350 degree F (175 degrees C) oven 15 to 20 minutes, or until golden brown.
79aa81e6ca.pred:
1. Preheat the deep fryer to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the vegetable oil, all-purpose flour, and Cajun seasoning. Mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, combine the chopped onion, ground beef, and garlic powder. Mix well.
4. Roll out the pie dough on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch. Cut out circles using a cookie cutter or a round object.
5. Place the pie dough circles on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
6. Carefully spoon a small amount of the beef and onion mixture onto the center of each pie dough circle.
7. Fold the dough over the filling, pressing the edges together to seal the edges.
8. Carefully place the filled dough circles into the hot oil in the deep fryer. Cook for about 3-4 minutes, or until the dough is golden brown and the filling is cooked through.
9. Remove the dough circles from the fryer using a slotted spoon or tongs, and place them on a wire rack to drain and cool.
10. Serve the Cajun-style pork and beef filled pastries as a delicious and unique appetizer or snack.

[/INST]

bb2454b288.gt: Shake all of the ingredients over ice and strain into a shooter glass.
bb2454b288.pred:
1. In a shaker, combine the Crown Royal Canadian rye whisky, amaretto almond liqueur, grenadine, sweet-and-sour mix, and lemon soda.
2. Shake the mixture vigorously for about 10 seconds.
3. Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
4. Garnish with a lemon slice or a lemon twist, if desired.
5. Enjoy your delicious Food.

[/INST]

d0702f3d7d.gt:
Put cole slaw mix into bowl.
Mix together the oil, vinegar, sugar, salt & pepper.
Pour over cole slaw mix.
Toast almonds on cookie sheet at 350 degrees for 5 minutes.
Put almonds and craisins into slaw mix and toss.
d0702f3d7d.pred:
To prepare a delicious coleslaw, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, combine the shredded coleslaw mix, oil, vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
2. Add the toasted slivered almonds and dried cranberries to the bowl. Mix everything together until well combined.
3. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
4. Serve the coleslaw immediately or let it sit for a bit longer before serving.

This coleslaw recipe is a perfect side dish for various occasions, such as picnics, barbecues, or potlucks. The combination of crunchy cabbage, tangy vinegar, sweet sugar, and savory almonds and cranberries creates a delightful and refreshing salad that everyone will enjoy.

b6c3e41018.gt:
After rinsing the chives and shaking off the excess water, put them into a vinyl bag.
Bend slightly to fit on your microwave plate.
Pop in the microwave and cook one side for 1 minute, flip the bag over, then cook the other side for 30 seconds.
While microwaving the chives, shred as many crab sticks as you desire.
Add water to the bag with the chives to cool it down, squeeze well to remove the excess water, then cut into 3 cm sections.
Toss the shredded crab sticks and the chives together, sprinkle on ponzu sauce, then it's ready to serve.
Serve with a dab of Japanese mustard or a sprinkling of sesame seeds.
b6c3e41018.pred:
1. First, wash the Chinese chives thoroughly to remove any dirt or impurities.
2. Next, cut the chives into small pieces and set aside.
3. Heat a pan or wok over medium heat. Add a small amount of oil and cook the imitation crabmeat sticks until they are golden brown and fully cooked.
4. While the imitation crabmeat sticks are cooking, prepare the Ponzu sauce by mixing together Ponzu (or vinegar and soy sauce) and a small amount of water.
5. Once the imitation crabmeat sticks are cooked, remove them from the pan and set aside.
6. In the same pan, add a small amount of oil and cook the Chinese chives until they are softened and slightly wilted.
7. Pour the Ponzu sauce over the cooked chives and stir to combine.
8. Add the cooked imitation crabmeat sticks back into the pan and stir to combine the ingredients.
9. Serve the dish immediately, garnished with a sprinkle of sesame seeds if desired.

This delightful Food combines the flavors of the Chinese chives, imitation crabmeat sticks, and Ponzu sauce to create a delicious and satisfying dish. The use of Ponzu sauce adds a unique and refreshing taste to the dish, making it a memorable and enjoyable meal.

120df8a501.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Put thawed potatoes in a large bowl.
Cube turkey-ham and add to potatoes.
Dice onion and add to bowl.
Add cheese to bowl.
Mix well.
In a small bowl put sour cream, soup, melted butter, salt and pepper.
Mix well.
Add to potato mixture.
Mix well, make sure everything is coated.
Put in a 9x13 pan and cover.
Cook for 30 minutes.
Uncover and cook for 15 minutes longer.
Take out and let rest 10 minutes to set.
120df8a501.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the shredded hashbrowns, turkey-ham, onion, and seasonings (salt, pepper, and any additional desired seasonings). Mix well.
3. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet or a large, greased baking dish.
4. Bake the mixture in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the hashbrowns are golden brown and crispy on the outside and cooked through.
5. While the hashbrowns are baking, prepare the sour cream mixture by combining the shredded Monterey Jack cheese, sour cream, and any additional desired seasonings.
6. Once the hashbrowns are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Add the sour cream mixture to the hashbrowns and stir well to combine.
8. If desired, add the cream of chicken soup to the mixture and stir well.
9. Add the butter or margarine and stir until melted and well combined.
10. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy!

This delicious dish combines the flavors of the turkey-ham, hashbrowns, onion, and seasonings to create a satisfying and filling meal. The sour cream mixture adds a creamy and rich texture, while the cream of chicken soup adds a savory and comforting element to the dish. The butter or margarine adds a touch of richness and melts beautifully into the dish. The result is a delicious and satisfying meal that can be enjoyed by everyone.

f69122a346.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Melt the butter or margarine in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add the garlic, bay leaves, onion and green bell pepper and saute for about 5 minutes.
Add the meat and saute until slightly browned on all sides.
Transfer mixture to a 2 quart casserole dish and pour the tomatoes over the mixture.
Cover and bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for about 2 hours.
(Note: Also can be done in a slow cooker on low setting for 6 to 8 hours.)
f69122a346.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the butter, minced garlic, and bay leaves. Mix well.
3. Add the sliced onions to the bowl and toss to coat the onions with the butter mixture.
4. Spread the onion mixture evenly on a baking sheet or roasting pan.
5. Roast the onions in the preheated oven for 30-45 minutes, or until they are golden brown and caramelized.
6. Remove the onions from the oven and let them cool.
7. In a large mixing bowl, combine the minced green bell pepper, the chopped onions, and the steak cubes.
8. Add the crushed tomatoes to the bowl and toss to combine the ingredients.
9. Season the mixture with salt, pepper, and any other desired seasonings.
10. Transfer the mixture to a large roasting pan or baking dish.
11. Roast the steak and vegetables in the preheated oven for 1-1.5 hours, or until the steak is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
12. Remove the roasting pan from the oven and let the dish rest for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

4ff0a3ff39.gt:
In a large bowl, combine flour, granulated sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt.
Make a well in the center of flour mixture.
In medium bowl, combine egg, buttermilk, orange juice concentrate and melted butter; add all at once to flour mixture.
Stir just until moistened (batter should be lumpy).
Fold in walnuts.
Line twelve 2-1/2-inch muffin cups with paper bake cups.
Fill the cups 3/4 full with batter.
Bake in a 400 degree F. oven for 18 to 20 minutes or until muffins are golden.
Remove the muffins from the pans.
In a small bowl, combine powdered sugar, orange peel and enough orange juice (2 to 3 teaspoons) to make a drizzling consistency.
Drizzle over warm muffins.
4ff0a3ff39.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
3. Add the beaten egg, buttermilk, frozen orange juice concentrate, and melted butter. Mix until smooth.
4. Fold in the chopped walnuts and sifted powdered sugar.
5. If desired, add the finely shredded orange peel for extra flavor.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

[/INST]

243f0c78f6.gt:
In a small bowl, combine dressing ingredients, whisk and set aside.
In a really large salad bowl, combine cabbage, lettuce, cilantro and green onions and toss gently.
Sprinkle in the sesame seeds and peanuts.
Add the chicken.
Pour in the dressing and toss.
Enjoy!
243f0c78f6.pred:
To prepare a perfect Food, follow these key steps:

1. In a large bowl, combine the hoisin sauce, peanut butter, brown sugar, and asian chili paste. Mix well.
2. Add the grated ginger and rice vinegar, and mix again.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the sesame oil.
4. Add the whisked sesame oil to the hoisin sauce mixture and mix well.
5. Add the chicken chunks to the bowl and toss to coat the chicken evenly with the sauce.
6. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.
7. In a large skillet or wok, heat a small amount of oil over medium-high heat. Add the cabbage and cook for about 3 minutes, or until it starts to soften.
8. Add the lettuce, cilantro, and carrots to the skillet, and cook for an additional 3 minutes.
9. Add the peanuts and cook for 1-2 minutes, or until the peanuts are lightly toasted.
10. Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the scallions.
11. Serve the chicken and vegetables over a bed of cooked rice or noodles.

By following these steps, you will have a delicious and well-balanced meal that combines the flavors of the hoisin sauce, peanut butter, and asian chili paste, along with the freshness of the vegetables and the crunch of the peanuts.

608984ae45.gt:
Melt butter in 1-quart saucepan until sizzling; add onion.
Cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, 2-3 minutes or until softened.
Stir in flour, thyme and pepper.
Reduce heat to medium; stir in chicken broth and half & half.
Cook, stirring occasionally, 2-4 minutes or until smooth and bubbly.
Serve gravy over chicken, biscuits and/or potatoes.
608984ae45.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 1/4 cup Land O Lakes Butter, 1/2 cup chopped onion, and 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour. Mix until the butter is melted and the mixture is smooth.
3. Add the 1 teaspoon dried thyme leaves, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, and mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the 2/3 cup chicken broth, stirring constantly, until the mixture reaches the desired consistency.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk together the 2/3 cup Land O Lakes Half & Half and the 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme leaves.
6. Pour the whisked Half & Half mixture into the butter mixture, stirring until well combined.
7. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
8. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
9. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

This cooking procedure involves combining various ingredients to create a delicious and hearty dish. The Land O Lakes Butter, chopped onion, and all-purpose flour provide a rich and savory base, while the dried thyme leaves and pepper add depth and complexity to the flavor profile. The chicken broth and Land O Lakes Half & Half contribute moisture and richness to the dish, resulting in a satisfying and comforting meal.

ccc0ef6d85.gt:
Melt butter in large skillet over medium-low heat.
Add leeks; saute until tender, about 10 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Stir in parsley.
Cool.
Spread leek topping evenly over pizza shell; sprinkle tomatoes over.
Top with cheese.
Drizzle 1 tablespoon oil over.
Bake about 10 minutes at 450 F.
Remove from oven and brush crust with olive oil.
ccc0ef6d85.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the 12 tablespoons of butter, minced parsley, and a pinch of salt.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the sliced leeks, chopped tomatoes, and crumbled feta or montrachet cheese.
4. Add the olive oil to the butter mixture and stir to combine.
5. Pour the butter mixture over the leek and tomato mixture, and toss to coat evenly.
6. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for about 30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Serve the dish hot, and enjoy your delicious homemade food!

[/INST]

[/INST]

b85277a635.gt:
In a large bowl, mix together the ginger, soy sauce, sake and mirin.
Add the sliced pork, cover, and marinate for about 1 hour.
Heat the oil in a skillet or wok over high heat.
Add the pork, and fry until brown.
The pork should have a dark crispy look to it.
Do not cook on low or medium heat, as the juices will not cook fast enough to get a crispy texture.
Discard leftover marinade.
b85277a635.pred:
1. Grate the fresh ginger root using a microplane or a grater.
2. In a small bowl, mix the grated ginger root with the soy sauce, sake, and mirin.
3. Season the pork loin with salt and pepper.
4. In a large skillet or wok, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat.
5. Add the pork loin to the skillet and cook until it is browned on all sides, about 3-4 minutes.
6. Remove the pork from the skillet and set aside.
7. Add the ginger mixture to the skillet and cook until it has reduced and thickened slightly, about 2-3 minutes.
8. Return the pork to the skillet and toss it in the sauce until it is fully coated.
9. Cook the pork until it is cooked through, about 3-4 minutes more.
10. Serve the pork with the sauce on the side.

[/INST]

b8e018f7cd.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F. Spray lined baking sheet with cooking spray.
Remove eyes and scrape away bruises and dice potatoes.
Add olive oil, salt, pepper and any other seasonings you like and toss to coat.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, turn and bake for another 15-20 minutes.
b8e018f7cd.pred:
To prepare a delicious and healthy meal, start by washing the diced potatoes thoroughly. Then, heat the extra virgin olive oil in a large skillet or pan over medium heat. Add the diced potatoes and cook until they are tender and slightly browned, stirring occasionally.

Next, add the salt, pepper, and any additional herbs such as parsley and basil to enhance the flavor. Cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally, until the potatoes are cooked through and the seasonings are well combined.

Finally, add a pinch of paprika to give the dish a smoky and slightly spicy kick. Stir the ingredients together, and serve the dish hot, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh parsley or basil if desired.

This simple yet flavorful recipe showcases the versatility of potatoes as a base for a wide range of dishes, while also incorporating a variety of herbs and spices to create a delicious and satisfying meal.

d4627b79b5.gt:
Line a 4 1/2-by-8 1/2-inch loaf pan with 2 sheets of plastic wrap, leaving a 3-inch overhang on long sides.
In a blender, puree raspberries and sugar, scraping down sides as needed.
Strain through a fine-mesh sieve, pressing on solids; discard solids.
In a large bowl, whip cream until soft peaks form.
With a rubber spatula, fold in lemon curd.
Spoon 2 cups cream mixture into pan and smooth top.
Dip ladyfingers in raspberry puree and arrange in pan, parallel to long edges.
Pour remaining raspberry puree on ladyfingers.
Top with remaining cream mixture and smooth top.
Wrap pan with overhanging plastic and freeze 8 hours (or up to 2 weeks).
To serve, invert onto a serving platter, remove plastic, and slice.
Looking for more dessert ideas?
Check out our homemade chocolate chip cookie recipes, apple pie recipes, and chocolate cake recipes.
d4627b79b5.pred:
To cook a delightful Food, follow these steps:
1. In a small saucepan, combine 6 oz. raspberries, 2 tbsp. sugar, and 2 c. heavy cream. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the raspberries have softened and the mixture has thickened slightly.
2. In a separate bowl, mix 1 c. Lemon Curd with 10 ladyfingers.
3. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
4. Grease a 9-inch (23 cm) springform pan and line the bottom with parchment paper.
5. Spread the raspberry mixture evenly over the bottom of the prepared pan.
6. Carefully layer the ladyfingers on top of the raspberry mixture, arranging them in a circular pattern.
7. Pour the Lemon Curd mixture over the ladyfingers.
8. Bake the cake in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
9. Remove the cake from the oven and let it cool in the pan for 10-15 minutes.
10. Carefully remove the cake from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.

This delightful Food is a delicious raspberry and lemon curd cake, perfect for a special occasion or a treat for yourself. The combination of raspberries, sugar, heavy cream, and lemon curd creates a rich and tangy flavor, while the ladyfingers add a delightful crunch and a touch of elegance.

eec8247b03.gt:
Bring water to a boil in a saucepan; add rice and red pepper flakes.
Cover saucepan with a lid and remove from heat; let stand until water is absorbed, about 5 minutes.
Fluff rice with a fork and cool, about 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat; cook and stir rice until coated in oil, 15 to 20 seconds.
Add egg to wok; cook and stir until scrambled and cooked through, 1 to 2 minutes.
Stir green onions and garlic into rice mixture and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add cabbage, pineapple, cilantro, and bean sprouts to rice mixture; cook and stir until cabbage starts to wilt, about 5 minutes.
Stir soy sauce into rice mixture and cook for 30 seconds more.
eec8247b03.pred:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together the vegetable oil, egg, and minced garlic.
2. Add the shredded cabbage, bean sprouts, and chopped pineapple tidbits to the bowl and mix well.
3. Add the instant rice, red pepper flakes, and soy sauce to the bowl, and mix until well combined.
4. If desired, add the green onions for garnish.
5. Serve the dish immediately, or refrigerate and serve later.

By following these key steps, you will create a delicious and well-balanced meal that combines the flavors of rice, vegetables, and protein.

2d86850b18.gt:
Mix all ingredients thoroughly and turn out onto a floured board, knead lightly and then roll out gently and cut into biscuits.
Brush lightly with melted butter or margarine.
Place of greased cookie sheet and bake at 450 degrees for about 15 minutes.
2d86850b18.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 450°F (232°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the active starter, biscuit mix, baking powder, and cooking oil. Mix until the dough comes together.
3. On a floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.25 cm).
4. Cut out biscuit shapes using a biscuit cutter or the rim of a glass.
5. Place the biscuits on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the biscuits in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
7. Remove the biscuits from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade biscuits!

fbb3258d67.gt:
In a very large skillet, heat 3 tablespoons of the olive oil.
Season the shrimp with salt and pepper, add to the skillet and cook over moderately high heat until lightly browned, 1 to 2 minutes per side.
Transfer to a plate.
In the same skillet, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil.
Add the garlic and chiles and cook over moderately low heat, stirring, until softened, about 1 minute.
Add the clam juice and bring to a boil, then simmer over moderate heat until the broth has reduced by one-fourth, about 3 minutes.
Whisk in the butter a few cubes at a time until incorporated.
Add the shrimp and cherry tomatoes, season with salt and pepper and simmer until the shrimp are just cooked through, about 2 minutes longer.
Stir in the lemon juice, cilantro and chives and serve.
fbb3258d67.pred:
To cook a delicious shrimp dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large skillet or frying pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
2. Add the shrimp to the pan, season with salt and pepper, and cook until they are pink and cooked through, about 2-3 minutes per side.
3. Remove the shrimp from the pan and set aside.
4. In the same pan, add the garlic cloves and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
5. Add the dried arbol chile peppers, stemmed and chopped, and cook for an additional 30 seconds.
6. Pour in the clam juice or fish or shellfish stock, and bring the mixture to a simmer.
7. Add the shrimp back to the pan, and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes or until the shrimp are cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly.
8. Remove the shrimp from the pan, and let it rest for a few minutes.
9. In a small bowl, mix the lemon juice with the coarsely chopped cilantro.
10. Add the shrimp to the pan, tossing them in the sauce and cilantro mixture.
11. Serve the shrimp over a bed of rice or pasta, garnished with the snipped chives.

Enjoy your delicious shrimp dish!

ab4c597668.gt:
BEAT margarine at medium speed of electric mixer until light and fluffy; beat in jelly powder.
Mix in egg.
Stir in flour and baking powder.
SHAPE dough as illustrated; chill 2 hours.
CUT and bake at 350F for 8-10 min.
; cool.
GLAZE: Mix 2 cups icing sugar and 3 Tbsp water until smooth.
Blend in 3 to 4 drops food colouring to tint to desired colour.
Dip edges of cookies in frosting and dry on rack.

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the margarine, Jell-O Jelly Powder, and egg. Mix until smooth.
3. Gradually add the flour, baking powder, and mix until a dough forms.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until smooth and elastic.
5. Roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.25 cm).
6. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a knife.
7. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the cookies in the preheated oven for 8-10 minutes, or until they are lightly golden brown around the edges.

e8a204dd36.gt:
Bring water to a boil in a saucepan; add oats and miso paste.
Cook for about 1 minute.
Add spinach, walnuts, and seaweed to oat mixture; cook, stirring occasionally, until oatmeal is desired consistency, about 5 minutes.
Pour oatmeal into a bowl and top with avocado.
e8a204dd36.pred:
1. In a medium saucepan, combine the water and rolled oats. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 5 minutes, or until the oats are tender and the water has been absorbed.

2. Add the miso paste to the oat mixture, stirring to combine. Adjust the seasoning with salt and pepper to taste.

3. In a small bowl, mix the fresh spinach with the chopped roasted seaweed, if using.

4. Carefully remove the avocado from the peel and cube it.

5. To assemble the dish, divide the cooked oat mixture into four portions. Place one portion on each of four plates.

6. Top each portion with a dollop of sour cream, if desired.

7. Garnish each plate with a sprinkle of chopped walnut halves and a pinch of chopped roasted seaweed, if using.

8. Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious and healthy Food dish!

13260b1790.gt:
In a large skillet over medium heat heat the oil.
Add the next 4 ingredients (onion - garlic), cover and cook for 5 minutes or until vegetables are softened.
Transfer vegetables to crockpot.
Add next 7 ingredients (vegetable broth - pepper).
Cover and cook on low for 8 hours.
Stir in Tabasco and liquid smoke.
Divide rice into soup bowls and top with gumbo.
13260b1790.pred:

d1a0efbcd6.gt:
Combine flour, salt and baking powder.
Beat eggs with milk and add melted shortening.
Combine the 2 mixtures lightly.
Drop from tablespoon into shallow shortening or oil heated to 365 degrees.
Fry until brown and cooked in center, 4 to 5 minutes.
Drain on absorbent paper.
Optionals: - 1 1/2 cups whole cooked corn for corn fritters - 1 cup apples for apple fritters - 1 cup cooked, chopped shrimp for shrimp fritters

2cf467b3f7.gt:
Season all sides of the beef with a fair amount of salt and pepper.
In a large Dutch oven, or other heavy pot that has a tight cover, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over moderately high heat.
Add the garlic and the beef to the pot, browning the meat on all sides, taking the time to get a nice crust on the outside.
Add the onion and allow to lightly brown, about 3 to 4 minutes.
Add the crushed tomatoes, plus 1 tomato can of water, spices, season with salt and pepper, to taste, and add enough water to cover the meat.
Bring to a boil then reduce heat and simmer with a lid for 3 hours, or until the meat is fork tender.
Let meat cool some in the liquid.
Shred meat and place in store bought taco shells, make your own taco shells, or even roll up in warm flour tortillas.
Garnish with lettuce, cheese and chopped tomatoes--if desired.

7f9c7a1b1f.gt:
About one hour before smoking, coat both sides of ribs with a little vegetable oil and sprinkle with Chinese 5 spice.
Set aside at room temperature for 1 hour.
Heat charcoal or gas grill for indirect cooking at 230 to 250 degrees F. Add drained wood chips, if using.
Place the ribs, meaty side down, over a drip pan and cook for 2 hours.
Add about 12 coals to a charcoal grill every 45 minutes or so to maintain the heat.
Remove ribs from grill.
Double-wrap each rack in heavy-duty aluminum foil.
Return wrapped ribs to the grill and cook for 1 1/2 to 2 hours more over indirect heat, until very tender.
Add more coals as needed to maintain temperature for a charcoal grill.
Meanwhile, make the glaze.
Combine all ingredients in small saucepan.
Bring to a boil over medium-high heat; reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes, stirring frequently.
Remove ribs from grill and unwrap.
Place ribs over direct heat on grill and brush with honey red pepper glaze.
Cook for about 5 minutes until the glaze is set.
Turn ribs and repeat with more glaze.
7f9c7a1b1f.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the Smithfield Extra Tender Pork Back Ribs with the Chinese 5-spice powder, ensuring that the ribs are evenly coated.
3. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ribs to the skillet, being careful not to overcrowd the pan, and cook for about 5-7 minutes on each side or until the ribs are browned and cooked through.
4. Remove the ribs from the skillet and place them on a wire rack or a baking sheet.
5. While the ribs are cooking, prepare the smoking mixture. In a small bowl, mix the hickory or apple wood chips with water, and let them soak for about 30 minutes. Drain the chips and place them in a smoking tray or a foil-lined pan.
6. Place the smoking tray or pan with the chips in the oven, and let the chips smoke for about 15-20 minutes or until the ribs are done.
7. Remove the ribs from the oven and place them on the wire rack or baking sheet.
8. In a small bowl, mix the glaze ingredients together.
9. Brush the glaze onto the ribs, making sure to cover them evenly.
10. Return the ribs to the oven and cook for an additional 10-15 minutes or until the glaze is bubbly and caramelized.
11. Remove the ribs from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.

3d317eada1.gt:
Prepare berry blue jello according to directions on box.
Pour into 13x9 baking dish and place in the refrigerator.
Allow to chill until firm, about 1 hour.
Prepare lemon flavored gelatin using 1 cup of boiling water.
Beat cream cheese slightly and then add the lemon gelatin mixture.
Beat gelatin and cream cheese until smooth.
Set aside and allow to cool to room temperature.
Once the cream cheese mixture has cooled, fold in the whipped topping until mixed thoroughly.
Pour this mixture over the firmly set bottom layer.
Return to the refrigerator and chill until firm, about 1 hour.
Prepare raspberry jello according to directions on box.
Cool this mixture until room temperature and then pour over the middle cream cheese layer.
Return the 3 layers to the refrigerator and chill until top layer is firm.
Cut into squares to serve.
Top with a little whipped topping and a couple of blueberries, if desired.
3d317eada1.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the 2 packages of berry blue gelatin mix and the 1 package of lemon Jell-O gelatin.
2. Add the 8 ounces of cream cheese and the 8 ounces of whipped topping (Cool Whip).
3. Stir until the ingredients are well combined.
4. Add the 2 packages of raspberry Jell-O gelatin (or other red jello) and stir until the gelatin is fully incorporated.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or until the mixture is set.
6. Serve the dessert immediately or refrigerate for a few more hours for a firmer texture.

[/INST]

e993bcfbe8.gt:
Wash the beans.
In a large pot, cover them with cold water.
Soak for 6-8 hours.
Drain into a colander.
In the same pot, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat, add the onion and garlic, and saute until soft.
Add the beans and water or stock.
Cover and bring to a boil over high heat.
Reduce heat to low, add the rosemary, and simmer 2 hours or until the beans are tender.
Raise heat to high, add the pasta, and cook until al dente.
Season the soup to taste with salt and pepper, garnish with the chopped parsey.
Serve accompanied by grated Parmesan cheese and the optional extra-virgin olive oil.
e993bcfbe8.pred:
1. In a large pot, combine the small dried white beans, extra virgin olive oil, and minced garlic. Cook over medium heat for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the beans are tender and the garlic is fragrant.

2. Add the water or vegetable stock to the pot, and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for about 30 minutes or until the beans are tender.

3. While the beans are cooking, chop the onion and sauté it in a large skillet with the extra virgin olive oil over medium heat until it is soft and translucent.

4. After the beans have cooked for 30 minutes, add the chopped onion to the pot, stirring to combine. Cook for an additional 5 minutes or until the onion is tender.

5. Add the crushed rosemary to the pot, stirring to combine. Cook for an additional 1 minute.

6. Add the small shell pasta (orzo or small shells) to the pot, stirring to combine with the beans and onion mixture. Cook for about 8-10 minutes or until the pasta is al dente.

7. Season the pasta with salt and black pepper to taste.

8. Serve the flavorful Food hot, garnished with a sprinkle of freshly grated parmesan cheese and a drizzle of additional extra virgin olive oil, if desired.

[/INST]

4eef71a937.gt:
Pare and cut eggplant into 1/2 inch slices.
Set oven control at broil and/or 550 degrees.
Place eggplant slices on rack in broiler pan.
Brush butter on slices; season with salt and pepper.
Broil with tops about 3 inches from heat until eggplant is hot and tender.
about 6 minutes.
In a small saucepan, heat tomato sauce and garlic powder, stirring occasionally.
Serve on eggplant slices.

1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cut the eggplant into bite-sized pieces, and toss them in a bowl with the butter or margarine, salt, and pepper.
3. Spread the eggplant pieces evenly on a baking sheet, and roast them in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly browned.
4. In a large saucepan, combine the canned tomato sauce, garlic powder, and salt. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
5. Remove the eggplant from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked eggplant, the tomato sauce, and any remaining butter or margarine. Mix well to combine the ingredients.
7. Serve the eggplant and tomato mixture over a bed of cooked pasta, rice, or your preferred grain. Enjoy your delicious and satisfying meal.

87047dd9ed.gt:
Butter an 8x8 inch (20cmx20cm) pan or line it with parchment paper leaving a 2-inch/5 cm paper overhang on two sides.
In a bowl, mix together the crushed cookie crumbs, melted butter and sugar.
Transfer to the pan and press it down lightly and evenly with your fingers to cover the entire bottom of the dish.
Refrigerate until ready to use.
In a large microwave safe bowl combine condensed milk, butter and salt.
Microwave on high for 3 minutes.
Remove bowl from the microwave.
It will be very bubbly.
Add the chocolate chips or chopped chocolate.
Stir well until all the chocolate is melted and the mixture is really smooth.
Add the lemon curd, lemon juice, lemon extract and lemon zest.
Mix one more time.
Pour the lemon mixture on top of the cookie crust and spread evenly to the edges of the prepared pan.
Smooth the top.
Sprinkle marshmallows on top and press lightly to make sure it will stick to the bars.
Refrigerate or freeze until completely set.
Using the parchment paper overhangs, lift bars from pan and transfer to a cutting board.
Use a kitchen torch to lightly brown the marshmallows if you want to and then cut into 25 squares.
Eat them all or try not to!
87047dd9ed.pred:

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, light brown sugar, and graham cracker crumbs. Mix well.
3. Press the mixture into the bottom of a 9x9 inch baking dish.
4. Bake the crust for 10-12 minutes, or until it is set and slightly golden.
5. Remove the crust from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. In a small saucepan, heat the canned sweetened condensed milk over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until it reaches a smooth, creamy consistency.
7. Pour the warm milk mixture over the cooled crust.
8. In a separate small saucepan, melt the cubed butter over low heat. Stir in the salt, white chocolate chips, and lemon curd. Cook for a few minutes, stirring constantly, until the white chocolate chips are melted and the mixture is smooth.
9. Pour the white chocolate mixture over the condensed milk layer.
10. In a small bowl, mix the lemon juice, lemon extract, and lemon zest. Pour the mixture over the white chocolate layer.
11. Top the mixture with the mini marshmallows.
12. Bake the dessert in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the marshmallows are golden brown and the edges are slightly crisp.
13. Remove the dessert from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
14. Cut the dessert into squares and serve.

[/INST]

5af1409bc9.gt:
Pick over the lentils, discarding any misshapen lentils or stones.
Rinse the lentils until the water runs clear, then drain.
In a saucepan over high heat, combine the lentils, water, turmeric and the 1 teaspoon ghee.
Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Reduce the heat to medium, cover and simmer until the lentils are soft and tender, about 30 minutes.
In a frying pan over medium-high heat, warm the remaining 2 tablespoons ghee.
When hot, add the mustard seeds and fry until they turn gray, spatter, and pop, about 2 minutes.
Add the chillies, onion, garlic, ginger and curry leaves and saute until the onion is soft and golden, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the garam masala and tomatoes ad cook for 1 minute.
Pour the onion mixture into the pan of cooked lentils, add the salt and simmer for 5 minutes to blend the flavours.
Transfer to a serving dish and serve.

2. In a large pot, combine the lentils, water, turmeric, and ghee (clarified butter). Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 20-25 minutes or until the lentils are tender but still have some bite.
3. While the lentils are cooking, heat the ghee (clarified butter) in a small pan over medium heat. Add the black mustard seeds and let them sizzle for a few seconds.
4. Add the sliced onions, minced garlic, and ginger to the pan and cook until the onions are translucent.
5. Add the dried red chiles and curry leaves to the pan and cook for a few seconds.
6. Add the garam masala to the pan and stir to combine.
7. Add the tomatoes to the pan and cook until they are slightly softened.
8. Season the mixture with salt or to taste.
9. Once the lentils are cooked, add the cooked mixture to the pot with the lentils. Stir to combine.
10. Cook the mixture for a few more minutes, until the flavors are well-mixed and the dish is heated through.
11. Serve the cooked lentil dish hot, garnished with fresh cilantro if desired.

This step-by-step guide will help you cook up a delicious and nutritious lentil dish using the provided ingredients.

Cream butter and sugar.
Add egg and beat well.
Combine buttermilk and soda.
Combine flour and spices.
Add alternately with buttermilk, beginning and ending with flour.

Season chops with salt and pepper.

or until vegetables are tender.

Marinate steaks in marinade for 2 hours.
Saute steaks in butter; remove from pan when cooked to doneness you like.

77f61a5608.gt:
Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Position a rack in the upper third of the oven.
In a small bowl, combine the hoisin, soy sauce, wine, honey and garlic.
Line a baking sheet with foil and spray it lightly with cooking spray; set aside.
Place the salmon fillets on the baking sheet, and spoon the sauce over the fillets, trying to keep as much on each fillet as possible.

Just be sure NOT to touch any utensils that touched the raw fish into the reserved sauce.

Then fold in sour cream.
Transfer mixture to a 1 1/2 quart gratin dish, making sure that you dont compress (or squash, or moosh, or squish) it!
Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top.
Bake at 350 F until the top is golden brown, about 30 minutes.
Serves 6.
Recipe slightly adapted from williams-sonoma.com via Strip House.
