0eeb43444a.gt:
Steam the cauliflower florets for 10 minutes or until tender.
In a small skillet over medium heat, saute garlic in hazelnut oil or coconut oil, just until fragrant.
Add all of the ingredients into a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Serve over gluten-free noodles, spaghetti squash, veggie sticks, spuds, kale chips or Vegan Shepherds Pie On The Fly.

This recipe combines the tender, slightly sweet taste of cauliflower with the tangy, slightly salty flavor of the marinated artichoke hearts. The honey mustard adds a touch of sweetness and creaminess, while the salt and pepper provide a balanced, savory taste. e834a54d65.gt:
Bring 2 medium saucepans of salted water to a strong boil.
Add the squid to 1 saucepan and the shrimp to the other and boil until just cooked, about 1 minute for the squid and 3 minutes for the shrimp.
Drain the squid and shrimp and immediately transfer to a bowl of ice water to cool.
Drain again and pat dry.
In a large bowl, mix the lemon juice with the peanut oil, parsley, cilantro, garlic and jalapeno.
Add the mushrooms, shrimp and squid.
Season with salt and pepper and refrigerate until chilled, about 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, using a sharp knife, peel the oranges, removing all the bitter white pith.
Working over a bowl, cut in between the membranes to release the sections.
Squeeze the juice from the membranes over the chilled seviche.
Arrange the orange sections and avocado wedges around the edge of a platter.
Using a slotted spoon, spread the seviche in the center.
Spoon some of the marinade over the oranges and avocados and serve immediately.
e834a54d65.pred:

2. In a large bowl, toss the squid, shrimp, mushrooms, and garlic clove together.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, olive oil, parsley, cilantro, jalapeno, salt, and pepper.
4. Pour the dressing over the squid and shrimp mixture, and toss to coat evenly.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the squid is cooked through and the shrimp is pink and cooked through.
6. Serve the cooked squid and shrimp mixture over a bed of sliced navel oranges, and garnish with avocado wedges.

fd3e9f4f9e.gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Combine sugar, butter and cream cheese in large bowl.
Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until creamy.
Add milk, eggs and vanilla.
Continue beating until smooth.
Stir in flour and coconut.
Spoon into paper-lined or greased muffin cups, filling each 3/4 full.
Bake 32-38 minutes or until light golden brown.
Serve warm or at room temperature; top with fruit preserves or jam.
fd3e9f4f9e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the cream cheese and vanilla extract, and continue to mix until smooth.
4. Gradually add the milk, mixing until well combined.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs until well-beaten.
6. Add the eggs to the butter mixture, and mix until smooth.
7. In a small bowl, mix the flour and coconut.
8. Gradually add the flour mixture to the butter mixture, stirring until well-combined.
9. Fold in the sweetened flaked coconut.
10. Spread the batter evenly into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
11. Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
12. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
13. Once the cake is completely cooled, use a serrated knife to cut it into wedges.
14. Serve the cake with a dollop of fruit preserves or jam.

8afb640d04.gt:
Wash the sweet potato.
Bake the wet sweet potato in a toaster oven for 10 minutes.
Turn it 90 degrees, and bake for another 10 minutes.
You can also boil or microwave.
Mash the sweet potato with a masher.
Add katakuriko, and water, and knead briefly.
Preheat the oven to 180C / 350F, and set the baking time for 15 minutes.
In the meantime, roll the dough into bite-size balls, and lay on a sheet of parchment paper.
Bake in the oven for 15 minutes at 180C / 350F, then it's done.
8afb640d04.pred:
To prepare a delicious dish using the ingredients provided, follow these steps:

1. Wash and peel the small sweet potato.
2. Cut the sweet potato into small, evenly sized pieces.
3. In a small bowl, mix the sweet potato pieces with 10 grams of Katakuriko.
4. Add 10 ml of water to the bowl and mix well.
5. Allow the mixture to sit for a few minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together.
6. After a few minutes, the dish is ready to be served.

This dish combines the natural sweetness of the sweet potato with the unique texture and flavor of Katakuriko, creating a delightful and satisfying meal.

c1a30da967.gt:
Mix all ingredients except oil and dressing until well blended.
Shape into 8 patties.
Cook patties in hot oil in large frying pan on medium heat 4 to 5 minutes on each side or until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with dressing, if desired.
c1a30da967.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the prepared Stove Top Stuffing Mix, cooked turkey, chopped celery, and finely chopped chipotle pepper in adobo sauce.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the Mayo, flour, Dijon mustard, egg, and oil.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
5. If desired, add the Kraft Rancher's Choice Dressing to the mixture.
6. Transfer the mixture to a greased baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes or until the stuffing is cooked through and golden brown.
7. Serve hot and enjoy your delicious homemade Food!

c1c23779c6.gt:
Heat the cider, syrup, sugar and cinnamon sticks in a saucepan over medium heat.
Cook until the mixture is simmering, reduces by half and starts to thicken, about 15 minutes.
Remove from the heat, stir in the butter and let it cool completely.
Remove the cinnamon sticks, then pour over pancakes or use as desired.
c1c23779c6.pred:
To prepare a delicious apple cider-based dessert, follow these steps:

1. In a large saucepan, combine the two cups of apple cider, three tablespoons of light corn syrup, and one cup of loosely packed light brown sugar.
2. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally to ensure the sugar dissolves evenly.
3. Once the sugar has dissolved, reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer for about 10-15 minutes, or until it reaches the desired thickness.
4. Stir in the two sticks of cinnamon and one tablespoon of unsalted butter.
5. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the mixture cool for a few minutes.
6. Pour the mixture into a serving dish and let it cool completely.
7. Once the mixture has cooled, refrigerate it for at least an hour or until it reaches the desired consistency.
8. Serve the dessert in individual portions and enjoy the delicious apple cider-based dessert.

This dessert is a perfect combination of apple cider, light brown sugar, and cinnamon, creating a warm and comforting treat. The light corn syrup adds a touch of sweetness, while the unsalted butter enhances the richness of the dessert. The result is a delightful and satisfying apple cider-based dessert that can be enjoyed during the colder months or as a special treat.

50ae7ae60c.gt:
For this soup, I use 1/2 lb button, 1/4 lb cremini and 1/4 lb shitake mushrooms.
In a large pot, sautee mushrooms in olive oil until browned.
Add onions, carrots, celery and garlic and sautee until tender.
Add flour and thyme and cook for 3-4 mins until flour is cooked into the vegetables.
Add stock, bay leaf and rice and bring to a boil.
Simmer soup covered for 45-60 mins until rice is tender.
Add salt and pepper to taste and balsamic vinegar if desired.

To prepare the delicious wild rice and vegetable dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, or until fragrant.
3. Add the sliced onion and cook for an additional 2 minutes, or until softened.
4. Add the diced carrots, celery, and diced mushrooms to the saucepan. Cook for about 5 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
5. Add the dried thyme, flour, and bay leaf to the saucepan. Cook for an additional 1 minute, stirring constantly.
6. Gradually pour in the wild rice and brown rice, stirring to combine.
7. Add the vegetable stock, salt, and pepper to the saucepan. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 45 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid has been absorbed.
8. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it sit for a few minutes.
9. Stir in the balsamic vinegar, and serve the wild rice and vegetable dish hot.

Enjoy your delicious wild rice and vegetable dish!

c7e6c70205.gt:
In a medium bowl place first 7 ingredients up to lemon juice.
Stir until combined.
Set aside.
In a medium saute pan place 1/4 cup oil and heat to medium hot.
Fry each tortilla for 15 seconds, or until softened.
Drain on paper towels or paper bags.
In a large, heavy pan place 4 cups of oil and heat over high heat until very hot.
Loosely roll each tortilla and deep-fry it for 1-2 minutes, or until crisp.
Drain on paper towels or paper bags.
Stuff reserved vegetable mixture inside each tortilla.
Cut the taquitos in half, crosswise.

1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the feta cheese, diced tomatoes, and minced jalapeno pepper (if using). Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
4. Roast the mixture in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
5. While the cheese mixture is cooking, heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
6. Add the diced onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.

8. Add the minced jalapeno pepper (if using) and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
9. Add the diced yellow onion and cook for another 5 minutes, or until it is softened.
10. Add the chopped cilantro and cook for 1 minute, or until it is fragrant.
11. Remove the vegetable mixture from the skillet and set aside.
12. In a small bowl, mix the lemon juice with the corn tortillas, and then coat the tortilla mixture with oil.
13. Heat the tortilla mixture in a skillet over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the tortillas are crispy and golden brown.
14. Serve the crispy tortilla mixture alongside the cheese and vegetable mixture.

Enjoy your delicious, homemade Food!

1282ffb964.gt:
Cook onion rings as directed on package.
When onions are almost done, grill franks 7 to 9 min.
or until heated through, turning occasionally and adding buns to the grill to toast for the last few minutes.
Spread rolls with barbecue sauce.
Insert each frank through 3 onion rings; place in bun.
Top with cheese.
1282ffb964.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the frozen breaded onion rings and the beef franks.
3. Place the mixture on a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the onion rings are golden brown and the beef franks are cooked through.
4. While the onion rings and beef franks are cooking, prepare the hot dog sandwich rolls by splitting them in half.
5. In a small bowl, mix the barbecue sauce and the KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Cheddar Cheese.
6. Once the onion rings and beef franks are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Assemble the hot dog sandwich rolls by placing the cooked beef franks on the bottom half of the roll, then topping them with the barbecue sauce and shredded cheese mixture.
8. Place the top half of the roll on top of the beef franks and cheese, and serve immediately.

These steps will result in a delicious Food that combines the crispy texture of the frozen breaded onion rings with the savory flavors of the beef franks and barbecue sauce, all served on a soft hot dog bun.

21b8be21c5.gt:
Place all ingredients together in roasting pan.
Bake, uncovered, in 325 oven, 1 1/2 to 2 hours.
Stir often.
This recipe can be made in a crockpot, as well.
Mix all ingredients together in crockpot, set temperature dial to low setting, cook 4-6 hours.
Stir occasionally.

To prepare a tasty Food, follow these steps:
1. Open the can of pork and beans and drain the liquid.
2. In a large pot or skillet, cook the chopped white onion and green pepper over medium heat until they are softened.
3. Add the diced raw bacon and cook until it is crispy.

6. Stir the mixture well to combine all ingredients.
7. Add the drained pork and beans to the pot or skillet and stir to combine.
8. Cook the mixture over medium heat until it is heated through and the flavors have melded together.

This tasty Food is a delicious combination of pork and beans, onions, green peppers, bacon, catsup, and brown sugar. The ingredients work together to create a flavorful and satisfying dish that can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

b9040d1858.gt:
Place salted caramel sauce into the bottom of your mug and slowly add in the shot of espresso whilst stirring the mixture together.
Set aside.
Place cocoa powder, milk and sugar into a small saucepan over low-medium heat.

Finish with some chocolate sprinkles and serve immediately.
b9040d1858.pred:

1. In a saucepan, heat the Salted Caramel Sauce over low heat until it reaches a smooth consistency.

6. Optionally, sprinkle the dish with extra Salted Caramel Sauce and/or sprinkles for added flavor and visual appeal.

663548f6ad.gt:
Do not peel potatoes.
Cut potatoes in long, uniformly shaped sticks.
Fry in hot oil(approx 325F)to desired doneness(dark & well done is the way they do them at the stands on the boardwalk).
Remove fries to paper towels and generously salt right away.
Serve in a paper cup or cone with plenty of malt vinegar.
663548f6ad.pred:
To prepare a delicious meal using the ingredients provided, follow these steps:
1. Wash the potato thoroughly and peel it.
2. Cut the potato into evenly sized pieces, depending on the desired size of the fries.
3. Heat oil in a large frying pan or wok over medium heat.

7. Remove the cooked fries from the oil using a slotted spoon or tongs, and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil.
8. Serve the crispy fries hot, as a side dish or as part of a larger meal.

6a483319ff.gt:
Wash the enoki mushrooms, cut off the stem ends and put on a plate.
Put a pat of butter (or margarine) on top.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Top with cheese (I used sliced cheese) and cover loosely with plastic wrap.
Microwave for about a minute and it's done.
Add a little soy sauce or ponzu sauce before eating.
Enjoy piping hot!
6a483319ff.pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix the Enoki mushrooms, Cheese, Salt, and pepper. Set aside.
2. In a pan, melt the Butter (or margarine) over medium heat. Add the Soy sauce and ponzu, stirring to combine.
3. Add the mushroom mixture to the pan, stirring to coat evenly with the sauce. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the mushrooms are tender and the sauce has thickened slightly.
4. Serve immediately, garnished with a sprinkle of freshly ground black pepper, if desired.

This recipe combines the flavors of Enoki mushrooms, Cheese, Soy sauce, and ponzu to create a delicious and satisfying dish. The mushrooms add a unique earthy taste, while the Cheese provides a creamy, rich texture. The Soy sauce and ponzu enhance the overall taste, creating a harmonious balance of flavors. The combination of these ingredients results in a delightful and satisfying dish that can be enjoyed as a side dish or a main course.

f01aec104c.gt:
Let the chopped tomato drain in a colander while preparing the rest of the guacamole.
Bring 4 cups water to a boil in a small saucepan.
Add the frozen lima beans and cook until tender and creamy, about 5 minutes.
Drain the beans and rinse under cold water until cool.
Pat the beans dry with a paper towels then remove the skins by pinching the beans so the skins slide off.
If using baby limas, you can skip this step.
Scoop out a quarter of the avocado flesh, then process it with the lima beans, lime juice, mayonnaise, and 1/2 teaspoons salt in a food processor until very smooth, 1-1 1/2 minutes, stopping to scrape down the bowl as needed.
Cube the remaining 3/4 of the avocado into 1/2" pieces.
Gently stir the cubed avocado, pureed lima mixture, drained tomato, cilantro, jalapeno, onion, garlic, and cumin together.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Enjoy!
The guacamole can be refrigerated, wrapped tightly in plastic wrap, for up to 48 hours.
(the lima beans help keep it very green).
Make sure the plastic wrap is touching the surface of the guacamole.
Bring to room temperature and season with additional fresh lime juice, salt, and pepper before serving.
f01aec104c.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chopped tomatoes, lima beans, avocado, lime juice, mayonnaise, salt, and cilantro. Mix well.
3. Add the minced jalapeno chile, minced red onion, and minced garlic to the bowl. Mix well.
4. Add the cumin, pepper, and mix again.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the mixture is hot and bubbly.
6. Serve the cooked Food immediately, and enjoy!

[/INST]

3b5d73be72.gt:
Add butter and sugar into a bowl, and mix until the mixture becomes white (If it's hard to blend, add oil in small amounts).
Add egg and remaining vegetable oil, and mix some more.
Sift the ingredients.
Add milk and dry ingredients alternately in 2 batches to the bowl, and mix.
When the batter is ready, it's really smooth.
Pour the batter into muffin cups.
Bake in the oven for 25 ~ 30 minutes at 170C (340F).
It's done.
These are also great as presents.
3b5d73be72.pred:
To create a delicious Food using the provided ingredients, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the egg, sugar, and milk. Whisk until well-combined.
3. Add the cake flour, baking powder, and vegetable oil to the bowl, and mix until the ingredients are well-incorporated.
4. Gradually add the butter, mixing until the dough comes together.
5. If the dough is too dry, you can add a little more milk. If it is too wet, you can add a little more flour.
6. Once the dough is the right consistency, shape it into a ball and place it on a lightly floured surface.
7. Flatten the dough into a disk, and then roll it out to your desired thickness.
8. Grease a baking sheet or line it with parchment paper. Place the rolled-out dough on the prepared surface.
9. Bake the dough for 12-15 minutes, or until it is golden brown and cooked through.
10. Remove the baked dough from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into desired shapes.
11. Enjoy your delicious Food!

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
Please note that this is a general recipe and may not be suitable for all dietary preferences or restrictions. Always consult a reliable source for specific recipes and ingredient information.
<</SYS>>

b801079396.gt:
In a small pot simmer the green garlic in the olive oil for 5 minutes.
Cool completely (this is very important, if the oil is still warm, the aioli will break).
When the oil is cold, combine the remaining ingredients in a small bowl and whisk until frothy.
Slowly drizzle the green garlic olive oil in drop by drop until an emulsion is made.
Continue to add the oil and green garlic until you aioli is thick and creamy, season with salt to taste.
b801079396.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the olive oil, egg yolks, Dijon mustard, and juice from the Meyer lemon. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Add the diced green garlic to the bowl and toss to coat the garlic pieces evenly with the dressing.
4. Transfer the garlic mixture to a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the garlic is tender and the edges are slightly crispy.
5. Serve the garlic-infused dish immediately, and enjoy the delicious flavors of the green garlic and the tangy, citrusy touch of the Meyer lemon.

b53489fe80.gt:
Pre heat oven to 180c/350F.
Grease a 6" cake tin or 1 lb loaf tin, and line with greaseproof paper.
Rub the butter into the flour so that it looks like breadcrumbs.
Add the sugar, ground nuts, chopped nuts, dates and the spice.
Mix well.
Add the egg and milk stir with a spoon, do not beat the mixture.
Transfer the mixture to the tin and top with a few nuts.
Bake for 1.5 hour or until a tooth pick inserted into the centre comes out clean.
Allow to cool in the tin for 10 mins and place on a wire rack.
When cool peel off the paper.
b53489fe80.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sifted flour, softened butter, caster sugar, ground mixed spice, and ground walnuts.
3. Add the chopped dates and chopped walnuts to the bowl, and mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg and milk together.
5. Pour the egg and milk mixture into the dry ingredients, and mix until a dough forms.
6. On a floured surface, roll out the dough to your desired thickness.
7. Transfer the dough to a greased baking sheet or a round cake pan.
8. Bake the dough in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until it is golden brown.
9. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into slices and serving.

[/INST]

fa8f24e9ab.gt:
Stir together dry ingredients.
Mix liquids and fruit or nuts together and add to dry mixture, stirring lightly.
Fill 6 oiled muffin tins 1/2 full and bake 15 minutes at 425 degrees F.
fa8f24e9ab.pred:
To cook a delightful Food, follow these steps:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 cup oat flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, and 1/2 teaspoon sea salt.
2. Add 2 tablespoons honey raw, 13 cup buttermilk, and mix well.
3. Add 1/2 cup raisins, seedless or dates, and mix again.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, and then add the eggs beaten.
5. Combine the wet ingredients with the dry ingredients, and mix until well combined.
6. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
7. Grease a baking sheet or line it with parchment paper.
8. Pour the batter onto the prepared baking sheet, and smooth the top with a spatula.
9. Bake the cake for 20-25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes, then remove it from the baking sheet and let it cool completely on a wire rack.

This delightful Food is a delicious and moist oatmeal cake, perfect for breakfast or a snack. The combination of oat flour, baking powder, and sea salt provides a balanced flavor, while the honey adds a touch of sweetness. The raisins and dates add a natural sweetness and a touch of moisture, and the eggs help to bind the ingredients together. The vegetable oil ensures that the cake has a tender and moist texture. Enjoy your homemade oatmeal cake!

00b1995e31.gt:
Heat oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Season pork ribs with salt and pepper.
Working in two batches, sear the pork until light golden brown, about 3 minutes per side.
As each batch of pork is seared, place it in the bottom of the crockpot.
Pour out all but 1 tablespoon of the drippings.
Add shallots and garlic to the pot.
Saute until the shallots are light golden brown.
Add tomato paste and cook until the paste becomes dark red, approximately 3 minutes.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, red wine, and fish sauce.
Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Pour the tomato sauce into the crockpot.
Add cannellini beans to the crockpot.
Cook on low heat for 6 to 8 hours, or until the pork is tender.
Remove the pork from the crockpot and cut into bite-sized pieces.
Return the pork to the crockpot and keep warm until ready to serve over rice or pasta (I use egg noodles).
Garnish with chopped fresh Italian parsley and grated Parmesan cheese.
00b1995e31.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the pork ribs, salt, pepper, and minced shallots. Toss to coat the pork evenly.
3. Heat the canola oil in a large oven-safe skillet or Dutch oven over medium-high heat. When the oil is hot, carefully add the pork ribs, being careful not to overcrowd the pan. Cook the ribs for about 5-7 minutes, or until they are browned on all sides.
4. Remove the pork ribs from the pan and set aside.
5. In the same pan, add the chopped garlic and cook for about 1 minute, or until fragrant.
6. Add the tomato paste and cook for about 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
7. Add the crushed tomatoes, red wine, and fish sauce. Stir to combine.
8. Return the pork ribs to the pan, and add the cannellini beans. Stir to combine.
9. Cover the pan with a lid and bake in the preheated oven for about 1-1.5 hours, or until the pork is tender and the sauce has thickened.
10. Remove the pan from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
11. Serve the delicious Food hot, garnished with chopped fresh Italian parsley.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

14273bf5f9.gt:
Trim most of fat from pork loin, and place in crock pot, fat side up.
Sprinkle with garlic powder, pepper, salt, and red pepper flakes.
Top with onion.
Cook on high for 45-60 minutes.
Switch to low.
Cook on low for about 4 1/2 hours.
Mix all sauce ingredients together.
Separate pork loin into big chunks.
Pour sauce mixture into crock pot, making sure to mix in juices from pork loin.
Cook for one more hour, then shred pork with two forks.
Barbecue can be left simmering for another 2 hours on low, or switched to"keep warm" setting instead.
Serve on buns.
14273bf5f9.pred: [INST]To prepare the pork loin, first preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Season the pork loin with the garlic powder, black pepper, salt, and red pepper flakes. Place the pork loin in a baking dish and pour the ketchup over it. Add the onion slices on top of the pork loin. Pour the tomato sauce over the pork loin and onions. Sprinkle the garlic powder, honey, Worcestershire sauce, smoky-style barbecue sauce, apple cider vinegar, and cayenne pepper over the pork loin and onions. Bake the pork loin in the preheated oven for approximately 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C). Remove the pork loin from the oven and let it rest for 10 minutes before slicing and serving. Enjoy your delicious pork loin with a side of your choice. [/INST]

07f2c36b9b.gt:
Heat bacon for 30 seconds in the microwave between two pieces of paper towel to soak up excess grease
Spread honey mustard on tortilla then lay cheese on top of honey mustard, then add chicken, then add the bacon.
Spread the guacamole on top of the bacon then lay lettuce leaves on top of guacamole
Roll up and devour!
07f2c36b9b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
3. Place the chicken on a baking sheet and cook for 20-25 minutes or until fully cooked through.
4. While the chicken is cooking, prepare the guacamole by mashing the avocado with a fork or a potato masher. Add the Wholly Guacamole Classic to the mashed avocado and mix well.
5. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
6. While the chicken is resting, prepare the salad by washing and drying the lettuce.
7. Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces and serve it on a plate.
8. To assemble the salad, place the lettuce on a separate plate.
9. Drizzle the honey mustard over the lettuce and toss it gently to coat the leaves evenly.
10. To assemble the sandwich, spread the guacamole on one side of the tortilla.
11. Place the cooked chicken on the other side of the tortilla, and top it with the baby Swiss cheese.
12. Roll the tortilla around the chicken and cheese, and slice it in half.
13. Serve the chicken, salad, and sandwich on a plate.

Enjoy your delicious Food dish!

ce99fab83f.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F.
Cream together butter, sugar, egg and vanilla extract until well combined.
Add flour, baking soda, and salt to mixture.
Fold in puffed rice cereal gently so as not to break up the puffs.
Incorporate chocolate chips.
Bake for 10 15 minutes.
ce99fab83f.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla extract.
3. Add the flour, baking soda, and salt, and mix until well combined.
4. Stir in the Rice Krispies or Cocoa Krispies.
5. Fold in the chocolate chips.
6. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
8. Allow the bars to cool completely before cutting into squares.

[/SYS]

1db4782a47.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F
Place a paper cupcake liner in each cup (12 total) of muffin pan.
Beat cream cheese with electric mixer until fluffy.
Add sugar and vanilla, beating well.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.,.
Place one of the Oreo halves, cream side up, in each muffin cup.
Spoon cream cheese mixture over wafers filling each to about 1/4 inch from top of paper.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Cool completely.
Spoon a tablespoon of the cherry pie filling on top of each tart.
Chill before serving.
1db4782a47.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened cream cheese and sugar. Mix until smooth and creamy.
3. Add the vanilla extract and eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Fold in the Oreo cookies, making sure they are evenly distributed.
5. Pour the mixture into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) springform pan.
6. Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until the center is set and the edges are slightly golden.
7. Allow the cheesecake to cool in the pan for about 10-15 minutes.
8. Remove the cheesecake from the pan and place it on a wire rack to cool completely.
9. Once the cheesecake is fully cooled, refrigerate it for at least 2 hours or overnight.
10. To prepare the cherry pie filling, carefully open the can and spoon the cherry pie filling into a small saucepan.
11. Heat the cherry pie filling over medium heat, stirring constantly, until it reaches the desired consistency.
12. Allow the cherry pie filling to cool for a few minutes before pouring it over the cooled cheesecake.
13. Refrigerate the cheesecake with the cherry pie filling for at least 2 hours or overnight.
14. Once the cheesecake is fully chilled, remove it from the refrigerator and let it sit at room temperature for about 15-20 minutes before cutting and serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade cheesecake with cherry pie filling!

c5ede2d8c3.gt:
Smooth the asparagus stalks with a peeler.
Cut in half lengthwise, then slice into 4-5 cm lengths.
Put the asparagus, salt and sesame oil into a heatproof dish and mix gently.
Microwave unwrapped at 600 W for 2 minutes.
Add more salt and sesame oil if necessary, and sprinkle on some white sesame seeds to finish.
c5ede2d8c3.pred:
1. Wash the asparagus thoroughly under cold running water to remove any dirt or debris.
2. In a large bowl, combine the asparagus, salt, and sesame oil. Mix well to ensure the asparagus is evenly coated with the oil and salt.
3. Add the white sesame seeds to the bowl and mix them in with the asparagus and oil mixture.
4. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
5. After the time has passed, remove the bowl from the refrigerator and let it sit at room temperature for a few minutes to allow the ingredients to come to room temperature.
6. Serve the asparagus immediately, or store it in the refrigerator for up to 24 hours before serving.

This recipe combines the natural flavors of asparagus, salt, sesame oil, and white sesame seeds to create a delicious and healthy dish. The salt and sesame oil add depth and richness to the asparagus, while the white sesame seeds provide a crunchy texture and a subtle nutty flavor. The combination of these ingredients results in a satisfying and well-balanced dish that can be enjoyed as a side or a main course.

15565646e5.gt:
Sift all the ingredients together.
Wrap the lid with a kitchen towel, and start boiling water in the steamer.
Cut up the cranberries into small pieces.
In a bowl whisk the egg yolk, and add the vegetable oil, milk, sugar and strawberry sauce, in that order, and mix each time you add an ingredient.
Add the sifted dry ingredients to the bowl.
Add the cranberries and fold into the batter with a spatula.
The batter should be somewhat sticky and thick.
Place cupcake linings into silicone muffin molds and spoon in the batter 70% full.
Align the molds in the steamer and steam for 12 minutes over high heat, and the buns are done.
If you're not going to eat the buns right away, place them in a plastic bag while they are still slightly warm.
This is to prevent them from hardening.
15565646e5.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, whisk the egg yolk and vegetable oil together until smooth.
2. Gradually add the milk, sugar, and baking powder, whisking until well combined.
3. Stir in the strawberry sauce and cake flour, mixing until the batter is smooth and free of lumps.
4. If desired, add cranberries to the batter.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch round cake pan.
6. Bake in a preheated oven at 350°F (175°C) for about 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

This delightful Food is a delicious and moist cake that can be enjoyed by everyone. The combination of ingredients, such as the egg yolk, vegetable oil, milk, sugar, strawberry sauce, cake flour, baking powder, and cranberries, creates a rich and flavorful cake that is both visually appealing and delicious.

9b2eec25f7.gt:
Wash the cabbage well, remove the core, and chop roughly.
Try to use very fresh, raw beef offal!
Blanch the beef offal by dipping it in boiling water and then putting it in ice water.
Cut the Chinese chives into 5 cm pieces.
Remove the center of the garlic and slice the cloves.
Cut the grilled tofu into 12 equal pieces.
Remove the seeds from the red chili pepper.
Add all ingredients except for the Chinese chives and sesame oil.
Simmer and skim off scum.
If using chicken stock, add 1.5 tablespoons now.
When the cabbage is cooked, add the Chinese chives and the sesame oil.
Cutting the red chili pepper into very fine pieces will increase the spiciness.
As soon as the Chinese chives are heated, sprinkle on the sesame seeds and it's all done!
Eat with the soup and enjoy!
Make ramen for the "shime" at the end of the meal.
Cook fresh noodles in boiling water for 1 minute and then add to the hot pot soup.
Simmer for 3 minutes and the noodles are done.
Refer tofor the chicken stock.
9b2eec25f7.pred:
1. In a large pot, combine the raw beef offal, chicken stock, and soy sauce. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 1-1.5 hours, or until the beef is tender.

2. While the beef is cooking, chop the cabbage into bite-sized pieces. In a large skillet, heat the sesame oil over medium heat. Add the Chinese chives and garlic, and cook until the chives are wilted and the garlic is fragrant.

3. Add the cooked beef to the skillet with the chives and garlic, and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the beef is heated through.

4. In a small bowl, mix the sesame seeds and sugar. Sprinkle the mixture over the beef and cabbage mixture.

5. Add the tofu to the skillet, and stir to combine with the beef and cabbage. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the tofu is heated through.

6. Serve the flavorful Food over Ramen or chanpon noodles, and enjoy!

[/INST]

f545630e3c.gt:
Combine cracker crumbs and taco seasoning, stirring well.
Roll chicken in cracker crumbs and place in a greased 13x9 baking dish.
Saute green onions in butter in a skillet until tender.
Stir in whipping cream and remaining ingredients.
Pour over chicken.
Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 45 minutes.
f545630e3c.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the Cheddar Cheese Crackers, Taco Seasoning, and green onions.
3. Dip the chicken breasts in the melted butter, then coat them with the cheese and taco seasoning mixture.
4. Place the chicken breasts on a baking sheet, and bake for 25-30 minutes or until cooked through.
5. While the chicken is baking, prepare the whipping cream. In a small bowl, mix the Monterey Jack Cheese and chicken bouillon granules.
6. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
7. In a small saucepan, heat the whipping cream over medium heat until it starts to bubble.
8. Pour the hot whipping cream over the chicken, and stir to combine.
9. Serve the chicken and cheese mixture immediately.

[/INST]

6a3e3c9a3b.gt:
Soften butter, add sugar and eggs, stir till creamy.
Sift flour, baking powder and salt.
Fold dry ingredients into creamy mixture.
Blend in almonds, raisins, lemon.
Add needed milk.
Pour into greased cake form/angel food cake pan.
Bake at 350 F for 30 to 40 minutes.
Remove from oven and cool.
If you wish to add a glaze use recipe below.
To create a glaze, combine 3 cups of powdered sugar, 3/4 cup of milk, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, and the zest (grated skin) of 1 orange in a large bowl.
Drizzle glaze on top of Gugelhopf and enjoy!
6a3e3c9a3b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt.
3. Add the milk, melted butter, and lemon juice, and mix until smooth.
4. Add the eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Stir in the raisins, almonds, and lemon zest.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

4ecdf46b58.gt:
Heat frying pan and fry bacon until lightly browned
Spoon baked beans onto base of muffin halves, top with cooked bacon and squirt tomato sauce on bacon if you wish and top each muffin with cheese
Place muffins under grill and cook for a few minutes until cheese has melted
4ecdf46b58.pred:
To prepare a delicious and satisfying meal using the ingredients provided, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Place the two English muffins on a baking sheet or a lined baking sheet, cut side up.
3. Spread a thin layer of butter on each English muffin.
4. Place the tin of baked beans in ham sauce on top of the English muffins.
5. Top the baked beans with the four slices of bacon.
6. Add the four slices of soft cheddar cheese on top of the bacon.
7. If desired, spread a thin layer of tomato sauce on top of the cheese.
8. Bake the English muffin sandwich in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Remove the sandwich from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing it into halves.

Enjoy your delicious and satisfying meal!

0af8036e1e.gt:
Grease an 11 x 7-inch-inch baking pan.
Set oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, beat 1 cup sugar and the shortening with an electric mixer on medium or high speed until well mixed.
Add in eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition, then add in orange extract.
In a small bowl mix together flour, baking soda and salt.
Add flour mixture and buttermilk alternately to egg mixture, beating on low speed after each addition JUST until combined.
By hand stir in the orange peel, raisins and nuts.
Transfer and spread the batter into prepared baking pan.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean.
Stir together 1/3 cup sugar and the orange juice; gradually pour over the baked cake.
Cool in pan on a wire rack for 30 minutes.
Serve warm, or cool completely.
0af8036e1e.pred:
To make a delicious Food, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, shortening, eggs, and flour.
3. Add the baking soda and salt to the mixture, and mix well.
4. Gradually add the buttermilk, orange extract, and orange zest to the mixture, mixing until well combined.
5. If using raisins and nuts, add them to the batter, reserving a small amount of nuts for garnishing.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Food!

cf03193597.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F Lightly grease two baking sheets or cover them with parchment paper.
In a medium-sized bowl, mix well oats, coconut, flour, and sugar.
Mix in butter and honey.
In a small bowl, mix boiling water and baking soda together and add to the flour mixture.
Drop rounded teaspoonfuls of dough 3 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes, until crisp and golden brown.
Cool on the baking sheet for 30 seconds.
Loosen with a thin spatula and cool on wire racks.
If the cookies stick to the sheet, return to the oven for 1 minute, then loosen with a spatula.
When cool, store in an airtight container.
cf03193597.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the honey or light corn syrup, and continue to mix until well combined.
4. Add the rolled oats, sweetened flaked coconut, all-purpose flour, and baking soda to the bowl. Mix until the dry ingredients are evenly distributed.
5. Gradually add the boiling water, stirring until the dough comes together.
6. Turn the dough onto a floured surface and knead until smooth and elastic.
7. Roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
8. Cut the dough into desired shapes or use a cookie cutter to create desired shapes.
9. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are lightly golden brown around the edges.
11. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

d6c22c19dd.gt:
Cut your brownies up into square bite size pieces and put a single layer of the brownies in the container you want to use.
It can be single serving or in a big truffle dish.
Whip your cream to stiff peaks and then fold in powder sugar.
Making sure it's combined.
Spoon or put in the whipped cream in pastry bag and put the whipped cream top of the brownies.
Then, drizzle the caramel on top and drizzle the chocolate fudge in a pastry bag or zip lock bag and cutting a end on it and top the brownie sundae with cherry.
Enjoy.
d6c22c19dd.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the following ingredients: 1 cup of all-purpose flour, 1 cup of unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 cup of granulated sugar, 1 teaspoon of baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon of salt, and 1/2 cup of unsalted butter.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the whipping cream and vanilla extract.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking pan.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
7. Allow the brownies to cool completely in the pan before cutting them into squares.
8. To prepare the caramel ice cream topping, combine 1 cup of caramel sauce and 1/2 cup of ice cream in a small mixing bowl. Stir until smooth.
9. To assemble the brownies, place a square of brownies on a plate. Drizzle the caramel ice cream topping over the top of the brownies.
10. Garnish with cherries if desired.

[/INST]

0524637e4d.gt:
Don't peel the potatoes.
Just wash if needed.
Then cut in to medium dice.
Put in pan with enough water to cover.
Add the amount of salt for your taste.
Bring to the boil.
Cook until tender, but not mushy.
Cool a little.
While the potatoes are cooking mix all the other ingredients for the dressing together in a bowl or jug.
You may want to add more or less milk to the dressing, depending how thick or thin you want to coat the potatoes.
0524637e4d.pred:
[INST]
To make a delicious potato salad, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into bite-sized pieces.
3. In a large bowl, toss the potatoes with 3 tablespoons of mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon of whole grain honey mustard, and 1 tablespoon of unsweetened plain yogurt.
4. Season the potatoes with 12 teaspoons of salt, and mix well.
5. Transfer the potatoes to a baking dish, and bake in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly crispy on the outside.
6. Remove the potatoes from the oven, and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining 2 tablespoons of mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons of milk, and the desired amount of honey to achieve the desired thickness of the dressing.
8. Pour the dressing over the cooled potatoes, and toss to combine.
9. Serve the potato salad immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

[/INST]

84cd401629.gt:
Roast the poblano peppers direct in the stove until the skin turns black, be careful not to burn the pepper.
Put the roast poblano peppers into a plastic bag and top with a cloth, wait 10 minutes.
Put oil on your hands and peel the poblano peppers.
With a thin knife carefully opened vertically and cut the base of the seeds, remove seeds and wash if necessary.
Fill poblano peppers with cheese.
Heat the oil in an 1 inch pan and stir the garlic, add the rice, stir for 2 minutes until rices start move and stick together, add 1 1/2 cup of water, put the poultry seasoning and the salt move carefully.
place the poblano peppers on the pan.
Turn heat to low.
cover and let cook until water is absorbed.
Add 1 cup of water, wait until water gone and taste the rice.
84cd401629.pred:
To create a delicious and satisfying dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot, combine the rice, water, and poultry seasoning. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the pot. Cook for about 15-20 minutes or until the rice is cooked and the water has been absorbed.
3. While the rice is cooking, heat the olive oil in a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat. Add the sliced garlic and cook for about 1-2 minutes, or until fragrant.
4. Add the sliced peppers to the skillet and cook for about 5-7 minutes, or until they are tender but still crisp.
5. Once the rice is cooked, remove it from the heat and let it rest for a few minutes.
6. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked rice, mozzarella cheese, and any desired seasonings or herbs. Mix well to combine.
7. Transfer the rice mixture to a baking dish or a casserole dish, and spread it evenly.
8. Drizzle the melted mozzarella cheese over the top of the rice mixture.
9. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy your delicious and satisfying Poblano Pepper and Rice Casserole!

dbe7c0f305.gt:
Bring water to a boil.
Add the salt.
Gradually whisk in cornmeal, then reduce to low heat and cook until thick and tender (about 15 minutes).
Remove from heat and stir in the parmesan, milk, butter, herbs, and pepper.
dbe7c0f305.pred:
1. In a large pot, bring the 6 cups of water to a boil.
2. Add the 2 teaspoons of salt to the water.
3. While the water is heating, prepare the other ingredients.
4. In a small bowl, mix the 1-3/4 cup of yellow cornmeal with the 3/4 cup of grated Parmesan cheese.
5. In a medium bowl, mix the 3/4 cup of whole milk with the 6 tablespoons of butter.
6. Add the chopped Italian parsley, rosemary, thyme, and pepper to the milk mixture.
7. Once the water has reached a boil, carefully pour the cornmeal mixture into the boiling water, stirring constantly.
8. Reduce the heat to low and let the mixture cook for about 20-25 minutes, or until the cornmeal is tender and the mixture has thickened.
9. Remove the pot from the heat and let it sit for a few minutes.
10. Stir in the milk mixture, and continue stirring until the cornmeal is well combined and the mixture is smooth.
11. Serve the flavorful Food hot, and enjoy!

[/INST]

1bcf4a39d5.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Press pie crust into a 9-inch deep dish pie plate.
Cover the edges of the crust with aluminum foil.
Bake pie crust until lightly browned, about 12 minutes.
Set pie crust aside to cool.
Increase oven heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Cook bacon in a large skillet over medium-high heat until crisp, about 10 minutes.
Drain the bacon slices on paper towels, while retaining drippings in the skillet.
Stir zucchini, mushrooms, onion, and garlic into the reserved bacon drippings; season with Italian seasoning, dill, parsley, garlic salt, and black pepper.
Cook and stir the zucchini mixture until the zucchini is tender yet crisp, 5 to 7 minutes; remove from heat.
Chop the bacon and stir through the zucchini mixture.
Sprinkle about half the mozzarella cheese into the bottom of the pie crust.
Spoon zucchini mixture over the mozzarella cheese layer.
Pour eggs over the zucchini mixture; top with remaining mozzarella cheese.
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over the mozzarella cheese.
Put pie plate onto a baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven until the top begins to brown, about 30 minutes.
1bcf4a39d5.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the prepared pie crust, melted butter, and seasonings. Press the mixture evenly into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch (23 cm) deep-dish pie pan.
3. Bake the crust for 10-12 minutes, or until it is golden brown. Remove from the oven and let it cool.
4. In a large skillet, cook the bacon over medium heat until crispy. Remove the bacon from the skillet and drain on paper towels.
5. In the same skillet, cook the zucchini, mushrooms, onion, and garlic until the vegetables are tender. Season with Italian seasoning, dill weed, and parsley.
6. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked vegetables, mozzarella cheese, and beaten eggs. Season with garlic salt, black pepper, and Parmesan cheese, or to taste.
7. Pour the cheese mixture into the cooled pie crust.
8. Bake the pie for 30-35 minutes, or until the filling is set and the crust is golden brown.
9. Let the pie cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

This cooking guide provides a step-by-step process for preparing a delicious deep-dish zucchini and mushroom pie. The essential ingredients include a prepared deep-dish pie crust, bacon, zucchini, mushrooms, onion, garlic, Italian seasoning, dill weed, parsley, mozzarella cheese, eggs, and Parmesan cheese. By following the instructions, you will create a satisfying and flavorful pie that can be enjoyed by everyone.

2a17a3e2d2.gt:
In a large bowl, combine tomatoes, cucumber, green onion, yellow pepper, parsley, and basil.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, ground black pepper, and garlic.
Pour lemon juice mixture over the tomato mixture, and toss to coat.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Place bread cubes in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Bake for 12 minutes, or until toasted and dry.
Toss bread cubes with tomato mixture, and serve.

9168e15a37.gt:
Heat 3 tablespoons of the olive oil in a heavy soup pot or Dutch oven over medium heat, and add the onions.
Cook, stirring, until very tender, about eight minutes.
Add a pinch of salt and the garlic, and stir for another minute or so until fragrant.
Stir in the tomatoes, with their liquid, and bring to a simmer.
Simmer about eight minutes until cooked down and fragrant, and add the cauliflower to the pot.
Stir together, and add the bay leaf, rosemary, pepper, dissolved tomato paste and wine.
Bring to a simmer, and add salt to taste.
Cover, reduce the heat and simmer 30 to 40 minutes until the cauliflower is very tender.
Stir in the olives and vinegar if using, and adjust salt and pepper.
Remove from the heat, and stir in the remaining olive oil.
Serve hot or warm.

fe6115c71a.gt:
Cut the avocado and tuna into bite-sized chunks.
Combine the listed ingredients from the nameko mushrooms to the wasabi.
Pour the mixture on top of the avocado and tuna.

24c12168e6.gt:
Insert wooden craft sticks or lollipop sticks into the cores of the apples at the stem.
Place the roasted peanuts and candies on separate plates.
Set aside.
Place the chocolate into a metal or glass bowl and set over a pan of barely simmering water.

97bb525c81.gt:
Heat 6 tablespoons olive oil in heavy large skillet over medium heat.
Add onions and saute until deep golden brown, about 20 minutes; sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Transfer onions to large bowl; mix in prunes, dates, apricots, sugar, and cinnamon.
Do ahead Can be made 1 day ahead.
Cover and chill.
Preheat oven to 350F Spread fruit mixture over bottom of large roasting pan.
Tuck chicken wing tips under.
Rub each chicken with 1/2 tablespoon remaining olive oil and 1/2 teaspoon turmeric.
Sprinkle each with salt and pepper; place chickens, side by side, atop fruit mixture.
Pour 11/2 cups water around chickens.
Roast chickens 1 hour.
Turn pan around; add more water to fruit mixture by 1/4 cupfuls if beginning to dry.
Continue to roast chickens until brown and juices run clear when thigh is pierced, about 45 minutes.
Transfer chickens to carving board; let stand 10 minutes.
Spoon fruit onto platter; top with chickens and any accumulated juices.
Sprinkle with almonds and serve.

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the 7 tablespoons of olive oil, 1 teaspoon of ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon of turmeric, and 3 tablespoons of sugar.
3. Add the thinly sliced onions, pitted prune halves, and halved dates to the bowl.
4. Pour the 12 cups of water into the bowl, and mix everything together.
5. Add the roasting chickens to the bowl, making sure they are fully submerged in the mixture.
6. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap or a lid, and let the chickens marinate in the mixture for at least 2 hours or up to 8 hours.
7. After the chickens have marinated, remove them from the bowl, and pat them dry with paper towels.
8. Place the chickens on a baking sheet, and bake them in the preheated oven for about 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
9. Remove the chickens from the oven, and let them rest for a few minutes before slicing them into pieces.
10. Serve the chicken with the marinade, and enjoy your delicious and flavorful dish.

a5230cef43.gt:
With and Electric mixer, beat butter & Icing sugar until it stands up like egg whites.
In a seperate medium bowl, combine flour and corn starch.
Add slowly to butter and icing sugar mixture.
(I find when your mixer starts to power out, then use a wooden spoon to take over, but please try to use the mixer as long as possible).
Drop from teaspoon onto cookie sheet about 2 inches apart.
Top cookies with jub-jubs, bar cherries, or anything really.
My oldest son loves smarties on his.
Imagination is up to you.
Bake at 300 for approx 30 minutes until bottom edges turn a light brown.
(Because all ovens vary please start checking them at about 20-25 minutes).

2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and icing sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the cornstarch and mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the flour, mixing until a smooth dough forms.
5. If the dough is too soft, you can add a bit more flour; if it is too dry, you can add a bit more cornstarch.
6. Wrap the dough in plastic and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
7. On a floured surface, roll out the dough to your desired thickness.
8. Use a cookie cutter or a round cookie cutter to cut out your desired shapes.
9. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
10. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
11. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious, homemade cookies!

1a8f7f2d8d.gt:
In a medium-large bowl, combine the rhubarb, strawberries, sugar and cornstarch.
Mix well.
The mixture should be thick and syrupy after being stirred well.
Roll out pie crust according to recipe or package instructions and place in a 9- or 9.5-inch pie plate.
Pour the strawberry/rhubarb mixture into the crust, using a large spoon to fill evenly.
For the topping: In a small bowl, combine the flour and brown sugar.
Cut the butter into pieces and using a pastry cutter or two knives, cut the butter into the flour/sugar mixture until it has the consistency of coarse crumbs.
Sprinkle the streusel topping evenly over the top of the pie.
Place the pie on a rimmed baking sheet and bake at 400 degrees for 50-55 minutes, covering the pie crust edges with foil halfway through in order to prevent over-browning.
Let the pie cool completely before cutting into pieces.
Serve with a dollop of freshly whipped cream, if desired.

d4da80f96c.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Combine 3/4 cup sugar, flour, cocoa, baking powder, cinnamon, cloves and salt.
Stir in milk, melted butter and vanilla, beating until smooth.
Pour batter into an ungreased 9-inch squre baking pan.
Stir together remaining 1/2 cup sugar, brown sugar, remaining 1/4 cup cocoa and cinnamon.
Sprinkle this evenly over batter in baking dish.
Combine hot water and rum; pour this over top of sugar-cocoa mixture in dish; do not stir.
Bake 35 to 40 minutes at 350 degrees F until center is almost set.
Remove from oven and let stand 15 minutes.
Serve, spooning sauce from bottom of pan over top.

f87ab5a162.gt:
In a large pot, heat the oil.
Add the onion and cook over moderate heat, stirring, until golden brown, 7 minutes.
Add the bacon and cook, stirring, until the fat has rendered, 10 minutes.
Add the collards and cook over moderately high heat, stirring, until it begins to wilt, 4 minutes.
Add the vinegar and boil for 1 minute.
Add the sorghum syrup, stock, water, crushed red pepper and a large pinch of salt.
Cover and cook, stirring a few times, until the collards are very tender, 1 1/2 hours.
Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, simmer the cream over moderate heat until reduced by one-third, 10 minutes.
Add the kimchi and remove from the heat.
When the collards are done, stir in the kimchi cream.
Season with salt and serve.

bf5b8fd371.gt:
In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add in the tomatoes, capers, anchovies, olives and garlic.
Cook until fragrant and tomatoes soften.
This will take about 5 minutes.
Add in the tomato puree and season with salt and pepper.
Cook for a couple more minutes.
In the meantime in a large pot cook the spaghetti in salted water.
Cook until pasta is al dente (according to package instructions for al dente).
Reserve a cup or so of pasta water.
Drain the pasta and add it right the the sauce.
Add some of the reserved pasta water to thin out the sauce as needed.
Season to taste with salt and pepper and serve right away.
You can sprinkle some grated Parmesan cheese on top to serve.

399c8a1881.gt:
Preheat oven to 200 deg Celsius.
Less for fan-forced.
Line 2 trays with non-stick paper.
In a small bowl cream together butter, sugar and vanilla.
Add egg yolk & beat well.
Sift together flour, soda, salt and nutmeg.
Fold half the sour cream and half the dry ingredients into the butter mixture.
Fold in remaining halves.
Mix well to combine.
With floured hands roll teaspoonfuls of mixture into small balls and place on prepared trays.
Press lightly on top with a fork.
Bake in oven for 8 to 10 minutes or until pale golden in colour.

Place cup in saucepan of hot water, beat with fork until glossy.
Pour into a saucer to make icing the biscuits easier.

2b3918d7ce.gt:
Core the peppers using the blunt edge of a potato peeler, save half the seeds removed, toss the core.
In a bowl add cream cheese, chili powder, hot sauce (you pick the heat) and liquid smoke and half the jalapeno seeds.
Mix/Mash together until blended.
Stuff the cored peppers with cream cheese mix then wrap with raw bacon.
Use your fingers!
Kabob them, repeat untill all the peppers are stuffed and wrapped.
Grill on an indirect heat, (on tin foil) for about 15 minutes.
Then on an open flame for 5-8 mins to crisp the bacon, turning a few times.
Serve and enjoy!

The essential ingredients include fresh jalapeno pepper, cream cheese, chili powder, hot sauce, bacon, and liquid smoke. These ingredients work together to create a flavorful and satisfying dish that can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

f62b39d078.gt:

Lightly spray bottom of 8- or 9-inch square pan with cooking spray.

3ba549830f.gt:
Mix sauce, peppers and walnuts in saucepan; cook on medium heat until heated through, stirring occasionally.
Pour over hot ravioli in large serving bowl; toss to coat.
Garnish with chopped fresh parsley, if desired.

af2aa1a2fd.gt:

c4c9825372.gt:

Oil up the pan.
Chop up some lemons and onions put them in the pan.
You can add foil paper to the pan if you dont want it to stick.
If your shrimp doesnt come deveind do that and add that to the pan.
Now get some salt and pepper add a bit over the shrimp.

Stick the shrimp in the oven let cook.
I let cook for 20 mins took it out mixed it added more cayenne pepper squeezed some lemon juice over it then put it back in the oven for about 10 mins.
You can make some pasta and garlic bread as a good side.
While its cooking.
Now take the shrimp out :D

d44553522d.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Cook bacon in large skillet until crispy, about 5 min.
; drain.

or until ground beef is browned, stirring constantly.

e03a1d1119.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Saute squash in butter until tender, about 10 minutes.
Set aside.
In a large skillet, cook the ground beef, onion, and jalapeno, stirring until beef is evenly browned.

d7f3a33c04.gt:
Heat olive oil in a cast iron pot.
Add onion and saute for 34 minutes until tender.
Add garlic and saute for an additional minute.
Take the onion and garlic out of the pot and set aside.
Add sausage to pan and brown.
(You do not have to add more oil.
The sausage tends to render a lot of grease when it is cooked.)
Drain excess grease and add the onion and garlic back to the pot.
Add broth, tomatoes and bay leaf.
Bring to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes.
Add gnocchi and cook until it floats to the top, 23 minutes.
Stir in spinach and kale and cook for an additional 12 minutes, until the greens are wilted.
Season soup to taste with salt, pepper, crushed red pepper flakes and Italian seasoning.
Serve immediately.
d7f3a33c04.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute, until fragrant.
3. Add the chopped onion and sauté until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
4. Add the hot Italian sausage to the pan, breaking it up with a spoon as it cooks. Cook until the sausage is browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Add the diced tomatoes, bay leaf, and low sodium chicken broth to the pan. Bring to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let the mixture cook for 10-15 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
6. While the sauce cooks, cook the gnocchi according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
7. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked gnocchi, spinach, kale, salt, pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, and Italian seasoning.
8. Pour the sauce over the gnocchi mixture and toss to combine.
9. Transfer the gnocchi mixture to a baking dish and top with the cooked sausage mixture.
10. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the gnocchi is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and hot.
11. Serve the dish hot and enjoy!

5410800131.gt:
Fit a large steamer rack inside a large wide pot.
Add enough water to reach within 1/2 inch of bottom of rack.
Bring to a boil.
Pat chicken dry and put, skin side up, in a shallow bowl (that will fit on steamer rack inside pot).
Sprinkle with ginger and steam, covered, over high heat, until chicken is just cooked through, 30 to 35 minutes (replenish water if necessary).
Carefully remove bowl with chicken.
Pour off juices into a glass measure and set aside 1/4 cup (reserve remainder for another use).
Return chicken in bowl to pot and keep warm, covered, off heat.
Heat a wok or large heavy skillet (not nonstick) over high heat until smoking, then drizzle oil down side of wok and swirl to coat.
Reduce heat to medium, then add garlic and stir-fry 15 seconds.
Add chiles and stir-fry 15 seconds.
Add cilantro and stir-fry 1 minute.
Stir in remaining ingredients, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 cup chicken juices and simmer 1 minute.
Transfer to a bowl.
Drizzle some sauce over chicken (include some solids for a spicier sauce); serve the rest on the side.
Season chicken with salt.
5410800131.pred:
To create a delicious and flavorful dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the chicken, thin matchsticks of ginger, and peanut or vegetable oil. Season the chicken with salt and pepper, to taste.
3. In a separate bowl, combine the minced garlic, hot Thai chiles, and cilantro.
4. Add the water, soy sauce, and rice vinegar to the bowl with the chicken and ginger mixture. Stir to combine.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
6. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken mixture, and cook until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Remove the chicken from the skillet or wok and set aside.
8. In the same skillet or wok, add the cooked chicken back in and stir to combine.
9. Serve the dish over rice or noodles, garnished with additional cilantro, if desired.

This dish combines the flavors of the chicken, ginger, garlic, and Thai chiles to create a delicious and satisfying meal. The combination of ingredients and the cooking process results in a well-balanced and flavorful dish that is perfect for sharing with friends and family.

0d43f262d2.gt:
Heat oil in a large pot.
Saute the onion until it starts to brown a little.
Add the chicken and cook each piece so it's browned on both sides.
Add potatoes and carrots.
Cook for a few minutes while stirring.
Add the tomatoes and cook for another few minutes while stirring.
Cover the pot and continue to cook on medium for 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add in the garlic and all the spices.
Mix well with other ingredients.
Add the zucchini, tomato paste, and a little salt and mix in.
Pour in enough water to just cover everything.
Bring to a boil, turn to low and let simmer for 45-50 minutes until every thing is well cooked and the stew has thickened.
Just before serving, stir in the chopped coriander.
Enjoy with basmati rice or bread :)
0d43f262d2.pred:

2. In a large bowl, mix the chicken thighs and/or drumsticks, onion, carrot, potato, and zucchini.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the tomato paste, coriander leaves, cooking oil, ground coriander, cumin, turmeric powder, cardamom, cinnamon, and salt.
4. Pour the spice mixture over the chicken and vegetables, and toss everything together to coat evenly.
5. Transfer the mixture to a large, oven-safe dish or baking tray.
6. Roast the dish in the preheated oven for about 1 hour, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
7. Remove the dish from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

This flavorful dish is perfect for a hearty meal or a delicious side dish. The combination of chicken, vegetables, and spices creates a rich and satisfying taste that is sure to be enjoyed by everyone.

d7fcbdcf2c.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Cream Crisco with both types of sugar.
To this mixture, add eggs (unbeaten), water, vanilla, flour, salt and soda.
Combine.
In another bowl, mix together oatmeal, nuts and chocolate chips.
Add to original mixture.
This dough will be very full, I prefer to mix it at this point with my hands.
Put teaspoonfuls of dough on a cookie sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.
My children called their great grandmother (my grandmother) GeeGee.
She died last summer from cancer, so these cookies are very sentimental to us.
They are, the best chocolate chip cookies ever.
Hands down.
Thanks GeeGee!
We love you and miss you!
d7fcbdcf2c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Crisco, brown and white sugars, eggs, water, vanilla, and salt. Mix until well combined.
3. Gradually add the flour and baking soda, mixing until a smooth batter forms.
4. Stir in the oatmeal, nuts, and chocolate chips.
5. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

[/INST]

This cooking tutorial provides a step-by-step guide to making a delicious and satisfying chocolate oatmeal cake. The essential ingredients include 1 cup Crisco, 1/2 cups Brown Sugar, 1/2 cups White Sugar, 2 whole Eggs, 1 teaspoon Water, 1 teaspoon Vanilla, 1-1/2 cup Flour, 1 teaspoon Salt, 1 teaspoon Baking Soda, 2 cups Oatmeal (not Instant), 1 cup Chopped Nuts (pecans, walnuts, or your preferred choice), and 1 bag of Chocolate Chips. The recipe involves preheating the oven, combining the ingredients, pouring the batter into a greased baking dish, baking the cake, and allowing it to cool before cutting and serving. This cake is perfect for a cozy dessert or a special treat for your family and friends.

The combination of these ingredients creates a delightful and satisfying dish that can be enjoyed on its own or as a topping for various dishes.

Transfer the strawberry mixture to a food processor.
Add the remaining strawberries and puree until smooth.
Strain the puree through a fine sieve set over a large bowl.
Add the Champagne and lemon juice and mix well.
Pour the mixture into a 9-by-13-inch glass or stainless steel baking dish.
Freeze the granita for 2 hours.
Scrape the frozen edges into the center.
Freeze for another 3 hours, scraping hourly, until the granita is icy and flaky.
Freeze for 8 hours or overnight.
Scrape the granita into bowls and serve.

3. After 30 minutes, carefully pour the chilled rose Champagne over the strawberries and sugar mixture. Stir gently to combine.

4. Add the fresh lemon juice to the mixture, and stir to combine.

52ceec4747.gt:
Combine all ingredients except tomatoes, in mixing bowl and whisk till combined.
Place tomatoes in zip top bag.
Pour mixture over tomatoes.

Lay lettuce on serving platter.

419586e535.gt:

03e7833d34.gt:
Heat oven to 350 degrees F.
Heat oil in medium skillet on medium heat.
Add ham, peppers and onions; cook 5 to 7 min.
or until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Remove from heat.
Stir in salsa.

f44011121d.gt:
In a large enameled cast-iron casserole, heat the oil until shimmering.
Add the onion, garlic, ginger and chiles and cook over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the curry powder and turmeric and cook for 2 minutes.

Add the chicken to the casserole, season with salt and pepper and cook just until white throughout, about 5 minutes.
Serve over rice, with lemon wedges.
f44011121d.pred:
1. Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and ginger, and cook for another 2 minutes.
2. Add the hot chiles and curry powder, stirring to combine. Cook for 1 minute, then add the chicken broth, coconut milk, and turmeric. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
3. Add the potatoes, cauliflower, squash, and chicken to the saucepan. Cook for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the chicken is cooked through.
4. Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Serve the dish over rice, and garnish with lemon wedges for a refreshing touch.

e6bbcbeb0b.gt:
Preheat oven to 425 degrees.
Pat potatoes dry with paper towels.
Toss potatoes and mushrooms with 21/2 tbs oil, 2 tbs cheese, 2 tsp garlic and 2 tsp rosemary, 1/2 tsp salt and 1/4 tsp pepper.
Arrange in 13x9 baking dish in one layer.
Top with remaining 2tbs cheese and bake 15 minute or until potatoes are just lightly browned.
Meanwhile, heat remaining 11/2 tbs oil in large nonstick skillet over med.
heat.
Add chicken pieces.
Season lightly with S&P, sprinkle with remaining rosemary and garlic.
Cook 5-6 minutes on each side or until browned.
(don't crowd pan, may need to do more than one batch).
Arrange chicken pieces on top of potatoes.
Drizzle with any oil from skillet and return to oven.
Bake 20-25 minute longer or until chicken is done.

ae1b5ff73e.gt:
FOR SALSA: Place all the ingrediens in medium bowl and stir gently to combine.
Cover and set aside.
FOR SWEETCORN CAKES: Combine 2 cups of the corn, onion, eggs, cilantro, flour, baking powder, salt and pepper in a food processor.
Process until well mixed.
Add the remaining 1/2 cup corn into the mixture and mix well.
Heat a large skillet at medium heat and brush with oil.
Spoon 2 heaping tablespoons of the mixture for each corn cake onto griddle.
Cook each side for 1 to 2 minutes.
Cook in batches.
Keep the cooked corn cakes warm in a 200F preheated oven.
Serve with salsa.
Makes 15 cakes.

1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the eggs, lime juice, green onions, hot sauce, sea salt, and fresh ground pepper.
3. Add the coarsely chopped cilantro leaf, loosely packed, and mix well.
4. Add the thawed, drained, and frozen corn kernels to the bowl and mix until well combined.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, baking powder, sea salt, and fresh ground pepper.
6. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until a smooth batter forms.
7. Pour the batter into a greased 9-inch (23 cm) round cake pan.
8. Bake the cake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before removing it from the pan and allowing it to cool completely.
10. Cut the cake into wedges and serve.

56bc2da383.gt:
Finely slice the leek, and mix with the ingredients.
Heat the sesame oil in a frying pan, and stir-fry the leek over high heat until it's wilted.
Add the combined flavoring ingredients and stir fry over low heat, being careful not to let it burn.
Add the bonito flakes, grated garlic and mix together.
Turn off the heat and add the ra-yu chili oil, and it's done!
(You may want to grind up the bonito flakes into a powder with your fingers while it's still in the packet.)
It goes so well with piping hot freshly cooked rice.
I can't stop eating!
It goes well with simmered daikon radish or pan-fried and steam-cooked daikon radish "steak" too.
It also goes well with pan fried tofu, boiled tofu, cold tofu, atsuage, dengaku (konnyaku with miso), and so many things.
It's also great as a dip for raw vegetables, and matches well with warm cooked vegetables too.
Please try this out in whatever combinations you can come up with.
Roll into tiny balls and freeze, to use as a filling for rice balls right away!
A Cookpad user called Yoshi-chan gave me this great idea!
If you don't have the green parts of the leeks, it's also delicious made with the white parts.
You may want to chop up and freeze the green parts and make this miso when you have enough.
56bc2da383.pred:
1. Heat a wok or large frying pan over medium heat.
2. Add the sesame oil and garlic, stir-fry for a few seconds until fragrant.
3. Add the green parts of the Japanese leeks and stir-fry for a few minutes until they are softened.
4. Add the sugar, mirin, sake, and soy sauce, stirring to combine.
5. Add the miso, stirring to combine.
6. If using ra-yu, add it to the pan and stir-fry for a few seconds until fragrant.
7. Add the grated garlic to taste, stirring to combine.
8. Cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened slightly.
9. Serve the dish immediately, garnished with a sprinkle of bonito flakes if desired.

[/INST]

534e9101f4.gt:
Preheat oven to 375F.
Cream together first five ingredients (will be soupy looking).
In separate bowl mix with whisk next 3 ingredients then add to wet batter (this will be rather thick).
Fold in blueberries carefully.
Spread into greased 9x13-inch pan.
Mix topping ingredients in a bowl and crumble with pastry blender or 2 knives until mealy.
Top batter with topping and bake for 35-40 minutes.
534e9101f4.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 12 cup soft butter, 1 egg, 12 cup milk, 12 teaspoon vanilla, 34 cup sugar, 2 cups flour, 12 teaspoon salt, and 2 teaspoons baking powder.
3. Mix the ingredients until well combined.
4. Add the blueberries to the mixture and stir gently to combine.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x9 inch baking dish.
6. Bake the cake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.
