The addition of light cream and cilantro adds a touch of freshness and aroma to the dish, making it a delightful meal for any occasion.

7e82f5698a.gt:
Mix together the ground lamb, basmati rice, 2 tablespoons tomato puree, 1/2 teaspoon mint, salt, and pepper; mix well, and set aside.
Slice the ends off of the zucchinis and hollow out the centers using an apple corer.
Stuff with lamb mixture.
Stir together the remaining tomato puree with 1/2 teaspoon salt in a large skillet.
Place the stuffed zucchini into the sauce, and add enough water to cover the zucchini.
Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat, then reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes.
Stir in the garlic, lemon juice, and remaining 1/2 teaspoon of mint.
Recover, and simmer an additional 15 minutes.
To serve, cut the zucchini crosswise into rounds and arrange on a serving plate.
Spoon sauce over the top.
7e82f5698a.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the ground lamb, rice, tomato puree, dried mint, salt, and pepper. Mix well to combine all the ingredients.
3. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet or a large roasting pan.
4. Roast the mixture in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until the lamb is cooked through and the rice is tender.
5. While the lamb and rice are cooking, prepare the vegetables. Cut the small zucchini or yellow squash into bite-sized pieces and toss them in a bowl with a small amount of salt.
6. Once the lamb and rice are cooked, remove the baking sheet or roasting pan from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Add the cooked vegetables to the lamb and rice mixture, stirring gently to combine.
8. Serve the cooked dish immediately, or let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

This step-by-step guide will help you cook up a delicious and satisfying meal using the provided ingredients. The dish combines the flavors of ground lamb, rice, tomato puree, and various herbs and spices, resulting in a well-balanced and satisfying meal. The addition of vegetables, such as zucchini or yellow squash, adds a touch of freshness and nutritional value to the dish.

817c37fbf2.gt:
1.
Line a 9-inch round cake pan with parchment paper and preheat the oven to 350 F/177 C. 2.
Combine water and 1/2 cup of the sugar and bring to a boil in a saucepan over medium heat.
When it hits a boil remove from the heat, add chocolate and stir until the chocolate is completely melted.
Stir in the butter until melted.
Let the mixture cool for about 10 minutes.
3.
Meanwhile, in a large mixing bowl using a whisk attachment, whip the eggs, the remaining sugar, and vanilla extract until is has reached maximum volume.
This process should take about 10 minutes.
4.
Gently fold the chocolate into the egg mixture.
5.
Pour into prepared cake pan and bake for 30 minutes, or until a knife inserted comes out clean.
Remove pan from oven and set on a rack.
6.
Cool then wrap in plastic wrap (with the cake still in the pan) and refrigerate overnight so its easier to work with for decorating.
817c37fbf2.pred:
To cook a delicious chocolate dessert, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 1/2 cup of water, 3/4 cups of sugar, and 5 ounces of semi-sweet chocolate.
2. Melt the chocolate and sugar mixture in a double boiler or a heat-resistant bowl set over a pot of simmering water.
3. Once the chocolate is melted and smooth, remove the bowl from the heat and stir in the 7 ounces of bittersweet chocolate.
4. Add the 3/4 cups of butter, one at a time, stirring after each addition.
5. Add the eggs one at a time, stirring well after each addition.
6. Stir in the vanilla extract.
7. Pour the mixture into a greased and floured 9-inch round cake pan.
8. Bake the cake in a preheated oven at 350°F (175°C) for approximately 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

This delicious chocolate dessert is ready to be enjoyed!

5894d0c850.gt:
In a large bowl, combine 2 cups of flour, sugar, undissolved yeast and salt.
Heat milk, water and 5 tablespoons butter until very warm (120F-130F).
Stir into dry ingredients.
Mix in eggs and enough remaining flour to make soft dough.
Knead on floured surface until smooth, about 6 minutes.
Cover let rest 10 minutes.
Divide dough into 32 pieces; roll into balls.
Melt remaining butter.
Dip balls in butter.
Layer evenly on bottom of greased 10 inch tube pan with non-removable bottom; 1/3 cup maple syrup, 1/2 cup nuts,16 balls, 1/3 cup maple syrup, 1/2 nuts, 16 balls and 1/3 cup maple syrup.
Cover and let rise in warm place until it has doubled in size, about 30-40 minutes.
Bake in 375F preheated oven for 35 minutes or until done.
Cover with foil during the last 10 minutes of baking.
Invert on serving plate.
5894d0c850.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 4 cups of all-purpose flour, 13 cup sugar, 2 packages of fast rising yeast (or 8g), and 1 teaspoon of salt.
2. Add the 12 cups of milk, 12 cups of water, and 12 cups of melted butter to the bowl, and mix until the dough comes together.
3. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it is smooth and elastic, about 5-10 minutes.
4. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a clean, damp cloth, and let it rise in a warm, draft-free place until it has doubled in size, about 1-2 hours.
5. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
6. Punch down the dough, and then transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
7. Roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.25 cm).
8. Spread the dough with the 1 cup of pure maple syrup, and then top it with the chopped walnuts.
9. Roll the dough up from the long side, and then cut it into slices.
10. Place the slices on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
11. Bake the slices in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
12. Remove the slices from the oven, and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

66d695cd65.gt:
For the butter: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Slice the head of garlic in half crosswise and place it on a sheet of aluminum foil.
Drizzle with the olive oil and wrap the foil around the garlic tightly to seal.
Roast for about 1 hour, until the garlic is soft and caramelized.
Remove from the oven and let it cool slightly.
Squeeze the garlic cloves into the bowl of a food processor with the butter and salt and blend until smooth.
For the steaks: Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Stir together the pepper and salt in a shallow dish and press both sides of each steak into the mixture to coat.
Add the steaks to the pan and cook for 4 to 5 minutes per side, or until cooked to your liking.
Transfer to a cutting board and let steaks rest for 10 minutes.
Slice the steaks into thin slices and spoon the garlic butter over the top.
66d695cd65.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until it is fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the crushed black peppercorns and cook for another minute.
4. Remove the skillet from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
5. In a small bowl, mix the kosher salt, vegetable oil, and black peppercorns.
6. Place the rib-eye steaks on a baking tray and season them with the spice mixture.
7. Place the tray in the preheated oven and cook for 12-15 minutes or until the steaks are cooked to your desired level of doneness.
8. Remove the steaks from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

This step-by-step procedure outlines the process of cooking delicious rib-eye steaks with a flavorful garlic and black peppercorn seasoning. The cooking method involves preheating the oven, heating the olive oil in a skillet, adding garlic and black peppercorns, seasoning the rib-eye steaks, and finally, cooking the steaks in the oven. The result is a mouthwatering and flavorful dish that can be enjoyed with your favorite side dishes.

1dcfb48390.gt:
Prep: Smash the tofu until it turns into a paste.
Add the tempura batter crumbs and let them soften.
Finely shred the cabbage.
Mix the ingredients together.
Mix the ingredients and cabbage with the tofu and mix very very well.
That's the batter.
Pan fry: Heat oil in a frying pan, cook the pork and pour in the batter.
When the pork is cooked, turn the pancake over to brown the other sides.
When done, transfer to a serving plate, top with the okonomiyaki sauce, mayonnaise, ketchup etc.
to your liking and it's done.
Add some aonori seaweed powder and bonito flakes to taste, and enjoy.
1dcfb48390.pred:
1. Preheat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat.
2. In a small bowl, mix the tempura batter crumbs with a few drops of water to form a smooth batter.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, katakuriko, and water to form a smooth batter.
4. Heat a small amount of oil in the pan or griddle.
5. Dip the thinly sliced pork into the batter mixture, ensuring it is evenly coated.
6. Carefully place the pork slices into the hot oil in the pan or griddle, cooking for about 2-3 minutes or until they are golden brown.
7. Remove the pork from the pan or griddle and set aside.
8. Add a small amount of oil to the pan or griddle and cook the cabbage until it is tender but still crisp.
9. In a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise, ketchup, and okonomiyaki sauce.
10. Add the cooked cabbage to the pan or griddle and pour the sauce mixture over it.
11. Cook the cabbage and sauce mixture for about 2-3 minutes or until the sauce is heated through and the cabbage is coated with the sauce.
12. Add the cooked pork slices to the pan or griddle and stir gently to combine.
13. Cook the pork and cabbage mixture for another 2-3 minutes or until the pork is cooked through and the sauce is heated through.
14. Serve the dish immediately, garnished with aonori and a drizzle of mayonnaise.

[/INST]

60d7ee5f76.gt:
Cover beans with cold water, cover pot and bring to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 3 hours, adding water as needed.
In a skillet, slowly brown ground beef.
When crumbly, add onion and saute until limp.
Add to beans along with rest of ingredients except the salt and pepper.
Cover and simmer for three hours or until beans are tender and liquid is somewhat thickened.
Add salt and pepper and serve.
60d7ee5f76.pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, combine the pinto beans, red chili sauce, vinegar, ground chuck, chili powder, and onions. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the beans are tender and the ground beef is cooked through.
2. Add the tomatoes stewed and the red hot pepper sauce. Stir to combine.
3. Simmer the mixture for about 15-20 minutes, or until the flavors have melded together and the liquid has thickened slightly.
4. Serve the chili over a bed of rice or with your favorite side dish. Enjoy!

176a112293.gt:
Dissolve coffee in water; set aside.
In a mixing bowl, combine milk, pudding mix and cinnamon.
Beat on low speed for 2 minutes; stir in coffee.
Fold in whipped topping and spoon into serving dishes.
Garnish with whipped topping if desired.
176a112293.pred:
[/INST]

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the instant coffee granules, boiling water, and sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix. Whisk until smooth and well-blended.
2. Add the ground cinnamon and whipped topping to the mixture, and continue to whisk until well-incorporated.
3. Pour the mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish, and smooth out the top with a spatula.

e29121a9a8.gt:
In a food processor, puree the avocados with the chickpeas, lemon juice and tahini.
Add the 1/2 cup of oil and puree until smooth; season with salt and pepper.
Transfer the dip to a bowl, drizzle with olive oil and serve with crudites, bread and chips.
e29121a9a8.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the chopped avocado, chickpeas, lemon juice, tahini, and olive oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and spread it evenly.
4. Roast the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the avocado is tender and the chickpeas are golden brown.

This delicious Food dish combines the creamy texture of avocado with the crunchy texture of chickpeas and the tangy flavor of lemon juice. The tahini adds a rich, nutty taste, while the olive oil provides a healthy, heart-friendly fat source. 9c8b451253.gt:
Combine the potatoes, tomato, carrot, onion, and bay leaves in a slow cooker.
Place the chicken breasts atop the vegetables.
Stir the tomato sauce, chicken broth, and Italian seasoning in a bowl; pour over the chicken breasts.
Add water as needed to assure the chicken is completely covered.
Cook on Low for 6 hours.
Remove the chicken breasts and cut into bite sized chunks and return to slow cooker.
Continue cooking until the vegetables are tender, another 1 to 2 hours.
9c8b451253.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large, oven-safe skillet or pot, heat oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the chopped carrot and cook for another 5 minutes, until the carrot is tender.
4. Add the sliced chicken breast halves to the skillet or pot, and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through, about 10 minutes.

7. Transfer the skillet or pot to the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly thickened.
8. Remove the skillet or pot from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

c1e7a519f3.gt:
Place graham squares, side by side, in single layer in ungreased 15x10x1-inch baking pan.
Microwave caramels and water in microwavable bowl on HIGH 2 to 3 minutes or until caramels are completely melted, stirring after each minute.
Pour over grahams; spread to evenly cover graham squares.
Sprinkle immediately with marshmallows, chocolate and peanuts; press gently into caramel mixture with back of spoon to secure.
Cool completely.
Cut into 24 squares to serve.
c1e7a519f3.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 12 graham crackers, broken crosswise in half, and mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, melt the 3 Tbsp. of water over low heat.
4. Add the melted water to the graham cracker mixture and mix well.
5. In a microwave-safe bowl, melt the 3 oz. of BAKER'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate, chopped, for about 1 minute.
6. Add the melted chocolate to the graham cracker mixture and mix well.
7. In a separate bowl, mix the 2 cups of JET-PUFFED Miniature Marshmallows.
8. Add the marshmallows to the graham cracker mixture and mix well.
9. In a small mixing bowl, mix the 1/2 cup of PLANTERS COCKTAIL Peanuts.
10. Add the peanut mixture to the graham cracker mixture and mix well.
11. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
12. Bake the mixture in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are slightly crispy.
13. Remove the mixture from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
14. Using a spatula, carefully transfer the mixture to a serving dish.
15. Enjoy your delicious homemade s'mores treat!

6ee25d7bfc.gt:
Prepare bread pans,.
I just use Pam cooking spray.
In large mixing bowl: Beat eggs until frothy, add sugar, oil, molasses, vanilla, and zucchini, mix well.
Combine flour slowly, add soda,baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
Also add nuts if desired.
Pour into bread pans, bake at 325F for 40 to 45 minutes or until you can stick a toothpick in and it comes out clean.
This recipe makes 3 large or 6 small bread pans.
This may vary.
6ee25d7bfc.pred:
To prepare a delicious and nutritious Food, follow these steps:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients: In this case, we need 3 eggs, 2 cups brown sugar (or 1/2 cup white sugar and 1 1/2 cups brown sugar), 2 cups chopped zucchini, 1 cup corn oil, 3 teaspoons vanilla, 2 tablespoons molasses, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 12 teaspoons baking powder, 3 tablespoons cinnamon, 14 teaspoons nutmeg, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 cup walnuts (optional) and 1 cup raisins (optional).

4. Add the chopped zucchini, corn oil, and molasses to the bowl and mix well.
5. Gradually add the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, and walnuts (optional) to the bowl, mixing until the ingredients are well combined.
6. If desired, add raisins (optional) to the mixture.
7. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x9 inch baking dish.
8. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before removing it from the baking dish and transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

By following these steps, you will have successfully prepared a delicious and nutritious Food that can be enjoyed by everyone.

78e1fe788f.gt:
Stir together all sauce ingredients in a small bowl.
Heat oil in a 12-inch heavy skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then stir-fry garlic and ginger until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add shrimp and stir-fry until almost cooked through, about 3 minutes.
Add half of romaine and stir-fry until it begins to wilt, then add remaining romaine and stir-fry until just wilted and shrimp are just cooked through, about 1 minute.
Stir sauce, then add to stir-fry and simmer, stirring, 2 minutes.
78e1fe788f.pred:
1. In a small saucepan, heat the reduced-sodium chicken broth over medium heat until it comes to a simmer.
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, rice vinegar, sugar, and cornstarch until smooth.
3. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
4. Add the garlic and ginger and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
5. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until they turn pink and are cooked through, about 2 to 3 minutes.
6. Add the broth mixture to the skillet, stirring to combine.
7. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 3 to 4 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
8. Add the romaine hearts to the skillet and cook until they are heated through, about 1 minute.
9. Serve the stir-fried shrimp and romaine hearts over a bed of white rice.

This delightful dish combines the flavors of soy sauce, rice vinegar, and cornstarch to create a rich and savory sauce. The shrimp are cooked to perfection, and the romaine hearts add a fresh and crisp element to the dish. The combination of ingredients results in a delicious and satisfying meal that can be enjoyed with friends and family.

1832d9054d.gt:
In a medium saucepan over medium heat, toast the barley in 1 tablespoon olive oil for 2 minutes until it is fragrant and nutty.
Add the chicken stock, bring to a boil, reduce heat to a simmer, cover and cook 45 minutes or until most of the liquid is absorbed.
In a large cast iron (or other oven safe) skillet over medium heat, saute the onion and corn kernels in the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil until onions are slightly softened.
Season with salt and pepper.
Shove the onion and corn to the side of the pan, and add the chorizo into the pan.
Cook the chorizo, breaking it apart as it cooks.
When it is almost browned and cooked through, mix it with the corn and onions then shove the entire mixture to the side.
Create as much open surface on the base of the skillet as possible.
Add the kale, pressing down and turning over until it is wilted.
Season with salt and pepper, then mix it in with the chorizo, corn and onion.
Remove from heat.
Preheat your broiler to high.
Add the cream and 1 cup of cheese into the corn mixture.
Add the cooked barley and mix well.
Spread the entire mixture into an even layer, and top with the panko and remaining cheese.
Place skillet 6 inches under the broiler for 3 minutes until the top is melted and brown.
1832d9054d.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pot, heat the 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add the diced onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the pearl barley, chicken stock, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for about 30-40 minutes, or until the barley is tender and the liquid is absorbed.
5. While the barley cooks, in a separate pan or skillet, cook the ground pork chorizo over medium heat until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks.
6. Add the sweet corn kernels to the skillet with the pork chorizo and cook until the corn is tender and slightly caramelized.
7. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked pork chorizo, cooked barley, torn kale, heavy cream, and shredded cheddar jack cheese. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Transfer the mixture to a greased baking dish or individual ramekins.
9. Sprinkle the panko bread crumbs over the top of the mixture.
10. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the bread crumbs are golden and the cheese is melted and bubbly.

[/INST]

This delicious and hearty meal can be enjoyed by anyone who loves a combination of flavors and textures. The pearl barley provides a nutritious base, while the chicken stock and pork chorizo add depth and richness. The sweet corn adds a touch of sweetness, and the kale provides a crunchy texture. The melted cheddar jack cheese adds a creamy, gooey element, and the panko bread crumbs add a crispy, crunchy topping. The final result is a satisfying and comforting meal that can be enjoyed with friends and family.

36b3caf34c.gt:
Preheat the oven to 325.
In a large enameled cast-iron casserole, heat the peanut oil.
Season the pork with salt and pepper.
Add the shanks to the casserole and cook over moderate heat, turning, until browned all over, about 20 minutes; transfer to a plate.
Add the onion to the casserole and cook over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until golden, about 4 minutes.
Stir in the water, miso, brown sugar, soy sauce, ginger, garlic, chiles and scallions.
Add the shanks and any juices and bring to a boil.
Cover and braise in the oven for 2 hours, until the pork is very tender.
Garnish with scallions and serve with rice.
36b3caf34c.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large, oven-safe pot or Dutch oven, heat the peanut oil over medium heat. Add the pork shanks and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the pork from the pot and set aside.
3. In the same pot, add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the water, miso, sugar, soy sauce, and ginger, and bring to a simmer. Add the pork shanks back to the pot, cover, and place in the preheated oven. Cook for about 2-2 1/2 hours, or until the pork is tender and falling off the bone.
4. Remove the pork from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before shredding it into bite-sized pieces.
5. While the pork is cooking, prepare the scallions by chopping them into thin rings.
6. In a small bowl, whisk together the rice, water, and salt. Place the bowl in a larger pot with an inch of water in the bottom, cover, and cook over low heat for about 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the water has been absorbed.
7. Serve the pork shank with the cooked rice, garnished with the thinly sliced scallions. Enjoy your delicious and comforting meal!

94d70d2bcc.gt:

13ce606661.gt:
May ajust these seasonings to your own taste !
Grind porkfat and mix with lean pork.
Combine well.
Combine all seasonings and mix with pork.
Mix in well with hands and make a small patty and fry until done, Taste your product and ajust seasonings if needed.

Store in freezer containers until needed.

Cook time is time in freezer.

a040895990.gt:

Rub the dish with one bulb of chopped garlic and leave the garlic in the dish.

ea87319f86.gt:
Roast the eggplant directly over a gas flame, turning occasionally, until charred all over and soft, about 12 minutes.

Cook over high heat, turning once, until lightly charred on both sides, about 2 minutes total.
Add the piquillos to the warm vinaigrette and let cool completely.
In a food processor, combine the eggplant with both cheeses and puree until smooth.
Scrape into a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Spread the whipped eggplant on toasts and, using a slotted spoon, spoon some of the marinated piquillos on top.
Garnish with chopped parsley and serve with anchovies.

Combine flour, baking powder, nutmeg, and salt in one bowl.
In another bow, beat egg yolks slightly.
Beat in milk, bananas, and oil.

Place flat bread or shell on 14 inch pizza pan (or lightly grease a 15x10x1-inch baking pan.

remove from oven).

Cut up the toppings for the pizza crust.
Slice the sausages diagonally.

Preheat the oven to 300C (or 250C if your oven doesn't get that hot).
Spread the dough with pizza sauce, and cover evenly with toppings of your choice.
Add the pizza cheese to finish.
Bake at 300C for 13 minutes.
Top with something like fresh basil leaves and cut into 8 portions.

You won't get bored with the toppings this way, and looks like fun too.

In a large mixing bowl combine rhubarb, strawberries, sugar, lemon juice, cornstarch and the pinch of salt, stirring together well.
Spoon mixture into an 8x8 in (20x20 cm) glass baking dish.
In a second bowl, combine brown sugar, oats, cinnamon, nutmeg and butter, and stir with a fork until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Sprinkle this mixture over the fruit mixture.

If using an outdoor grill, position the pan on a cool side of the grill (that means for a gas grill no heat directly underneath).
Maintain the heat to a medium-low temperature (around 300F).
Close lid of grill and cook 25-30 minutes.
Make sure to rotate the baking dish on the grill about every 8 minutes for even cooking.
Either way, the fruit should be tender and the juices bubbling when finished cooking.
I love serving with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or frozen yogurt.

This delicious compote can be used as a base for various desserts, or simply enjoyed as a refreshing treat on its own.

Start by heating olive oil in a skillet over high heat.

Then add the salt and pepper.
We used more pepper than salt, but thats entirely up to you.

To create a delicious and satisfying dish, combine the following ingredients:
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
3 cloves Garlic, finely chopped
2 Tablespoons Butter
1/2 cup Heavy Cream
1/2 Tablespoons Flour
Salt and Pepper, to taste
2 pinches Ground Nutmeg
1/4 cups Parmesan Cheese, grated
3 Tablespoons Parsley, chopped

In a large skillet or pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1-2 minutes.
Add the butter and heavy cream to the pan, stirring to combine. Cook until the mixture thickens slightly, about 3-4 minutes.
Add the flour to the pan, stirring constantly to create a roux. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the flour is lightly browned.
Slowly pour in the heavy cream, stirring continuously to prevent lumps. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened to your desired consistency.
Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.

To serve, spoon the sauce over cooked pasta, rice, or your preferred grain. Garnish with grated Parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Enjoy your delicious and satisfying dish!

102b043149.gt:
1.
Make the seasoned rice vinegar (sushi-su): Combine the vinegar, sugar, salt, and kombu (if you are using it) in a small saucepan.
Place the saucepan over medium-high heat and cook, stirring until the sugar and salt dissolve.
When the mixture is clear, remove the saucepan from the heat and set it aside to cool.
Discard the piece of kombu.
The vinegar can be stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 month.
2.
Make the sushi rice: Cook rice according to package directions.
Transfer freshly cooked hot rice to a wide shallow bowl.
Pour a small amount of the seasoned vinegar evenly over the rice.
Toss the rice by gently cutting into it vertically with your rice paddle (or spatula), and then lifting the rice and turning it over.
As you do this, fan the rice with a hand fan or piece of cardboard (or get someone to help you).
Add more of the seasoned vinegar and continue the cutting, folding, and fanning process.
Fanning the rice facilitates quick cooling, which gelatinizes the surface of the rice and gives a glossy finish to it.
Towards the end, taste the rice occasionally to decide how much of you seasoned vinegar you want to add.
3.
Cover the seasoned rice with a moist cloth or plastic wrap until ready to use.

4. Mix everything together until the rice is evenly coated with the dressing.
5. Optionally, you can add more ingredients to enhance the flavor, such as a pinch of sesame oil, a sprinkle of toasted sesame seeds, or a drizzle of soy sauce.

[/INST]

The final result will be a delicious and well-balanced dish that combines the flavors of the rice, the tanginess of the vinegar, and the saltiness of the seaweed.

2. In a large bowl, combine the soba, broccoli florets, and chicken breast halves.

4. Pour the sauce mixture over the chicken and vegetables, tossing to coat evenly.

d070cb5476.gt:
In a small bowl, mix together rosemary, thyme, marjoram, salt, and pepper.
Rub herb mixture over tenderloin.
Place in a container, and pour hard cider over roast.
Add water until pork is completely submerged.
Cover, and refrigerate 6 to 8 hours, or overnight.
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Place roast in a roasting pan, elevated from the bottom, and pour marinade around the meat.
Bake for 1 hour in preheated oven.
In a large bowl, mix apples and onion.
Put mixture around and on top of roast.
Spoon brown sugar over entire pan evenly.
Place roast back into oven, and continue to cook for 1 hour more, or until meat reaches 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
Transfer roast, apples, and onion to a serving platter.
For the gravy, brown flour in a skillet.
Pour the marinade/drippings mixture into the skillet.
Stir in syrup.
Cook and stir over high heat until liquid has thickened to desired consistency.
Slice roast, and serve with gravy.
d070cb5476.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the dried rosemary, thyme, marjoram, salt, and pepper.
3. Season the pork tenderloin with the herb mixture, ensuring it is evenly coated.
4. Heat the hard apple cider in a saucepan over medium heat until it comes to a simmer.
5. Reduce the heat to low and let the cider simmer for about 10 minutes, or until it has reduced by about half.
6. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool slightly.
7. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat.
8. Add the pork tenderloin to the skillet and sear for about 5 minutes on each side, or until it is browned and cooked through.
9. Remove the pork from the skillet and set it aside.
10. In the same skillet, add the onions and cook them until they are soft and translucent.
11. Add the brown sugar and maple syrup to the skillet and stir to combine.
12. Cook the mixture over medium heat for about 5 minutes, or until it has thickened slightly.
13. Add the cooked pork tenderloin to the skillet and toss it to coat it evenly with the sauce.
14. Transfer the pork and sauce to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
15. Remove the dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into portions and serving.

[/INST]

[/INST]

4edb974667.gt:
Pre-heat broiler.
Prepare pan with non stick spray.
in a small bowl combine chili powder, paprika, cumin, pepper, & cinnamon.
Place steak on wax paper, sprinkle cinnamon mixture over both side of steak.
Let stand for 15 minutes.
Broil steal 5" from heat for approx 6 minutes on each side.
Slice steak against grain.
4oz per serving.

fdb9200291.gt:
start by heating a large skillet with butter, garlic & olive oil cook on med heat about 1 minute add in diced serrano chili cook another minute.
add in shrimp & chopped lobster and all seasonings along with chili paste.
Cook 6-7 minutes till shrimp are nice & pink.
This is a spicy dish Enjoy!

fc990de78b.gt:
Cut leeks diagonally into thirds and then diagonally in half to form 6 triangular pieces from each leek.
Rinse under cold water; drain.
Melt margarine in a heavy skillet; add leeks.
Cook until lightly browned, stirring gently, approx 15 minutes.

5. Season the leeks with salt, to taste.
6. Transfer the leeks to a large baking dish, and pour the hot broth over them.
7. Bake the leeks in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until they are tender and the broth has been absorbed.
8. Serve the cooked leeks hot.

[/INST]

7106d13160.gt:
preheat oven to 350
cream together brown sugar, butter, milk and eggs
mix in bisquick
in pieces add bananas 1 at a time until incorporated
pour batter into greased bread pan or baking dish of choice (i use an 8x10 casserole because i dont have a bread pan)
bake at 350 for 45-55 minutes
remove from oven, cool for 5 minutes for easier removal from pan

5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x9 inch baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.

1ce32e6812.gt:
Toss lettuce with croutons and bacon in large bowl.
Add dressing and cheese; mix lightly.
Serve with lemon wedges.

2. In a large bowl, combine the torn romaine lettuce, whole wheat croutons, and chopped turkey bacon.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together the Kraft Creamy Caesar Dressing, 2 tablespoons of the Kraft 100% Parmesan Light Grated Cheese, and the juice of one lemon.

92214874b7.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
Cook lasagna in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
Drain.
Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat; stir cream cheese into hot butter until it begins to melt, about 5 minutes.
Season with salt, onion powder, and black pepper.
Whisk warm milk gradually into cream cheese until smooth; stir in 1 1/2 cup Swiss cheese.
Bring sauce to a simmer, stirring constantly, until cheese has melted and sauce has thickened, 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove from heat.
Spread 3/4 cup of cheese sauce into bottom of a 9x9-inch baking dish.
Arrange 1/3 of the lasagna noodles over the sauce and spread half the cooked chicken and half the ham over the noodles.
Pour 1 cup sauce over chicken and ham.
Repeat layers starting with half the remaining lasagna noodles, remaining chicken, remaining ham, and 1 more cup of cheese sauce.
Finish by layering remaining lasagna noodles, remaining sauce, 1/2 cup Swiss cheese, and bread crumbs; sprinkle top with Italian seasoning.
Cover dish with aluminum foil.
Bake in the preheated oven until casserole is bubbling, about 25 minutes.
Remove foil and continue to bake until crumbs are browned, about 10 more minutes.
Let casserole stand 5 to 10 minutes before serving.
92214874b7.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the lasagna noodles, softened butter, cream cheese, salt, onion powder, and black pepper. Mix well.
3. Spread the mixture evenly over the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
4. In a small bowl, mix the warm milk, cooked chicken, and deli ham.
5. Pour the chicken and ham mixture over the noodle mixture in the baking dish.
6. Sprinkle the shredded Swiss cheese evenly over the top of the chicken and ham mixture.
7. In a small bowl, mix the bread crumbs, Italian seasoning, and a pinch of salt.
8. Spread the bread crumb mixture evenly over the cheese layer.
9. Bake the lasagna in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and the lasagna is hot and bubbly.
10. Allow the lasagna to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into individual servings and serving.

This delicious lasagna recipe combines the flavors of chicken, ham, and Swiss cheese, creating a hearty and satisfying meal. The creamy noodle and cheese layers, along with the tender chicken and ham, make for a satisfying and comforting dish.

24452e5a07.gt:
Stir the cream cheese, sour cream, jalapeno pepper, salsa verde, red salsa, onion, lime juice, and chili powder seasoning together in a bowl until well blended.
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.
24452e5a07.pred:

fec819225d.gt:
Bring the orange juice, soy sauce, chicken stock, and orange zest to a boil in a saucepan.
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until the sauce has reduced to half of its original volume, about 30 minutes.
fec819225d.pred:
To make a delicious Food, follow these steps:
1. Wash and peel the two oranges, then juice them.
2. In a small saucepan, combine the juice of one orange and 1/2 cup of soy sauce.
3. Add 1/2 cup of chicken broth to the saucepan.
4. Stir in 1 teaspoon of grated orange zest.
5. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 10 minutes.
6. Serve the sauce over the other half of the second orange, and enjoy your delicious Food.

The ingredients used in this recipe are oranges, soy sauce, chicken broth, and grated orange zest. By combining these ingredients and following the cooking instructions, you can create a delicious and nutritious dish.

Heat oil in large saucepan or Dutch oven.
Add garlic, ginger, lemon peel and hot pepper flakes.
Cook gently until very fragrant.
Add broth, soy sauce and lemon juice and bring to boil.
Add carrots.
Reduce heat and simmer gently for 15 minutes.
Add scallops, shrimp, sesame oil and green onions, Cook for just a few minutes, or until seafood is barely cooked.
Serve sprinkled with cilantro.

12f49a25e6.gt:
Take the meat out of the fridge at least 30 minutes before cooking and pound it to tenderize.
Use your hands to re-shape the meat back into it's original thickness and season with salt and pepper.
In a pan that is hot enough to cause the beef fat to smoke, cook one side of the meat on a strong heat until browned.
Flip it over and cook the other side for 1 minute.
Then flip over again and cook for another 1 minute to finish.
Pour over your choice of sauce and serve.
I recommend this steak sauce,.
By the way, this is the dinner that I made for my husband's birthday.

0979acfd51.gt:

Heat the oil in a pan, and fry the sausage until browned.
Sprinkle on a generous amount of cracked black pepper.
The sausages are done when they are close to becoming burnt.

In summary, the steps involved in cooking fish sausages with these ingredients include preheating the oven, cleaning and preparing the fish sausages, heating oil in a pan, adding cracked black pepper, cooking the fish sausages, brushing them with a mixture of oil, salt, and pepper, and finally, serving the cooked fish sausages.

In food processor, mix all ingredients until you have a lumpy paste.
Put in a saucepan (I used a small saucepan and it was perfect).
Bring to boil and let simmer slowly about 15 minutes.
Add salt to taste.
Pour in a jar and let cool.
It's good up to one month in the fridge.

4368d128b9.gt:
Brown the ground beef using the seasonings i have listed to flavor the meat.
(I usually add these seasonings to taste since i rarely measure them, so the measurements i have listed are a guideline) Add 1/4 cup of water and let meat and seasonings simmer until liquid is mostly cooked off.
You don't want it soupy.
Drain on paper toweling.
Clean lettuce, tear into bite sized pieces.
Toss with all of the rest of the ingredients adding about 1/2 cup of the dressing and tossing again well.
Serve with salsa and sour cream on the side if desired.
I list Doritos here because, let's face it, they're good!
But when I have time, i like to cut up corn tortillas into wedges, fry in a bit of oil, and season with Mexican style spices.

Heat oil and slowly cook onion, carrot and celery over medium heat for approx 8 min until soft.
Add zest of lemon and rice.
Stir.
Add chicken broth and boil on low for approx 20 min until vegetables are tender.
Add peas, chicken, lemon juice and parsley 5 minutes before serving.

11f49e3f17.gt:
In a bowl combine pecans and wafers and mix together.
Sift in icing sugar and cocoa powder and ensure it is blended well.
Add corn syrup and rum.
Stir.
Let chill for at least 30 minutes.
Take a teaspoonful and roll into a ball.
I rolled them in chocolate sprinkles because that just seemed so rum-ball-like but you could dip them in chocolate or roll them in icing sugar or cocoa.
Place in the refrigerator to chill.
These can be kept for 2 weeks in an airtight container.
Serve at room temperature.

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the toasted pecans, vanilla wafers, and icing sugar. Mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the cocoa powder, light corn syrup, and banana rum.
4. Add the cocoa mixture to the pecan mixture and mix until well combined.
5. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
6. Bake the mixture in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are slightly crispy.
7. Remove the mixture from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.

This delicious and flavorful Food is perfect for sharing with friends and family. The combination of toasted pecans, vanilla wafers, and icing sugar creates a delightful crunchy texture, while the cocoa powder, light corn syrup, and banana rum add a rich and sweet flavor. e3bc640873.gt:
In a mixing bowl beat eggs, sugar, corn syrup and vanilla.
Add butter and mix well.
Stir in pecans and chocolate chips.
Pour into pie shell.
Bake at 350 F for 50-55 minutes or until set.
It is important for it to be set *before* you remove it from the oven.
It will not set afterward if you haven't baked it long enough.
Serve with ice cream if desired.

7bf3659a3a.gt:
Place tomatoes, onions, celery, parsley and bay leaves in a large pot and cook, covered, on low heat for 1 to 2 hours, until quite soft and fragrant.
Remove bay leaves and blend tomato mixture in batches in a food processor or blender, then run through a sieve and return juice to pot.
Stir in salt, sugar, seasoning salt, pepper and garlic salt.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and cook, uncovered, 1 to 2 hours, until thickened.

2989cc6886.gt:
Dredge the well drained oysters in some starch and toss them very gently in a bowl till the liquid turns dark.
Wash out the darkened liquid with cold water until the water becomes clear.
Drain well.
Place the oysters between paper towels and dry.
Coat the oysters lightly with some flour (not listed in the ingredients above).
Heat some salad oil in a non-stick frying pan, add garlic, stir fry till they become golden over medium heat.
Add oysters cook until golden.
Turn over, add the Sake and cover.
Cook for 2 to 3 minutes over low heat.
Add and melt the butter.
Add soy sauce and green onion and stir to coat the oysters with sauce.
Serve hot.
Washing oysters with starch to purify the taste is a method I learned from Chinese recipe while traditionalist Japanese chefs use graded Daikon radish juice.
Buttered ride recipe is available in my blog.
http://kcocoangela.blog132.fc2.com/blog-entry-6.html
2989cc6886.pred:

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the oysters, starch, garlic, cooking oil, and butter. Mix well to ensure the oysters are coated evenly.
3. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the oysters are cooked through and the starch has turned golden brown.
4. While the oysters are baking, in a small saucepan, heat the sake or white wine over medium heat. Add the soy sauce and green onion, stirring to combine.
5. Once the oysters are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
6. Pour the sauce over the oysters and stir to combine.
7. Serve the cooked oysters immediately, garnished with a sprinkle of green onion if desired.

The cooking process involves preheating the oven, preparing the ingredients, mixing the oysters with starch, cooking the oysters, making the sauce, and finally, combining the cooked oysters with the sauce. The result is a delicious and flavorful dish that showcases the natural taste of oysters and enhances them with the addition of the starch, garlic, cooking oil, butter, sake, and soy sauce.

b9d49b2792.gt:
Marinade lamb in lemon juice, oil, garlic and chopped rosemary for at least an hour.
Combine lemon, onion, garlic and rosemary sprigs in a baking dish and place lamb rack with marinade on top.
Bake at 180 C for 35-40 mins or until cooked to your preference.
Remove lamb to a plate & keep warm.
Discard pan ingredients but reserve pan juices.
Heat pan juices and blend in flour.
Cook for 1 minute.
Gradually blend in stock and wine until smooth.
Cook stirring until sauce boils and thickens, Season to taste.
Serve roast, sliced into cutlets with sauce and vegetables of your choice.
b9d49b2792.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the lamb rack with salt and pepper.
3. In a large bowl, mix the lemon juice, olive oil, minced garlic, rosemary, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. Place the lamb rack in the bowl and toss to coat the meat evenly with the marinade.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
6. Remove the lamb rack from the marinade and pat it dry with paper towels.
7. Heat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
8. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the onion and cook until it is softened, about 5 minutes.
9. Add the garlic and cook for another 2 minutes, or until it is fragrant.
10. Add the chopped rosemary and cook for an additional 1 minute.
11. Add the flour and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
12. Gradually pour in the vegetable stock, stirring constantly to avoid lumps.
13. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
14. Remove the skillet from the heat and stir in the red wine.
15. Return the skillet to the heat and cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has slightly thickened.
16. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
17. Place the lamb rack on a baking sheet and spoon the sauce over the top.
18. Roast the lamb in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the meat is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
19. Remove the lamb from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into individual pieces.
20. Serve the lamb

128f70ff9b.gt:
Season the chicken with salt and pepper.
Heat the olive oil in a large, heavy pot over medium-high heat.

Transfer the Butter to a fine sieve and shake 2 or 3 times over the sink to allow any excess liquid to drain.
Put the butter in a bowl, cover, and chill for at least 1 hour before using.
Store it in the refrigerator, where it has a shelf life of about 1 week.

1. In a saucepan, combine the crumbled dried arbol chiles, water, and granulated sugar. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat.
2. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the seedless tamarind paste to the saucepan and stir well. Continue to cook for another 5-10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the flavors have melded together.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool slightly.
5. Serve the cooked sauce over your desired Food, such as rice, noodles, or a tortilla.

The delightful Food you have created will have a rich, spicy, and tangy flavor, making it a delicious and satisfying meal.

ecab1caf21.gt:
Heat a 12 inch skillet over high heat for 4 minutes.
Toss shrimp with 1/2 of the red pepper flakes, 2T oil, 3/4 t salt.
Add shrimp to hot skillet quickly arrange in single layer sear until bottom of shrimp forms small spots of crust about 30 seconds.
Remove from heat and turn shrimp over and add cognac pause until cognac has warmed up slightly about 5 seconds,return to high heat ignite cognac shaking pan when flames are out about 15-30 seconds later pour shrimp into bowl set aside.
Allow skillet to cool return to burner over low heat add 3T oil, 3T garlic; saute until sticky about 7-10 minutes.
Add the rest of the red pepper flakes, 3/4t salt, sugar, tomatoes, and wine; heat on medium high and then simmer until thickened, about 8 minutes.
Stir in shrimp with accumulated juices, remaining 1T garlic and parsley; simmer until shrimp is heated through, about 1 minute.
Take off heat stir in 1T olive oil.
Cook pasta in salted water save 1/3 cup pasta water; drain.
In a pot add pasta 1/2 cup sauce (no shrimp) add 2-3T pasta water toss.
Put some pasta on plates top with sauce and shrimp.
ecab1caf21.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 450°F (232°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the shrimp, red pepper flakes, and 6 tablespoons of olive oil. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
3. In a large skillet, heat the remaining 12 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
4. Add the diced tomatoes, drained, and cook for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the cognac or brandy, and cook for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. Add the sugar, and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
7. Add the linguine to the skillet, and toss to coat with the sauce. Cook for 1 minute, or until the linguine is heated through.
8. Transfer the linguine to a serving dish, and garnish with fresh minced parsley.
9. Serve immediately, and enjoy your delicious shrimp linguine dish!

9a2ed3c6dc.gt:
Wisk all ingredients together until combined.
Do not overstir.
Heat lightly greased griddle or skillet over medium heat.
Pour or scoop batter onto griddle, apx 1/4 cup per pancake.
Brown on both sides.
Serve hot!
9a2ed3c6dc.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the pancake mix, brown sugar, pumpkin pie spice, and egg.
3. Add the milk and vegetable oil, and mix until smooth.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the vinegar and pumpkin puree.
5. Pour the vinegar mixture into the pancake batter, and mix until combined.
6. Pour the batter onto a well-greased baking sheet or a non-stick pan.
7. Cook the pancakes in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
8. Serve the pancakes warm, and enjoy your delicious homemade pumpkin pancakes!

[/INST]

6f4d1ffc76.gt:
In la deep pot, bring water, a pinch of salt and oil to a boil.
Rinse rice a couple of times.
Add to boiling water.
Reduce heat to low, cover and cook until water evaporates (1520 minutes).
Fluff with fork, let it cool to room temperature or refrigerate until ready to use.
When ready to serve, add chopped cilantro and lime juice.
Season with salt.
6f4d1ffc76.pred:
[/SYS]

[SYS] <<VR>>
You are standing in a kitchen, holding a bowl of rice and a lime. You can see a frying pan on the stove, and a cutting board with chopped cilantro on it.

To prepare this dish, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot, combine 2 cups of water and 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat.
2. Add 1 cup of jasmine rice to the pot, stirring gently to ensure the rice is evenly coated with the liquid.
3. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let the rice cook for about 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is tender and the water has been absorbed.
4. While the rice is cooking, prepare the other ingredients.
5. Cut the lime in half and juice it, then set aside.
6. Chop the cilantro and set aside.
7. Heat the frying pan on the stove over medium heat. Add a small amount of oil to the pan, and then add the chopped cilantro. Cook for a few minutes, stirring occasionally, until the cilantro is fragrant and slightly wilted.
8. Remove the cilantro from the pan and set aside.
9. Add a small amount of oil to the pan, and then add the squeezed lime juice. Cook for a few seconds, stirring, until the lime juice has been absorbed by the oil.
10. Season the dish with salt as needed, and then serve the cooked rice alongside the lime and cilantro mixture.

Enjoy your delicious, homemade Jasmine Rice with Cilantro and Lime!

6b1de00aa7.gt:
Boil rigatoni according to package directions.
While pasta is cooking, mix ricotta, egg, garlic powder, Italian seasoning, and red pepper for the minicotti filling.
Season with salt.
You could add minced, sauteed mushrooms or chopped spinach here if you wish.
I season the filling a bit more than I would a normal manicotti; you want this one little bite to have some punch.
When rigatoni is al dente, drain and place pasta in cool water to stay soft while you work.
Place filling in an icing bag with a small tip, or a smaller plastic bag with a tiny corner nipped off will work just fine.
Pipe filling into rigatoni.
I like to fill the pasta halfway from one side and halfway from the other.
Place filled minicotti in a baking dish lightly sprayed with cooking spray.
Top minicotti lightly with pasta sauce.
Sprinkle lightly with Parmesan.
Bake at 350 F for 15-20 minutes.
Let sit at room temperature for 5 minutes before serving.
Enjoy!
6b1de00aa7.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cook the Rigatoni according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked Rigatoni, Ricotta Cheese, egg, garlic powder, Italian seasoning, red pepper flakes, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Mix well.
4. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish, and spread it evenly.
5. Pour the pasta sauce over the Rigatoni mixture, and sprinkle with grated Parmesan Cheese.
6. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the pasta is cooked through and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy your delicious homemade Rigatoni and Ricotta Bake.

789488866b.gt:
Mix all wet ingredients and beat until everything is well incorporated.
Mix all dry ingredients.
Then add them to wet mixture a little at a time until everything is completely mix.
Divide mixture equally and pour in two loaf pans.
Bake between 55-60 minutes for 350F.
789488866b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the eggs, vanilla, and sugar. Whisk until well combined.
3. Add the coconut, carrots, golden raisins, canola oil, yogurt, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, baking soda, and nutmeg to the bowl. Mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the flour to the mixture, stirring until a smooth dough forms.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
6. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.
8. Once the cake is completely cool, use a sharp knife to cut it into slices.

This delicious cake is perfect for serving at gatherings or enjoying as a dessert. The combination of shredded carrots, coconut, golden raisins, and brown sugar provides a sweet and satisfying taste, while the eggs, vanilla, and nutmeg add a touch of warmth and depth. The all-purpose flour ensures a moist and tender crumb, and the baking powder and baking soda contribute to the cake's light and fluffy texture.

43e0e4b926.gt:
Bring cream cheese and mozzarella to room temperature or just [slightly] warm in microwave.
Mix everything together in a bowl.
Except for anything that says, "reserve half."
Or, your purple onions, sweet chili sauce, hot mustard, wontons and oil in a bowl.
Look closely at the ingredient section for clarification.
Smear your cream cheese spread evenly atop of your pre-made crust[s].
Smear a thin layer of sweet chili sauce atop the cream cheese.
This chili sauce can seriously over dominate your pizza - flavor wise - so don't overdue it.
Unless of course, you prefer it as a primary flavor.
Lightly smear your hot mustard to taste and evenly sprinkle on your remaining crab meat.
Add your thin sliced purple and your reserved green onions, red pepper flakes and mozzarella cheese.
Thin slice your wontons and fry in hot oil for about 30 seconds - just until they're just slightly browned and crispy.
They'll brown more as they dry.
Don't over fry.
Place on clean napkins to drain oil then, place them on your pizza.
Bake on a pizza stone or cookie sheet at 425 for 25 minutes.
Or, until crusts are browned and cheese is bubbling.
Slice and serve hot with ice cold beers.
43e0e4b926.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Prepare the pizza crusts by rolling out the dough on a floured surface to fit your desired pizza size.
3. Place the crusts on a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown.
4. While the crusts are baking, prepare the toppings.
5. In a large bowl, combine the mozzarella cheese, cream cheese, crab meat, chili sauce, Parmesan cheese, green onions, hot yellow mustard, purple onions, garlic, red pepper flakes, Worcestershire sauce, ginger, soy sauce, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
6. Once the crusts are done, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Spread the cheese mixture evenly over the cooled crusts.
8. Add the cooked and sliced wonton wraps on top of the cheese mixture.
9. Return the pizzas to the oven and bake for 10-12 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Remove the pizzas from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

cb7e6bedc8.gt:
Preheat oven to 180C.
Melt the butter in the microwave.
Mix all the ingredients together.
Pour the mixture into a baking dish and cook for 45 minutes.
cb7e6bedc8.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the flour and baking powder to the creamed mixture, and mix until well combined.
4. Add the drained crushed pineapple and mix until well combined.
5. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade cake!

49ba66ed9e.gt:
In a large saucepan, heat the butter or margarine and oil over medium heat.
Add the chicken and brown lightly on each side.
Once the chicken breasts are cooked (the juices should run clear) remove them from the pan and set aside.
Add the shallots and the chicken stock to the pan.
Simmer for 3 minutes.
Add the raspberry vinegar.
Bring all to a boil and simmer, stirring, until the mixture thickens.
Stir in the cream and return the chicken to the pan.
Heat for 1 minute to warm the chicken, turning the chicken pieces to coat with the sauce.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
49ba66ed9e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
3. In a large skillet, heat the butter and vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the minced shallots and cook until they are soft and translucent.
4. Add the chicken stock and raspberry vinegar to the skillet, stirring to combine.
5. Add the chicken breasts to the skillet, and cook until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6. Remove the chicken from the skillet and let it rest for a few minutes.
7. In a blender or food processor, combine the heavy whipping cream, salt, and pepper. Blend until smooth.
8. Return the chicken to the skillet, and pour the cream mixture over the chicken. Cook for a few minutes, until the sauce has thickened slightly.
9. Serve the chicken with the sauce over it, and enjoy your mouthwatering Food!

af9b2fab3d.gt:
Add your garlic powder, onion powder, pepper and celery to your cut up meat
Heat oil in a big pot (I like using my dutch oven type) add your cubed seasoned beef, start browning over med high heat
When you have some good color, add the water, and the beef bouillon and bring to a boil and cook for about 2hrs, you want it to simmer, a low boil here, cover with a lid
Add tomato sauce, baby carrots, potatoes, continue cooking at a low boil, stirring occasionally for about 1 & 1/2hrs, keep lid on
Add your geen beans ( add 1 can beans and the liquid from can , the other can of beans you need to drain and just add the beans), and the corn, let cook about 30mins longer
af9b2fab3d.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To prepare the beef stew, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.
2. Add the garlic powder and onion powder, stirring constantly for about 1 minute.
3. Add the beef cubes and cook until browned, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the black pepper, dried celery, and beef bouillon. Stir to combine.
5. Pour in the water and bring the mixture to a boil.
6. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for about 1-1.5 hours or until the beef is tender.
7. Add the carrots, potatoes, and green beans to the pot, stirring to combine.
8. Add the corn, stirring to combine.
9. Simmer the stew for an additional 30-45 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
10. Season the stew with salt and pepper to taste.
11. Serve the beef stew hot, over rice or with crusty bread.

[/INST]

e0704be51f.gt: Add all ingredients together and blend until combined
e0704be51f.pred:
1. First, gather all the ingredients, including 2 cups of cherries, 1 banana, 1 cup of yogurt, 1 cup of ice, and 1 tablespoon of honey.
2. In a blender, combine the cherries, banana, and yogurt.
3. Add the ice to the blender, and blend the mixture until it reaches the desired consistency.
4. If the mixture is too thick, add a small amount of honey to achieve the desired consistency.
5. Pour the blended mixture into a glass, and enjoy your delicious cherry and banana smoothie.

Please note that these are general instructions and may vary depending on the specific blender model and settings.

d1c38e95f4.gt:
Note: You will also need a Babycakes cake pop machine.
For the donuts: Preheat your Babycakes cake pop machine.
In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt.
Then add eggs, maple syrup, and vanilla.
Mix well.
Before adding apple pie filling, run a knife through the large chunks of apples to chop them into smaller pieces.
Then add to mixture and mix until all apples are incorporated.
Then add the milk.
The mixture will be on the thick side.
Pour 1 tablespoon of donut mixture into each reservoir of your preheated Babycakes cake pop machine.
Bake for 4 minutes, then remove and place on a plate or cooling rack to cool off.
For the glaze: In a small bowl mix together powdered sugar, vanilla, and milk.
You want the consistency to be runny, not thick.
Dip each donut in the mixture and flip it around by hand or with a fork until the whole donut is covered.
Then place back on the cooling rack until the glaze is dry.
For the coating: In a small bowl combine the powdered sugar and cinnamon.
Dip each donut into the mixture and roll around until all covered.
Then place finished donuts in an airtight container until ready to eat.
Oh, who are you kidding, go ahead and start eating!
d1c38e95f4.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, maple syrup, vanilla extract, and milk.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until a dough forms.
5. Roll the dough out on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
6. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
7. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
9. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade apple pie cookies!

3d07a1a906.gt:
Halve avocados and remove pit.
Roll limes or heat in microwave for 10 seconds to get juices flowing.
Halve the limes.
Rub the avocado halves gently with 1/2 lime to retard the browning.
Juice limes into small bowl and mix with sugar, chili powder and salt using a fork or small whisk.
Add extra-virgin olive oil in a slow stream while mixing dressing.
Pour dressing into the cavities of avocados, distributing it equally and serve.
Garnish with chives or cilantro as an optional garnish.
3d07a1a906.pred:
1. First, prepare the avocado by removing the pit and peeling the skin.
2. Squeeze the lime juice over the avocado to prevent it from turning brown.
3. Add the sugar, chili powder, salt, and extra virgin olive oil to the avocado.
4. Mix the ingredients together until well combined.
5. Optionally, garnish the dish with chopped chives or cilantro for added flavor and presentation.

[/INST]

[/SYS]
